On the bright side, it does save you money on electric which means more money in your pocket. You can't beat this tv for the price.

Reviews.Title: Blinded by the stars and price cut.
Reviews.Author: Trevor
Reviews.Content: I should have read the reviews; I was blinded by the stars and price cut. This TV is a UN32EH4003FXZA and has no audio output whatsoever so now I have to purchase an AV receiver if I want to use external speakers on this unit. Picture is good and sound isn't half bad but I expected what was advertised.

Reviews.Title: Excellent bedroom size LED HDTV, feature rich for the price!
Reviews.Author: Bear
Reviews.Content: Great value! Excellent video and audio, easy setup, predictably fast two day shipping (ordered Thursday night, arrived Saturday morning). Plenty of inputs/outputs for an entry level HDTV, but the power cord is inexplicably short (barely long enough to reach dresser top from conventional height wall plug).

Reviews.Title: Great Television
Reviews.Author: Stefan.K
Reviews.Content: Best bang for your buck.32 inches, amazing graphics.Was worried about the refresh rate being too slow to play video games (as one reviewer said)--I didnt find this an issue at all. I play PS3 games on here and the rendering is gorgeous.Someone said the volume isnt that great on this--we use this in a game room, not a large living room, but I haven't had to turn it up past 50/100 volume yet.Very happy with this.

Reviews.Title: Love Samsung televion
Reviews.Author: John Piernik "jp"
Reviews.Content: Looks great and a breeze to mount on my VideoSecu wall mount.  No noticeable loss of motion even though only 720p.  Perfect as my bedroom televion.

Reviews.Title: 5 star rating....do recomment it .
Reviews.Author: Dorrie Ritchie
Reviews.Content: First because it's a Samsung!  Was easy to assemble.  And is crystal clear and programmed itself.  What more could a consumer require !  Love it !

Reviews.Title: Picture-great, Sound-poor
Reviews.Author: Dan Beaudoin
Reviews.Content: Great picture, but as other reviews have mentioned, terrible sound with no options to hook into an A/V receiver.  I still went with this because it will be used in a bedroom at lower sound levels, so that wasn't a make or break factor for me.

Reviews.Title: best tv
Reviews.Author: mayyam
Reviews.Content: thank you amazon for such great product!! this TV is the best quality among the best: great picture quality, nice remote control, fast installation, and quick connection to laptop via hdmi cable

Reviews.Title: It's a budget friendly Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: TechDude
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv for the price and considering its a Samsung TV. People will claim that the image isn't sharp since it is 720p or 60hz but I can say those people are wrong. For one, if your sitting over 6ft from your tv, most people will not be able to tell the difference between 720p or 1080p. Also, the human eye physically cant see over approximately 70hz so don't buy the hog wash that you need a tv that is 120hz. It's the same type of hog wash where people say you need a $80 HDMI cable to get a quality picture. The regular $5 HDMI cables do the job just fine. This is a barebones non smart tv but for the price I would recommend. The only reason I took 1 star off is because of the construction of the TV. It feels fragile because of the plastic construction and very light when you pick up the TV. Some people could consider that a plus.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lyn
Reviews.Content: I purchase the television as a gift and the recipient said that the TV is awesome, crystal clear, and lightweight, and is totally happy with. =]

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV...best price!
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: I did my research and this is the best 32 inch TV for the price.  Don't waste money buying the 1080 when you don't need it for a 32 inch screen.  Don't buy a Smart TV when you can just use a Roku or other streaming device for less.  And Amazon has the absolute best price on this TV.  After I purchased it, I saw Target had it on sale for $299 which was still more than what I paid on here.  Love too that it was shipped to me - received in just two days - easy!  If you're considering a 32 inch TV this Samsung is the best!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Blueice888
Reviews.Content: As the other reviews have said this is a great TV for the price. I love that you can actually turn it on and go through the menu options if your dog has hid the remote. I have only one small complaint.  The bezel on the outside is glossy and I have two lamps on nightstands behind the TV so they reflect back at me.  That should have been done in a flat black so you don't get the glare. Probably tacky to put electrical tape around it but it annoys me!!

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: K. A. Crocker
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for a bedroom/office combination and the size is perfect. The picture is very clear and the colors are sharp. Some reviewers were dissatisfied with the sound. Granted it's not as good as one with an external sound system, but I found the sound to be more than adequate for a bedroom TV. The price was excellent and the set up was easy. A good choice for a second TV.

Reviews.Title: My daughter lies it.
Reviews.Author: Nicole G. "Nicole"
Reviews.Content: My daughter is 7 and loves her new tv. She shows it off to all her friends. It was a prize she won for selling candy for her school

Reviews.Title: Good picture, poor audio
Reviews.Author: Ray-of-Light "Rayolite"
Reviews.Content: This TV could have been great had the audio been better.  The picture quality is well above average whereas the sound quality is awful.  I returned it, and bought an LG smart TV instead.  Sweet!

Reviews.Title: Almost a Five-Star !
Reviews.Author: PutterHead
Reviews.Content: After becoming disgudted with have a satellite service furnishing me 300 channels of nothing I haven't seen before, I decided to go to over-the-air broadcasting. My previous TV was a really nice Sony, (that weighed a ton!) And since it was analog, I would need to invest in a converter box, about $50...and figured that would condem my TV set to instant death....if you knw what I mean!I am in a rural area, and can recieve only one station, however, they broadcast both ABC and CBS.....too bad no NBC, but nonetheless, I get the news, most of my favorite network shows, and a pretty good amount of week-end sports.What really amazed me was that with just a $10 indoor antenna, I get a wonderful picture! Better than I hve ever gotten from Satellite or cable. I had heard it would be better, but was skeptical. It IS better.Okay, the fifth star is missing for only one reason: lack of a comprehensive user's manuel. Some folks are intuitive enough that they might not feel this is a big deal, but it took me a couple of days to figure-out the necessities.Other than that it would get a 5-star from me.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Picture is very good but the sound quality is what sold me. I've had similar tv's where the sound was so tinny it was horrible without some outside speakers. This tv has excellent sound right out of the box and an equalizer for fine tuning. 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: jessica hopkins
Reviews.Content: Clear and bright picture easy set up and got to my front door step in no time.. i believe in 2 days

Reviews.Title: Was A Gift For Someone Else
Reviews.Author: SUSAN T.
Reviews.Content: Of course, as always, Samsung built a perfect product...I have two of this model in bedrooms at my house, so when the time came to give a gift for grandchildren, there was no question that it would be a Samsung.  This set arrived in perfect shape without incident, on time...thank you Amazon.This made me the best grandma in the world.

Reviews.Title: Fair Video Performance, but Very Poor Audio Quality
Reviews.Author: ZL
Reviews.Content: I've used this TV for a couple weeks, using Comcast HDTV with an HDMI Cable, playing Blu-Rays with an HDMI Cable, and playing DVD's with an HDMI Cable.  I've adjusted the screen and audio settings to get the maximum performance out of this TV.  My review is based on this.The screen quality gets 3/5 stars.  It is a bit too contrasty, and blows out the whites unless drastically adjusted.  Also, there are major color shifts when you view the screen even slightly off angle.  The screen shifts into much cooler tones the more you view the screen at an off-angle.  High-speed scenes are blurry.  The Clear Motion Rate 60 does little to improve this.The audio gets 1/5 stars out of the box.  It is truly horrible.  Even after spending considerable time adjusting the EQ, it doesn't get any better than 1.5/5 stars.  The audio sounds like it's coming out of 1-inch speakers.  The sound is very tinny, with no richness at all.  There is no bass whatsoever.  Voices are difficult to discern at times of intense music/sound effects.The stand is fair quality, but the TV will rock on it at the slightest movement.  The remote is well laid-out, and is the best part of this TV.  Another annoyance tis that there is a bright red LED that is on, when the TV is off???  If you like a dark room at night, this will be an annoyance.Had I the choice again, I definitely would not buy it again.  I would only say that it is a good buy if it sold for at least 50% less than the MSRP.

Reviews.Title: Nice black levels for this price
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV on thanks giving deal for around $260 and this tv is a great value for that price.. The tv had nice deep black levels and bright picture.. I used the tv to play PS3 on it and to connect my laptop and see movies / videos.. The laptop thing worked perfectly, but i had some issues when i was playing... i had some horizontal lines occasionally in the top half of the screen.. this was very intermittent, would come only a couple or little more times a day... but came every time i played.. i switched on the game mode.. still the same result.. had to return the TV...Now I have a Sony KDL42EX440.. in comparison with this, the Samsung had better black levels, better brightness and warm colors right out of the box... Sony gives me a more natural feel and color, but u ll fall in love with Samsung in the first sight... Just that horizontal could have been a problem with my piece, but this makes a very good tv in a bedroom or anywhere as a second tv.. Don't think about it as your primary tv in the living room, it's too small for that...

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Susan King "SuznK"
Reviews.Content: First, I should tell you that my experience with this was very limited, since I returned the TV to Amazon.  The reason I returned it was that it used more wattage than advertised.  For the average person, plugged into the grid, this won't amount to much in terms of cost; however, I planned to use it off the grid and wattage is critical for off grid (solar) use.  The reason I give it 4 stars is that I know most people won't care that much about the power consumption, since it is still very good for normal household power.  The advertised wattage by Samsung was 28W, but my testing showed a consistent wattage closer to 40W.  Again, this won't matter to most people unless you are buying it to use on an off grid system.The good points are that I thought it had excellent picture quality and I have had good experience with Samsung products. On the negative side, two HDMI hookups would be fine for me, but some people might want 3 or more, which could be a consideration. Also, the sound was a little "tinny" but I didn't attempt to adjust any settings on the sound, so I would check other reviews for opinions on that.  The set was very lightweight, although I prefer the thinner design of many LED sets, which this one does not have.  All in all, it is a good product for someone wanting a set in this size under $300, IMHO.

Reviews.Title: USED IN A ALZHEIMERS WARD ROOM FOR MY WIFE WHICH SHE CAN SEE IT SOMETIMES USUALLY IN AMS  ITS MOUNTED ON A WALL INSTLATIONHON
Reviews.Author: Michael West
Reviews.Content: IT IS ALL GOOD FOR THAT PRICED TV ITS ECACTALY WHAT I WANTED FOR MY USAAGE IN THE ALZHEIMERS ROOMFOR MYWIFE

Reviews.Title: Thrilled with Samsung 32"
Reviews.Author: TutorMaven
Reviews.Content: I read many reviews, experts' (CNET, etc) and Amazon customers', before buying this flat screen.I really did have a lot to learn about LCD's and LED/LCD's, being a novice.So I settled on this set, confident it was what I wanted and knowing that the price was really good (after much price-comparison shopping).Set up was extremely easy, even for me, and I was watching it in just a few minutes. I called Amazon tech service with a couple of questions, and I was done. I have set the sound to "movie" and the picture to "dynamic" and those 2 adjustments did improve upon the default settings for me. (Go to the "TOOLS" button on the remote for these 2 settings and for the sleep timer as well-- it's easier than going through the "MENU")This TV is in my kitchen, and I'm sitting about 6' from it. It's just perfect, and I love it---so much so, that I ordered another for my bedroom-- it arrives on Wednesday!EDIT: Another change from default settings-- Go to MENU, MODE: set AUTO VOLUME to "ON"--- the TV gets SO MUCH louder! With Auto Volume on and the TV on Movie mode, I don't think anyone will have a problem with sound being too low.

Reviews.Title: Has uniformity issues and backlight bleed. (Amazon out of stock=no replacement=low review)
Reviews.Author: BONKERS
Reviews.Content: I had heard so many good things about this TV. Cnet's review of the EH4000 is what really made me want to get it.Out of the box it worked with Music files, and video files and looked pretty decent uncalibrated.So I set it up for my brother so he could play Wii U, I finished. Went into the youtube app to just check how it looked and when the screen went black with the YT logo dread hit me... I thought "Oh man...no way!" Right in the center of the screen at the top was severe backlight bleed.(Which is odd considering this is supposed to be a full-array??) And the rest of the screen in black didn't look right. My next words were "Crap..now I gotta return it.."  My brother didn't notice it much and said it's not a big deal. But to me it's unacceptable. To make sure it was the panel, I booted up Zombi U. Yup. Same problem.*SIGH*I'm incredibly disappointed right now.I may or may not return it for a replacement and hope it doesn't happen again.If I do, I will update the review.EDIT: This review will not get updated as Amazon is now out of stock and i'm SOL. All I get is a refund and there is NO WHERE I can get the same set for the the same price @247.99$.Edit2: 12/05/12.To the TV's defense, it was probably just luck that I ended up with a bad unit. And before I noticed the bleeding, in a normal bright room settings with bright material it looked great uncalibrated. And i'm sure it still looks great on a non bad unit in dark scenes. So I wouldn't take this review as a complete guideline. But rather just my experience with the one set that I had gotten. CNet's review of the UN32EH4000 said they didn't run into any bleeding or uniformity issues. Which shows that it was probably just dumb luck that it happened to me.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: jersey girl
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd tv, and I love it. perfect size, light weight and quality of pics are great. brightness adjustment works great, speakers work fine.

Reviews.Title: OK TV
Reviews.Author: Michael Nicholas
Reviews.Content: Nice enough TV. Bright display, nice colors. Stand a little light, but hey...it's still excellent value. Piece of cake to set up for the parents. They're too cheap to have cable, so it found dozens of broadcast channels by itself... everything they wanted! Sounds OK. No idea about reliability yet, but I have several other Samsung TVs, and they've been going strong for years.

Reviews.Title: Best TV , USB Movie
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Nunez
Reviews.Content: Very good TV, great price, easy to use, multilingual menu, good resolution. I recommend it for your room. You can recreate your own videos via USB port

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Adriana Molinaro
Reviews.Content: I really like this tv, is confortable and I recomend it for those who wants to have a tv on their rooms.

Reviews.Title: EXPECTATIONS MET - AND THEN SOME!
Reviews.Author: Carol A. Russell
Reviews.Content: I ONLY PURCHASED THIS SAMSUNG LED TV OUT OF DESPERATION - MY BELOVED "HEIRLOOM" RCA HAD A QUIET DEATH  AND I WAS CONVINCED NOTHING ON THE MARKET , DESPITE ALL THE HYPE, COULD MATCH THE CLARITY, PERFECT CONTRAST AND NATURAL COLOR  OF ITS PICTURE. THIS SAMSUNG LED HDTV WAS ON SALE AND FIT INTO MY BUDGET. IT ARRIVED QUICKLY. WHEN I INITIALLY TURNED IT ON I WAS ASTONISHED: THE PICTURE QUALITY, THE COLOR, CONTRAST AND ADDED FEATURES NOT ONLY EXCEEDED MY EXPECTATIONS  - THEY  HIT IT OUT OF THE BALL PARK!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Patricia A. Riley
Reviews.Content: Got this for our motor home, its got a great picture for not being an HDTV. We mounted it where the old dinosaur was, and we really enjoy watching this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase!
Reviews.Author: mimithree
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my daughter's bedroom and it's perfect.  Great picture and color. It is very easy to set up, she and I did it in a few minutes.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Raul
Reviews.Content: read very many formats via USB, really exceeded my expectations, samsung is still the best for me, hope to buy a bigger one soon

Reviews.Title: Put it my RV and works great
Reviews.Author: Don Dell
Reviews.Content: I installed it in my 5th wheel and hooked it to an "over air" antenna. I asked the TV to search for all available stations. I got 32 of them. How great is that

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lindsey Ford
Reviews.Content: I was surprised how good the quality of sound is! Would order another one! Worth every penny and very happy with the picture!

Reviews.Title: For MIL
Reviews.Author: Shook "motorhead"
Reviews.Content: in the nursing home. This and the headphones...Sennheiser RS120.....the way to go!  She actually told me to pay myself back for this purchase....that says it all!

Reviews.Title: AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: THEY WAS CHEAP AND EASY TO SET UP!!!! THE REMOTES CAME WITH BATTERIES AND AND THE PICTURE QUALITY IS SUPURB !!! IM GLAD WITH MY CHOICE SAMSUNG ROCKS

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a Great Price
Reviews.Author: James M. Boone
Reviews.Content: My wife already had this TV at her business, so I knew it was a good one. My sister bought this one for my brother as a house warming gift. It is perfect right out of the box. Simply did a channel scan. No need to adjust anything else.

Reviews.Title: Deep TV and no audio outputs
Reviews.Author: Patrick Thielen
Reviews.Content: The thin bezel deceived me into thinking that this must have a thin depth profile too.  IT DOES NOT.  It's a very thick TV.  I also had planned on hooking this up to a soundbar, but that isn't an option since there are no audio outputs on the back.  I was surprised that Samsung made such a basic TV lacking such basic features.  I guess it's my fault for not researching more thoroughly.  This is the one downfall of ordering from Amazon is that exchanges are a huge pain in the butt.  If I had purchased this from a local retailer I would have returned it.  But on Amazon it's not worth the trouble so I guess I'll have a thick TV in our workout room for the next decade or so...

Reviews.Title: New TV
Reviews.Author: Lynn Johnson
Reviews.Content: This was just what the doctor ordered. The picture is bright and clear and easy to use.  A very good price for low income families.

Reviews.Title: Using as a computer monitor.  Beautiful!
Reviews.Author: Seth
Reviews.Content: I bought this for use as a computer monitor.  It has an amazing picture hooked up to a HD graphics card using a HDMI.The base is sturdy, the look is sleek, but the only thing I have to say is that it had a little bit of a red/pink tint on some of the greys.  It may be because I'm using it as a computer monitor, but I just adjusted the settings, and now all the colors are perfect.  I would recommend this tv to anybody who wants a beautiful picture right out of the box.The menu is super easy to navigate.The remote is pretty basic and easy to use.There's a single button to control settings, channel, and volume on the underside of the tv, which is actually really convenient and easy to use.Spend the extra $20-$40 bucks on this Samsung.  I don't think Samsung knows how to put out a less than 5-star product!

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Jerdan
Reviews.Content: I use this HDTV for personal use in my bedroom, It has a great display and is much better to look at than the old fat-back I had before.

Reviews.Title: a great 32 inch tv
Reviews.Author: s-r
Reviews.Content: I really like this tv.  We have another 32 inch SONY (about 2 yrs old not more) tv and both me and my boyfriend seem to prefer this one over the sony.  The Samsung starts up much faster than the sony and now it becomes very aparent how slow the sony takes to ignite and show the picture.  As far as picture quality go, I have no complaints.  Would recommend to anyone looking for a good 32 inch LED tv.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful little TV
Reviews.Author: Angela aka ElvisGurl "Thank you, thank you ve...
Reviews.Content: Great sound, picture, and slimline. A great TV for the price, I use it in my bedroom which isn't too large and it sits far from the bed, Wonderful color and sound, Samsung ROCKS!

Reviews.Title: goody
Reviews.Author: Judith Ambrose
Reviews.Content: so far it has been good. I have not had it long enough but when I was picking up the box, two people stopped me to tell me of the great experiences they had with their samsung television.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the price.....
Reviews.Author: CLO
Reviews.Content: I got this TV used from amazon warehouse deals for under 180...... Very nice tv with great picture and good sound.Cons: The remote looks and feels a little cheap but works!

Reviews.Title: Great for gaming
Reviews.Author: The Monarch
Reviews.Content: This TV was a really good deal. The picture and sound are both excellent, and it works great for gaming. I have no complaints. =)

Reviews.Title: Great picture, easy set up!
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I get a wonderful picture even on an outside antenna.  Its shorter than my other 32" Samsung that I bought in 2010, but diagonally, it IS 32".

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Adam J. Karsky "Redneck Repair"
Reviews.Content: Bought for use in my weight room. NOT FULL HD. NO AUDIO OUTPUT. Still a solid performer. So people complain about "sound quality" all across the board on pretty much every single flat TV out there.... Be realistic they are very small very shallow speakers so as to keep your TV "flat" they aren't going to sound like your 15 inch tower speakers on your tuners. It sounds fine. I found the size to be about perfect for my application. The remote is pretty much a mini-me compared to the larger TV's they sell so put on your reading glasses I guess. This is a great buy for a moderately sized room can view from pretty steep angles.

Reviews.Title: It was a good tv with nice picture it's a nice gift
Reviews.Author: chukwu
Reviews.Content: It's a easy to use tv with good settings just as good as a smart tv it's a nice gift

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Nancy Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: My first HDTV. Great picture with my MOHU LEAF ANTENNA. I use it for my bedroom. I have my mac plugged into it and also my PS3!! Would buy again!

Reviews.Title: Wow What A Deal
Reviews.Author: Travis Linkous
Reviews.Content: I got this badass TV from Amazon Warehouse Refurbished Condition but I got this 420 dollar TV for $183 with shipping and taxes and its like every other Samsung TV - Amazing - Awesome --  I recommend this TV strongly whether you buy it new, used or refurbished - I truly think you'll be happy with this TV

Reviews.Title: samsung 32 inch tv
Reviews.Author: thumper101
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my son which he can now watch tv, dvd,s and play his games on.  He is very pleased with the hook ups on the tv itself, and the quality the tv has.

Reviews.Title: flat and nice
Reviews.Author: Sammy
Reviews.Content: how do they keep inprtoving TVs I'll never know.  I bought this, figuring I would get the latest tech stuff, and all I can say is the picture is superb.  Maybe it's my cable service, but I'm leaning towards it being the TV, because I had the same cable servive before with my last TV.

Reviews.Title: Don't Let Ugly Grey Boring Thumbnail Fool You
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: Since I purchased this HDTV recently, I noticed the price went up.  I can understand why!My experience with this TV has been great.  I love it.  It was easy to set up, electronically anyway.I rated this HDTV 4 stars rather than 5 because I had a problem with the stand.  I never knew pieces of connecting plastic could cause such insanity.  Maybe I got a defective stand piece?  My ex came over and verified it wasn't a girl issue.  My neighbor came over and verified as well.  Stand I received with my TV I consider faulty. The TV wobbles if I touch it.  That wouldn't be an issue if TV sits in one place, but I have to move mine to switch between my Roku and Playstation.So, I rate this HDTV 5 stars.  Zero stars for stand mine came with.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Frank Gonzales
Reviews.Content: I bought this excellent TV at Sam's for $199.99.  Your discount price is $255.  ????The TV has a great pictures and features for the price (Sam's).

Reviews.Title: Typical Samsung
Reviews.Author: Jason K.
Reviews.Content: Was purchased for a bedroom TV and has not disappointed.  It is only a 720p with a 60Hz refresh but as a secondary TV, it does just fine.  Unless you are a hardcore AV geek, you probably have a hard time differentiating 720p to 1080p, especially on a smaller set placed across the room.  Can I see a difference between this and the TV in my Family Room?  Yes, but it does exactly what I need it to do.  I do not use this for gaming or Blu-Ray, so I cannot speak to its performance but would guess the refresh rate could be an issue.As with most flat screens, the sound is not going to blow you away but we were not looking for that anyway.  I have very good luck with Samsung TV's and this one does not disappoint for its use and the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jeff Rakaskas
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my new TV.  The picture is outstanding.  Sound is fine for my studio apartment.  I gave it 4 stars because i am a little concerned that you supposedly cant hook up external sound.  I would recommend this TV to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value.
Reviews.Author: B. Leonard
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality, so-so sound quality..... Since it's a Samsung, I fully expect this TV to provide years of trouble-free viewing.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Deanna Brown
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for the bedroom where my disabled husband spends most of his time. The features I like the most: 1.It turns on more quickly than the TV of a different brand I bought for the living room. 2. It easily interfaced with our directTV remote, so that my husband doesn't have to maneuver two remotes, but I can still use the Samsung remote from my side of the bed when he falls asleep with the TV on. Picture and Sound are quite adequate for our needs.

Reviews.Title: Nice picture but awful sound, and no easy remedy
Reviews.Author: Arlingtonhatr
Reviews.Content: Got the UN32EH4003FXZA model at a big box store, due to the sharp picture, great price, and previous experience with Samsung.  Unfortunately, this model was a big disappointment:  The picture is great, but the sound was very tinny & flat.  And this particular model, which is at virtually every major retailer, has no audio output jack, such as a headphone jack.  So no easy way to add a soundbar or some other speakers to augment the weak TV speakers, without getting a stereo amplifier, etc.Got another brand, for the same price, and am very happy with it.So check carefully which Samsung model you are getting if you plan to use with external speakers.

Reviews.Title: It has some issues...
Reviews.Author: Dee
Reviews.Content: Overall seems ok. Got a good deal on it but I would have paid more for something else if I would have known that it would have a dark mark in the screen a few months after purchasing. I can ignore the mark for now but eventually I'll have to replace it. Ridiculous.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: Gregory P Offerman
Reviews.Content: The TV was easy to setup and has a great picture!  720p is all you need with a screen size of 32 inches.

Reviews.Title: Fairly Small
Reviews.Author: jan v
Reviews.Content: More for a bedroom than a living room. I wish I would of gotten a larger one with a better refresh rate and resolution.

Reviews.Title: Failed to month
Reviews.Author: JACKSON GUERRA
Reviews.Content: By ignorance I did not buy the warranty. I'm from Venezuela, when I get the tv I was excited, but a month, the failure screen went blank. A big disappointment

Reviews.Title: great gift
Reviews.Author: frank erwin
Reviews.Content: the minimal border makes the viewing screen look even larger-was a great gift for my 92 yr old dad-he loves it

Reviews.Title: Samsung is tops
Reviews.Author: Marilyn J Koehler
Reviews.Content: Picture is very clear; choosing channels is easy to manage; size is comfortable and fits space; TV is much better than programs!

Reviews.Title: Happy Hubby For Christmas!
Reviews.Author: DonnaPSC
Reviews.Content: Bought this tv for my husband for Christmas...Our first flat screen hd tv and it's wonderful. Picture is beautiful and clear! Shipping was safe and secure. Hubby is Happy!

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Susanne Karr
Reviews.Content: I feel that I got a good deal even with after Christmas sales, it's still less expensive than the advertised televisions

Reviews.Title: CANNOT HOOK UP SPEAKERS TO IT!!!
Reviews.Author: Lis
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on black friday and it seemed great. The picture was always great, it was a nice size for my room, and it was a nice price. BUT, I cannot stand the quality of audio HD TV's give off. They don't have speakers anything like boxy tv's have. So one quick way to fix that is just to get speakers for it right? WRONG. I had to figure that one out the hard way. I had computer speakers that I hooked up to my old emerson HD TV that just plug into a 3.5 mm jack (headphone jack), but the TV didn't have one. I thought ok I'll just get a home theater system then. So my girlfriend bought me a RCA home theater system with an optical cable and HDMI cord for Christmas and it still didn't work after I messed around with all the settings for 3 days and could not get it to work. So I took the system back for a phillips sound bar because I figured how could I mess that up. Well I messed around with it again for like 2 days and could not get that to work either. At this point I was thinking what gives and I looked up a ton of reviews on this TV on here and could not find anyone ever talking about the audio until I saw one review saying you couldn't hook up any external speakers to it. I don't just believe everything I see so I went on samsung's live chat system and asked them if it was true. Turns out the Samsung 32 inch 720p TV has NO AUDIO OUT PORTS on it. So I just took it back and I'm getting another emerson.This TV is great visually so if you don't care about the sound, then this is the TV for you. If you ever think you may want to enhance the audio though, do not get this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great image, terrible sound (and no headphone jack)
Reviews.Author: A. Keyes
Reviews.Content: My partner and I were looking to upgrade our old flatscreen TV to something more lightweight with digital capability, and bought this television.  The picture quality is fantastic, BUT...  We were angry when we discovered this television has NO 1/8 or 1/4 audio output jack to which to connect our (very nice) computer speakers.  Who makes a television with no headphone audio out?  EVERY other electronic item on the market has an audio out - iPods, iPads, Android phones, tablets... but apparently if you're buying a flatscreen TV, you're expected to have a 7-speaker system hooked up to a receiver.  Or you don't mind terrible built-in speakers.  Seriously, they're awful.  The sound is thin, lifeless, and tinny.That said, we've been making it work by connecting this TV to my MacBook Pro and using it as a monitor, which works like a dream, and then connecting our computer speakers to the MBP.  It works great, although it's a little unwieldy.  But... This Christmas we received a Blu-Ray player (awesome!), but we don't want to hook it up to this television because the built-in speakers in this TV leave much to be desired (like depth, bass, and texture).  And there's no way to connect our existing speaker system to the TV or the Blu-Ray player.  So, less than a year after buying this TV, we're looking at different TVs because this one just doesn't work with our humble entertainment system (without either a lot of jerry-rigging or buying EVEN MORE components).  We're not a very consumer-y couple, and it feels very wasteful to be looking at a brand new television because this one lacks a VERY basic feature.Any one want to buy a used Samsung UN32EH4003?  ;)

Reviews.Title: Good T.V
Reviews.Author: Michael Sparks
Reviews.Content: Nice color, good sound,no problem. It's a nice T.V for a bedroom and it's very easy to set up. Over all it's a nice T.V

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: wanta know
Reviews.Content: Good looking picture, reasonably priced, and has great sound.  I have several Samsung TV's and love them.They far surpass any other TV in quality for the price.

Reviews.Title: Nice television
Reviews.Author: kevin d. cotnoir
Reviews.Content: Great product beautiful picture quality can't beat the price. I looked at 1080 in the stores and couldn't see any difference.

Reviews.Title: great quality
Reviews.Author: zegreek "pete stupar"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic picture and sharp images. highly recommend any of Samsung tvs as we have four. Was a gift to a very special person.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: Unknown
Reviews.Content: Purchased this for a guest bedroom.  It is an attractive set and so far is working just fine.  Purchased because of the name brand and price.  It arrived packaged well and I am pleased with this transaction to date.

Reviews.Title: Clear, Sharp Picture, Very Lightweight
Reviews.Author: K. Groh
Reviews.Content: We wanted to replace our older 22" but didn't want to spend a ton of money since it was a secondary viewing area. I was very surprised at how lightweight this is. Our old TV is an LCD display and was much heavier even though it was smaller. The TV set up quickly and needed two parts attached.The picture is bright and crisp and much better than our older TV.The only thing I find annoying is that once you put the stand on it, it is not adjustable for position. It is a tilt-up viewing angle and you cannot change that. So ours sits a little higher than where we sit to watch and the TV is therefore tilting even more away from us. Even with that, the picture is great and I'll find a way to wall mount it or something.

Reviews.Title: Great TV if you don't need to add many external components
Reviews.Author: jma-NY
Reviews.Content: The tv is being used in a bedroom.  The picture is great, and set up was very easy, 8 screws to attach the stand.  Very easy on screen set up guide which took less than 5 minutes to be able to watch a show.  It's very light and can easily be placed on a dresser.  It is only being used to watch tv.  No other components are being used with it so I cannot comment further on compatiblility.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I wanted
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's great!  Just what I wanted, clear picture, very clean lines, takes up hardly any space.  Great price for for what I wanted!

Reviews.Title: Nice little bedroom tv but will need workarounds for audio to external speakers
Reviews.Author: Schubie2
Reviews.Content: I have been looking to replace my Sony 26" Trinitron and was excited to find this TV at a relatively inexpensive price.  I didn't realize there was not an audio out feature included (I guess I figured this was standard fare anymore).  Anyway there are a variety of ways to overcome by using your second HDMI slot or in my case I wanted upgraded sound for listening to my vast music collection via the Amazon Cloud.  I stream the music through my Roku which did have the audio out feature and connected to an extremely nice MP3 player that I have.  It doesn't work for watching TV but I did accomplish upgrading the sound when viewing through the ROKU which I do often.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for our bedroom set.
Reviews.Author: james gallagher
Reviews.Content: Perfect for the bedroom. Nice picture, nice price,easy to use. Mounted tv on the wall. Worked out really, really well.

Reviews.Title: Perfect size, easy to operate and set up. love it!
Reviews.Author: Mindy Reynolds
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my 87 year old mother to enjoy her soaps! Price was reasonable, picture qualify is awesome. I may buy another one!

Reviews.Title: Good packaging and decient TV for price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and was well packaged. I bought a TV before that came broken in pieces, but very happy with the packaging with this one. TV works well, picture is good. the only complaint that I have is the volume has to be up a lot higher to hear it compared to the other TV we have.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Robert Westmore
Reviews.Content: Very  clear and crisp picture and that is without HD.  It is also a very light set so you can in stall it on top of your DVD or VCR player and save space.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for low cost
Reviews.Author: cds
Reviews.Content: Great TV, great price. Perfect TV size and dimensions for the bedroom. Picture quality is excellent and sound is very good.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: rs
Reviews.Content: Very adequate TV for small room.  For me, the lack of 'bells & whistles' meant easier to set-up AND a simpler remote.  I hooked up a refurbished Samsung Blu-Ray player with WiFi (~$40) and entered the 21st century.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: Richgirl66
Reviews.Content: I had seen on Good Morning America that Amazon would have a 32 inch tv on sale for $99 on Black Friday. I never was able to locate it on the site, but I did come across a 32 inch Vizio for under $200. I added it to my cart, but was still hoping for the $99 deal. Long story short, by the time I decided to place the order, the Vizio had was no longer available. So, I chose the Samsung. I was purchasing a new tv to replace an 8 year old Samsung in my bedroom and was not looking for a tv with a lot of bells and whistles.The tv was delivered the Monday after Thanksgiving as promised.  So I was happy about that.  The assembly instructions were not great, but I had no problem putting the stand together and attaching it to the tv.  The picture is crystal clear and the sound is great.Although I had really been hoping for the $99 deal, I am more than pleased with my purchase and I still think I got a really good Black Friday deal.  This tv is perfect for a bedroom or home office.

Reviews.Title: Extremely good for its price
Reviews.Author: Mario Herrera Mora
Reviews.Content: For the price is an awesome TV , very good resolution!!! and the changing channel speed is so fast! u will not regret it! sorry for my bad english!

Reviews.Title: Great picture and great sound.
Reviews.Author: Lee Shamblee
Reviews.Content: Great picture and great sound.  It didn't come with a tie string to secure it but the base is incredibly large for a TV of this size.  I have no fear of it falling over short of a 8.0 earthquake.

Reviews.Title: Bravo
Reviews.Author: Cautious Consumer
Reviews.Content: I must admit that the price it what I was looking for. I received the TV yesterday, set it up including my dvd player and it was very easy. The picture is great, sound is fine. I have no complaints so far. As for the delivery service of Amazon it was amazing. It arrived a day ahead of estimated delivery date.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my dorm room
Reviews.Author: Brent Brey
Reviews.Content: Amazing TV in my dorm room. Great picture and audio quality and fits perfectly in my dorm room. No complaints!

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Alex Farrier
Reviews.Content: It was a great deal to by this TV for $250 only. I like it very much: good size, good picture quality. I just ordered a Samsung DVD player and it will be a great set soon. I'm very happy!

Reviews.Title: Great value, even if a little tricky to set up.
Reviews.Author: Jeremiah A. Daley "Phillies Phan"
Reviews.Content: Very light-weight.  Not the slimmest flat-screen TV, but the picture quality - even in digital - is excellent.  Mounts easily in articulating bracket that is sold with it by Amazon.  What's not so hot is the setup instructions and the various menu screens one has to navigate.  A whole lot of toggling, and if you make a mistake, you are likely going to have to go back to square-one.  Great value, otherwise.  Overall, a great TV for a bedroom or den.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: C.E. Barnes
Reviews.Content: Excellent television for the price. Set up easily, nice clear picture, sound could be slightly clearer but absolutely no complaints given the price.

Reviews.Title: 32" Samsung
Reviews.Author: WW
Reviews.Content: Great Buy Picture was perfect right out of the box and sound was great. My Samsung 55" needed more adjustment than this one

Reviews.Title: Me be very happy
Reviews.Author: bodi623
Reviews.Content: So far I am happy with this TV. It was easy to set up, has decent sound if you turn it up pass 40 and nice picture..it was my first flat screen, so I don't know hella much about the specifics of this model, but as a average consumer am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Stunning HD Quality. First Time HD TV Buyers Should Look No Further.
Reviews.Author: Eddie
Reviews.Content: Samsung televisions are simply the superior TV's. No doubt about it and every television expert will tell you Samsung TV's have the best quality. This model is no exception and at the current price of $239.99 it is highly recommended that you get this, especially for first time buyers. Once you see High Definition from a Samsung television, you will know what greatness is.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT!!
Reviews.Author: B.C.
Reviews.Content: I love everything Samsung. All my TVs are Samsung. My phone is Samsung. They make quality products and this TV is no different. I did have to return it however, because I use it as a monitor and the native resolution wasn't good enough for my video card. I just swapped it out for a 1080p instead. Turn around time on the exchange was only 4 days, and now I am enjoying my Samsung 1080p smart TV as a monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great picture but........
Reviews.Author: Chuck
Reviews.Content: This TV is great but has two faults that if fixed would give it five stars. The first is the sound (could  be a lot better) and the second is no audio out. Other than that, the picture is great and I'm pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Sayeed Safayet Alam
Reviews.Content: Great TV. The picture quality is really fine. I like the media player with USB. You don't need cable after having this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great product (would buy again)
Reviews.Author: William M. Swader
Reviews.Content: Picture is super clear using a HDMI cable.  My son is really liking it in his room for TV and Video games.  Reasonable price for the quality.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Bunneh
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my 82 year old great grandmother and she seems to like it. I would take note that the resolution from satellite television will never utilize this television to its full capabilities. I hooked up my ps3 so my great grandmother and I could watch the Illusionist and she was shocked by how clear it was. I am very satisfied with this purchase. So far it has been powered on for over a year and has not been turned off once. No issues.

Reviews.Title: Great Price for a Really Good TV
Reviews.Author: sharih
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son, very easy set up, good price, excellent picture, and fast shipping.It's the perfect size for a bedroom or small family room. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a good tv at a good price.

Reviews.Title: Great improvement- Nice to graduate to the bigger screen world!
Reviews.Author: Ann "In Vino"
Reviews.Content: We've been long overdue for a larger screen TV. Our previous one was a (now) tiny 19 inches! Graduating to this one at 32 inches at first looked so different, but we've quickly adapted.The screen is beautifully sharp, we like the dynamic setting for our viewing.If you're ready to view TV on a larger screen but not quite the 50 inch world- this is perfect for a smaller room.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Picture
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: Excellent price....have not had a bad Samsung tv yet.  Beautiful picture on screen and it is 720p.If you think you have to have the 1080p for a 32" tv, not so.  This is an excellent choice and pricefor a superb quality picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: price was right for my need's
Reviews.Author: Bob G Smith
Reviews.Content: I needed to up grade from 20" and this fit and am pleased with all the attributes that came with it

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch
Reviews.Author: Vickey V. Ellis "Vickeye"
Reviews.Content: Very good tv and it is worth the money.  The base is a little shakey but managable.  The picture is awesome.  I am planning on getting my husband one soon, because this one is mine.  LOL

Reviews.Title: so far, so good
Reviews.Author: Timothy L. Mccollum "timthecleric"
Reviews.Content: In all honesty, its hard to go wrong with Samsung products.  We use this tv for video games and netflix streaming.  It does both well and works great as a second tv.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy with this product
Reviews.Author: Terry Mazzera
Reviews.Content: I am pleasantly surprised that the positive reviews I read were pretty accurate.  I find that the sound is quite good.  The picture is great and the colors are outstanding.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: The picture is pretty standard----definitely nothing special but I guess you get what you pay for. The speakers are horrible on this TV. It sounds like its coming out of a tin can. There is no A/V output or whatever its called so you can't plug in regular speakers but someone told me it is possible to hook up speakers through one of the HDMI ports. I might look into that

Reviews.Title: It's not perfect, but it's darn nice
Reviews.Author: tylertyler
Reviews.Content: For the price this is a great TV. The picture looks better than the 24 inch vizio I replaced with it.Don't buy into the reviews complaining that the sound is awful, change your EQ settings to the ones a guy on here posted in his review(pictures are right there to click), and the tweak it a bit and it sounds pretty decent.I have had TVs with horrible sound, this is not a TV with bad sound at all.The stand is kind of chitzy feeling, and really the whole tv is pretty light and I got the feeling I was carrying a budget TV, but I would buy it again.The only real gripe I have are the inputs are limited and for people that game on a couple consoles and also want to use this as a TV you are going to need to buy an adapter with the limited input options. I was afraid the no audio out was going to be a deal breaker based on people's complaints on here, thankfully they were dead wrong.EDIT 10/16/2013: the TV randomly turns off for no reason. I assumed the first few times that a neighbor was using their remote and that I just laughed it off, but it's just not possible that it happens this often and it's my neighbor. I asked my neighbor, and she says she lost the TV remote anyways, so it's a non issue. Every freaking day at least 2 times a day the TV turns itself off. I am giving it another week, if it keeps up I am sending it back. I kept the box, thank goodness I did.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed.
Reviews.Author: john nitz
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to use as TV in bedroom and as monitor for my computer. Found that I had to purchase a converter box to make that work. Did so and completely satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Perfect For PS3 Gaming
Reviews.Author: SkylessGabe
Reviews.Content: So this was my first flat screen TV and I've had for about a week. Two weeks now I think. At first I wasn't sure if I wanted to spend the money on this because I read reviews about it not being good for gaming, not having the best picture, and not having good sound.First off, the sound is perfect for me since I use the TV in my small/medium bedroom. It gets pretty loud. There's a surround sound feature on the TV, so when I was watching a movie, a phone was ringing. I thought the phone was ringing in the next room in MY house, but it was actually part of the movie. There's also audio outputs, so if you wanted to have surround sound speakers, that'd work too. Personally, I soon plan to buy some Pulse Elite headphones (I use nothing but a PS3 on my TV), so that'll satisfy my surround sound needs.SPEAKING OF THE PS3. It looks AMAZING on this TV. I play mostly Call Of Duty: MW3 on there, and it looked great. There's no lag between pressing a button and it happening on the screen. Don't judge me, but I was quick scoping like it wasn't nothing. It's also almost like I can even see farther away while sniping than I could on my old tube TV. I tested other games out on it like Naruto Storm, Little Big Planet, Saints Row, and others, and it all looked just freaking great. I can't wait to get Grand Theft Auto V and play it on this, Oh, btw I have my PS3 into my TV using an HDMI cord. Idk how regular AV cords would look.The screen is really great. When I playing a game, I'm either sitting on the edge of my bed which is 4 feet from the screen, or I'm sitting across the room which is typically 11-12 feet from the screen. Then again, I can adjust the TV distance and position since I have it mounted on my wall using the VideoSecu wall mount I also purchased from Amazon.Another cool feature this TV has is that it can take a USB through the back. I hooked up my Android phone through USB to the TV and started playing music on it. It's awesome. I doubt I'm going to be using my TV to play music from my phone, but hey, still a pretty neat feature.Delivery was swift. Tip: Order this using Amazon Prime. When you order it, make sure you do it early in the morning. Even though I chose Two Day Shipping with Prime, I got the TV the NEXT DAY. I was surprised. The delivery man also delivered it properly. If you get your TV and it's delivered face down, or back down, just return automatically. That's how "black lines" develop on your TV. As your opening your TV, make sure you don't put it face down or back down either. Keep it standing and you should be good.I've only had this TV for less than 2 weeks, I use it maybe everyday or every two days, but I really feel like it's going to last. I'd definitely recommend this to someone.

Reviews.Title: It's a Samsung
Reviews.Author: Isaac Abouganem
Reviews.Content: I love this TV. For my needs it is excellent, living in a small apartment this tv help me a lot. Picture is very clear and bright, shows and movies in Blue ray are amazing.The cons are:.- Volume: need some tweaking because is very low.- Can't connect speakers to it, meaning if the inbuilt speakers went bad, that's it. Game over....- No smart TV functionsThis is my first LED and very pleased with it and was within my budget range, so it is a win-win situation

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Carolyn Blomeke
Reviews.Content: This is a great 32" television.  The picture is very sharp & is more than I expected for the price!

Reviews.Title: Need TV
Reviews.Author: LoveTeaching
Reviews.Content: `Needed a new tv for quite a while and this one is peforming beautifully.  My son alsways prefers Samsung and am really please with this model.  Mounted on wall, it is heavenly to finally see colors as they were meant to be seen.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" LED
Reviews.Author: wesley harris
Reviews.Content: TV is performing flawlessly.  Picture has richer color than the two other brands viewed side by side. Order fulfillment and customer service was outstanding.W.Harris

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my dorm!
Reviews.Author: Rachel Sze
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a 32" tv that would last without Smart TV features.Pros:- Good picture! Obviously not 1080p but didn't buy it to do that. When I connect my laptop in and use it as an additional monitor for Netflix the picture looks crisp and with good color.Cons:- The base requires some assembly that can be difficult. I found that putting it together required two screws to be placed in that were at a really awkward angle if you don't use a really long screwdriver. Minor inconvenience really but tripped me up.- Base could be more stable, but I'm not concernedOverall a solid TV! Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: If you need audio out, DO NOT BUY THIS TV.
Reviews.Author: Kaan
Reviews.Content: I had had my eye on this TV since Cnet published a review of the UN32EH4000 model, which is practically the same television with the exception of one thing: NO AUDIO OUTPUTS. ZIP. NONE. If you're anything like me and don't keep an A/V receiver in your bedroom and want to use other speakers/headphones, this could be a problem for you. TV speakers tend to sound pretty bad, so I was very disappointed to find that I couldn't connect the TV to ANY external audio device.Oh, but the picture is great. It's probably the best cheap 32" TV out there; it's just a very bare bones one at that.

Reviews.Title: Brand new and love it
Reviews.Author: Jianxin Liu
Reviews.Content: when I check it in target, it was very small, but after it shipped to my house, I feel it's not that small as I expected, love it put in my little room

Reviews.Title: This TV is wonderful!!
Reviews.Author: Swizzy's Mom
Reviews.Content: I don't know much about the new televisions and can't even understand what I'm reading.  (Too old - I guess).  The only thing I understood when I attempted my research was that for this size TV I didn't have to buy 1080p.  It was to replace an old heavy TV and the picture is beautiful.  It has so many features which I'm working on learning, but it was very easy to connect and start watching.  It felt as though I was at the movies.  Wonderful sound, picture, price.  Amazingly fast and free shipping.  Amazon is the best.  This tv cannot will not let  you down.

Reviews.Title: Ordered from Seller --- Video & Audio Center
Reviews.Author: Marvin B. Holt
Reviews.Content: The seller, Video & Audio Center, list this item as a "Smart TV" -- it is not a 'Smart TV". This is simple to see  ,there are no Video or Audio inputs or outputs, other than the HDMI port. No Ethernet connection, no Audio out and no additional Video out on this model. It does have the USB port for ConnectShare Movie, which lets you watch videos, play music, or view photos from a USB connection. But it is not a ' SMART TV" so you can't use any features that a smart tv would offer. The item description listed this model as being a "Smart TV" - This was the main reasons for my purchase of this model. Now I have a Samsung TV, that is listed as being an up-to-date model and it isn't capable of being used as a Smart TV , which was the main reason for my purchase. DO NOT buy this unit if you are looking for a Samsung Smart TV !!!

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: James Sanborn
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my Mother-in-law. She loves it. She learned to use it quickly (She is 85). So I guess this tells you that it is pretty easy to use.

Reviews.Title: A very nice gift to someone special
Reviews.Author: R. Juco "Bobby J"
Reviews.Content: A very good buy indeed and will buy it again on this site. If the price is good..I'll buy it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Big Daddy G
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV when my wife's bedroom TV died and couldn't be happier with it. For the price, it can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for gaming and streaming off of hard drive
Reviews.Author: First
Reviews.Content: I've played SSF4 AE and there doesn't seem to be any lag at all. DisplayLag.com reports 19ms input lag on this tv. It has a game mode on it but i don't really use it. Battlefield 3 looks phenomenal on it. Shadow of the Colossus (running off of ps2 not HD remake) looks pretty good and not pixelated like I had suspected. The TV can upscale to 1080p but I just keep my PS3 running at 720p. It has one componant, one AV, two HDMI. One of the HDMI ports is labeled HDMI/DVI oddly enough. It's actually pretty stable and not wobbly like the other reviews seem to say. It's just when you set it up you can't just push the base in all the way. It stays out a little so the bottom two screws can get in properly. I use Movie Mode on the TV and it brings a great picture. I use a Western Digital hard drive to play shows and videos off of and it seems to support most formats. However it cannot play FLAC for music. It also can't run PDF files. The sound on it is good as well unlike what the reviews here said. Very good TV to buy instead of a more expensive monitor with low lag.

Reviews.Title: excellent second tv
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect tv for a second bedroom or kids room.Slim design can be mounted by one adult with no problem. No frills tv but the picture is excellent for the price!

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: savvy shopper03
Reviews.Content: This was purchased for my daughters apartment. It was a good size and the picture quality is very good. We bought a nice tv stand to complete the room.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Erik Santiago
Reviews.Content: This is the first television i have ever purchased for myself, and it is also the first flat screen. So i was extremely happy when i saw the huge difference in quality in the screen compared to all other televisions i have owned in the past. The TV may be small, but for a bedroom, it is great for my late night gaming or movies! I would recommend buying this.

Reviews.Title: Good Picture, East Set-Up, Lightweight
Reviews.Author: randoman73
Reviews.Content: This filled my need perfectly for a quality TV at a good value.  The set-up was very easy and the remote worked with my satellite receiver right out of the box.  I bought this for a spare bedroom to replace the last tube model in my house.  With a 2 year-old wildman in the house, I was concerned about potential falling injuries and with this being so lightweight, it was easy to get off of the floor.  It will fit on standard VESA pattern wall mounts too.  At the price point and size, it's obviously not meant to be a high-performance "popcorn" time set, but it will serve its' purpose well.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: richard w. fuller
Reviews.Content: The TV was extremely well packed.  Did not have any problems with it, just plug-and-play.  Has a perfect picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Amaxon item
Reviews.Author: T. Davis
Reviews.Content: This item was exactly what I expected it to be and I am pleased with my purchase.  I would recommend this item to others.

Reviews.Title: Space saver
Reviews.Author: C. C. McMahon
Reviews.Content: It's nice to be able to hold the remotes near the TV since it is a nice size.  The picture quality is great, even in a room with lots of windows.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey T. Dutton "safety guy"
Reviews.Content: I use it as a computer monitor in my office.  Perfect for what I needed it for.  Great price and awesome product.

Reviews.Title: Good for 2nd tv
Reviews.Author: Nonna
Reviews.Content: Using this upstairs where I didn't want a huge tv. Glad there are still models you can buy that don't have 3D and bells & whistles I don't need. Took awhile for a plastic smell to go away. TV has good color, decent sound.

Reviews.Title: Great display
Reviews.Author: MasterReviewer05
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv as soon as I saw it at best buy and I don't regret it one bit. This 32' tv is great for gaming and watching movies late at night in your room. It was very clear high definition with great sound. If you are a gamer and movie watcher in your room, buy this tv!

Reviews.Title: All work was in vain!
Reviews.Author: Gipsy Kings fan
Reviews.Content: This TV was defective; I'm sending it back to Amazon for a refund.  I chose two stars instead of one because the picture was beautiful.  A tech from a TV repair shop plugged it in for me and after going through the set-up procedure and looking at various channels, told me that I was going to have to send it back, pointing out a thin red vertical line going all the way down the screen on one side, on all channels.  He explained that this was a panel problem and can't be fixed.  I read a few similar experiences in Amazon customer reviews for this TV and other Samsung TVs; one person said their TV had a white line down the screen, so they exchanged it for another set of the same model and the second one was OK.  Another person said that many of the Samsung TVs actually don't have Samsung panels, they have cheaper panels.  This probably wasn't due to a cheaper panel since the picture was beautiful; the tech explained that the box was probably dropped at the shipping warehouse, and these new TVs are so fragile, this kind of thing can happen even though there is no visible damage to the outside of the set.  I'm not going to take any chances of this happening again, so I'm going to buy another TV from a local store.  I'd recommend this TV for the picture and color quality being excellent right away without having to do any tweaking, but having it shipped to you is a gamble.

Reviews.Title: ok product
Reviews.Author: Thomas L. Norton "Tom"
Reviews.Content: would be handy to have operating buttons built into it as the remote is the only means of operating. decent picture and sound. lightweight and easy to set up

Reviews.Title: Good TV, terrible closed cap
Reviews.Author: april
Reviews.Content: Overall, this is a great television. Excellent image quality, good sound, mounted nicely on the wall... my only complaint is the closed captioning. The type size is so small, and the letters are so widely spaced, that it is near impossible to read. It's disappointing because I'll try to watch something at night with the volume off, while my husband is asleep, and the style of the type on the closed cap is so bad that I usually give up trying to read it and just turn it off all together.

Reviews.Title: Good Image, Terrible Sound
Reviews.Author: WEL
Reviews.Content: Image quality is pretty good but due to the weak black levels it loses tons of detail on dark scenes and back-light bleed only makes it worse. Sound is terrible and it has no optical output nor an audio jack, nothing. There is no way to put better speakers to this TV and let me repeat myself again, the sound that comes from the speakers of this TV it's absolutely terrible.I'm not very happy with this TV and if I could return it I'd buy this one instead: UN40EH5000.

Reviews.Title: Overall great picture but it's bigger than I expected and there is a little light bleed
Reviews.Author: Ryan R. Detzel
Reviews.Content: We just moved to our new house and our bigger TV doesn't fit so we purchased this one to hold us over until we found room for our larger on. It was a great price and it got good reviews all over the Internet so we purchased this with the wall mount. The pictures pretty good, it's much better than our 5 year old Sony but when the picture is black there is a little light bleed at the bottom. This doesn't seam to affect the picture much but you can notice it when it's all black. The TV is very light weight but it's much thicker than I expected and looks a little odd for a tv made in 2013. Overall I'm pretty happy with it.Would buy again: YesWould recommend to a friend: YesWorth the price: Yes

Reviews.Title: excellent tv
Reviews.Author: charles urrutia
Reviews.Content: excellent tv, tv never seen with such definition, now if this model gives these views imaginense those without the more definition??? samsung highly recommend are the best screens in the world

Reviews.Title: Perfect size for our bedroom
Reviews.Author: paul larson "happy customer"
Reviews.Content: We own three Samsung HDTV sets and we recommend this brand without reservation. When they need replacement we will shop for a Samsung TV.

Reviews.Title: Clear picture, just right size.
Reviews.Author: dw
Reviews.Content: This worked out great. I wasn't sure I could connect it myself but gave it a try and bingo! After reading and following all the instructions, the picture and sound came on clear as a bell. This is my second Samsung HDTV and I'm very happy with them both.

Reviews.Title: extremely pleased
Reviews.Author: sharifabrown82
Reviews.Content: Im so so so happy. I love this tv im watching it right now. Lol. Thank you Amazon you guys rock n so does my Samsung!!!!!! Have a blessed day!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good picture quality
Reviews.Author: H. Yan
Reviews.Content: I am satisfied with the picture quality. The TV is easy to use.Some tiny improvements:- Put some video inputs at side back.- I hope the Media Player Center can pick up when I last left off.- Media Player Center: Subtitle only supports Korean and English. A pity for Spanish and Chinese viewers. Support Unicode please!!!- Media Player Center: If I can change the font, size and color of the *.srt subtitle, it will be a plus.- Signal strength: Can it display in the second level menu instead of the third?- Firmware Version: Can it be found easier? I have hard time finding it when I called customer service.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for college!
Reviews.Author: Chad Coviel
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a non expensive television with good to great picture quality for playing my PS3 on. I first looked at the 26'' model but this 32'' caught my eye and I figured for only about $30 more for 6 more inches I should consider this model.I tested the television the moment it arrived and could immediately tell I had purchased a high quality product. For anyone who moves around a lot or is in school and not looking for a huge set (say 40'' or higher) then this is an ideal television. It is surprisingly lightweight. Unfortunately, as stated by many people, this television does not have good quality sound which is definitely emphasized when going from using my dad's 40'' Sansui which has much better sound quality. For me this wasn't a deal breaker but is important to note for others. No complaints on the picture quality so far. To me, it is superb and more than I could have wished for this low price! I am not a videophile by any means so you might want to look at other reviews that go more in depth on the subject of this television's picture quality.**EDIT: One more important thing to note is that in addition to the subpar sound quality the television also does not come with any audio output components immediately available with the television. Granted, there seems to be other means of achieving audio output other than the internal sound system of the television but you would have to consult other reviewers more knowledgeable on this subject. Just thought it may be important for others to know this. Again, not a deal breaker for me at all. Still an amazing bargain.Overall, this was a great choice! If you are not willing to pay anymore than $300 for a television and also want good quality then this Samsung television cannot be beat. An ideal television for a college student in particular and any parents who would want to get their child a non expensive set for their room or for when they go off to college should give this one a look.

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Sambit Pahadsingh
Reviews.Content: I am using it with my PS3 and I like the clarity and the sound quality of of this television.The TV was delivered a lil bit late though but overally I am satisfied ..If you are looking for LED below 300, then this one is one of the best products out there

Reviews.Title: Good bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: ghuber
Reviews.Content: We were looking for TV for out bedroom and this fit the requirement.It was just the right size for our room and it has a good picture.We have another Samsung TV in our living room and would highly recommend this brand.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 TV
Reviews.Author: Ira Kantor
Reviews.Content: Very satisfied. Exactly what I expected. Very easy to assemble pedastal. Picture is crisp. Sound excellent. Perfect size for the bedroom. Delivered promptly.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32"LED TV
Reviews.Author: Charles L. Simpson
Reviews.Content: This TV has very good color, however channel 2 on this set seems to have a motion problem, it's the only channel that I have with this problem.  I called Samsung after having my service provider check out the problem.  It was not the service provider.  Samsung's first tech. could not solve the problem and said that they would have a higher level tech. call me, as of this review that has not happened.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Aileen McBride
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what we needed in the bar area.  The picture is so clear and it is so light even I couold carry it around with no problems.

Reviews.Title: U can't go wrong for the price!!
Reviews.Author: Lexy1
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about the tv when I ordered but damn is the tv mindblowing.. 720p is good enough for all your needs but if hook up your sweet laptop to the tv via hdmi often I suggest you buy the 1080p version for 350$

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: xbonehedx
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. Great picture. Only has component and HDMI cable hook-ups, so beware if you try using an older device that uses composite (red/white/yellow) cables.

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: PM "wood guy"
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my loft area - mostly for the kids to use and play play station. This is a great tv for the price. Good picture quality, decent sound for a tv. I would recommend to anyone looking for a basic 32 in flat panel.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: jean
Reviews.Content: excellent color TV with very good low range of TVs is one of the best and very good price, they are the perfect and sharp images. I love this tv

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: James T. Gardner
Reviews.Content: I got this for my Daughter and her husband for Christmas.  They are going for their advanced degrees and have no money.  This set was to replace an old Panasonic 27" tv.  They can not believe the difference.  They rave about the clarity.  I waited to I could get the right price.  Great set for the money.

Reviews.Title: Quality over Quantity
Reviews.Author: Jae Rosemeyer
Reviews.Content: After spending many years with my loyal CRT televisions, I've finally stepped-up to a true HDTV.  I usually go by the 'If it's not broke- don't fix it' mentality, but in this case I decided the time was right for an upgrade.  I must admit I was a little skeptical about how good the picture could be, but WOW!  I'm not a 'tv snob' by any means(remember, i JUST made the switch from a CRT) so I didn't know what to expect.  Everything now looks so REAL!  Don't worry about the specs only being 720p and 60Hz- on a tv this size it really doesn't matter.Yes, I 'showcased' this model at my local electronics superstore to compare the picture/sound next to comparable models before I bought it here on Amazon and I recommend anyone in the market for one do the same.  *start rant- I don't understand why brick-and-mortar stores get so upset about this!  I'm physically IN their business- i've taken the hardest part of selling out of the equation! - end rant*  Next to the other name brands there was no comparison.  I also appreciated seeing the Energy Guide stickers on all the models.  This particular Samsung is very energy-efficient compared to the others in it's size range(it's more on par with the power-consumption of 19-26 inch tvs).As everyone has noted - the sound is nothing to write home about.  My old CRTs had big, front-facing speakers that would rock the room!  With the thinner profile these new HDTVs come with the speakers have to face down and can't be very big.  I knew this when I tested this unit in person and honestly for the size room(bedroom) I'm putting it in it doesn't matter.  I just turn the audio up and all is well(for me anyways)!  Some reviewers have mentioned adjusting the bass, etc. and that will probably help, but again I don't really have a huge problem with it.  The lack of audio-out options could be a deal-breaker for the 'home theater' buffs.Overall, I'm really enjoying my new tv.  I'm picking-up the over-the-air digital signal(free) and watching movies with a newer Sony DVD player that has upgrading? and HDMI output(see my other review there).  Sound is the only thing keeping it from being a 5 star rating.

Reviews.Title: Another High Quality Samsung Product
Reviews.Author: James  Richards
Reviews.Content: I have never been let down by Samsung!  Kudos on another great product at a great scratch and dent price!

Reviews.Title: Picture issues 1.5 years after purchase
Reviews.Author: LawStudent
Reviews.Content: ORIGINAL REVIEW: I purchased this tv when it was on sale around Thanksgiving for $250. For the price I am very satisfied with the tv. People who complain about the sound ... really?  You're going to complain about the sound coming out of a 32" lcd-led tv?  What did you expect, 7.1 channel surround coming out of this thing??  The sound on this Samsung is very acceptable and gets PLENTY loud on my OTA channels and Roku.  I use this as a bedroom tv and have found the picture crisp and sound very nice.  I have found myself using the sleep mode on a regular basis.  I do not use this for gaming so I cannot speak to that.The tv also has a beautifully minimalist style bezel.  The black bezel is thin and unobtrusive and would look good in any room.If you want a tv from a brand synonymous with quality then this Samsung 32" lcd-led is a very good choice.  Bright, crisp picture with very acceptable audio.I liked this tv so much that I also bought one for my (technologically-challenged) parents.  Their experience has been great thus far.UPDATE 3/07/14: Less than 1.5 years after purchase, this TV has developed dark lines that make it almost unusable.  Although the tv is now out of warranty, it is my sincere hope that Samsung does the right thing and fixes or replaces the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great 32" TV!
Reviews.Author: J. Parker
Reviews.Content: I got this during Black Friday Lightning Deals for $249. I wanted a bigger TV to replace the 27" Vizeo LCD I had in there. I have a 40" Samsung LCD in our living room. I am a huge fan of Samsung TV's. In my opinion they have the sharpest picture of all the major HDTV brands. This TV is no different. This is my 1st LED picture. I love how thin it is. The picture is very bright and crystal clear. I read some reviews of people complaining about the sound. I have no issues with the sound at all. It's plenty loud for me on volume level 12. If you're looking for a 32" LED TV at a good price I would look no further!

Reviews.Title: Awesome deal
Reviews.Author: Lampalite
Reviews.Content: Great Quality; distinct colors, very light, generally well made and all in all a great value. I am satisfied. Only thing is there are no other manual control buttons for (especially for channel or volume) on the TV itself, only a power button; but it's acceptable.

Reviews.Title: Okay TV picure, bad sound, no audio out.
Reviews.Author: Jen "Jen"
Reviews.Content: There is no audio out on this TV.  You cannot hook up to external speakers to improve the sound.  (You can get around this if you are using a cable box or other tuner to get audio out.)  To make matters worse, the speakers with this TV are okay at best.  They are tinny and do not go very loud.  You can get a much better TV for very little more money.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: levi haynes
Reviews.Content: great tv love it, customer service was excellent again as always.  Good picture, good sound, lots of inputs.  Fast delivery, good price, better than even walmart on price

Reviews.Title: Good TV but no audio output
Reviews.Author: Seatoy
Reviews.Content: The price was too good but I should have read the fine print.  There is not one audio output for external speakers.  I now must connect, independently, the cable box and DVD player to my speaker system.  If you are not using external speakers, it is an excellent value and it only weights 11 pounds!

Reviews.Title: Lack of output jacks
Reviews.Author: Barry A. Mann
Reviews.Content: I was excited about getting the this tb at a really good price but that excitement soon faded when I realized there were no audio outputs for me to connect my home theater to. Picture is good but with no external sound options movie watching enjoyment vis greatly reduced.

Reviews.Title: No Audio Output For External Speakers
Reviews.Author: That Navy Guy
Reviews.Content: This exact model TV has no audio outputs to connect external speakers - no optical, no RCA, not even a 3.5mm headphone jack.  This is a dealbreaker for me.  The lack of audio outputs may not effect you if you have no intention of connecting an external speaker system or if you just connect your audio directly to a set-top box, but I am running an over-the-air system so this would not work for me.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Money
Reviews.Author: Marty
Reviews.Content: If you want a cheap LED tv with good picture, This is one to get. Nothing fancy but has a great slim bezel. It is not a thin LED TV but has LED back-light. Cons: Remote is not backlit, no vesa mounting

Reviews.Title: Nice HDTV for the price
Reviews.Author: Tao X
Reviews.Content: I just got it, but so far so good. As of right now I am just playing xbox 360 on it. The color is bright and vivid. And for the audio it is ok until you turn on the SRS TruSurround HD, then it is very good. The tv is pretty light weight. It would of been nice if it was slimmer from the side, but it doesn't really bother me. Power cord is a little bit too short. Decent remote control, came with battery. Only downside for the remote is that its not back-lit.

Reviews.Title: Reasonable Price
Reviews.Author: Erasto Gervace Kishe
Reviews.Content: I bought it due to its price! But I have to find time to configure it because it doesn't come fully programmed and ready to watch. For example, when I connected it for the first time the colour was black & white!! So I abandoned it till when I get time to configure it!

Reviews.Title: No optical port
Reviews.Author: Daniel Soto
