Reviews.Content: This tv doesn't have an optical port. 5 stars. Great price, great picture quality!!! 2 Hdmi, 1 component, 1 Ant input, 1 usb port  and 1 ex link.

Reviews.Title: Awful sound, backlight bleed, good color performance
Reviews.Author: J. Leard
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on a great sale from Dell after reading reviews of similar models online. I didn't need much from it; just adequate sound (didn't need to excel here) and a fairly uniform level of brightness across the TV. After screwing the base and backing on, I immediately noticed that the upper left hand corner of the screen was brighter than the rest on a black background, and this extended to dark scenes on TV. On bright scenes, it seemed a bit darker than the rest. I was none too pleased by this, as this kind of non-uniformity is what I expect from an old TV, not a new one. It's unfortunate, because the rest of the screen did have very good color, and it was far more vibrant and realistic than the TV I was hoping to replace. If this was the only issue, I would have considered an exchange for a different unit of the same model.The sound, however, is the real kicker. It sounds TERRIBLE, as if you were listening through a tin can with a string going to the TV. The unit does support some customization of sound levels, but it does very little to improve the TV; at its best, it sounds just bad, and out of the box it's shockingly terrible. To make things worse, it has no audio out. So while I can use speakers, I have to run the the sound from the source to the speaker or to a switch directly, instead of letting the TV output this like every TV I've ever owned previously.This TV does have a low price point, and you can't expect the world, but I do expect a certain level of competence. When the background is dark, I don't want lighter areas popping up, distracting me from what I'm watching, and I certainly expect sound to be better than what my phone outputs through its own speaker. If your model doesn't experience the screen uniformity issues and you are comfortable running the audio right past the TV, you might be satisfied, but even at such a low cost this TV is no value. Dell even offered me $30 in credit to keep it (which was bringing my actual cost near $100), but I refused. It's that disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Purchased the TV for my bedroom as I was using a small 19" before that was just too tiny. Unpacked the TV from the box and had it up and running in 15 minutes. (Took a few minutes to screw on the base). I love the wide screen and the sleep timer on the remote. The only thing I don't like is the sound. I have to have the sound way up in order to hear it properly. That is the only fault I can find with this product. I have owned Samsung TV's before and have always been pleased.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the bedroom!
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: Colors are nice. Perfect size for a bedroom!The TV is actually much fatter than expected. I have seen newer models that are thinner.The bezels are thin so if you look at it from the front there should be no problem.

Reviews.Title: office lunch room
Reviews.Author: JOE V. "JV"
Reviews.Content: this was a purchase for my office lunch room.  it works and provides the entertaining needs of the office staff during their lunches. good product at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture
Reviews.Author: Clarissa
Reviews.Content: We absolutely love the picture on this TV. It is extremely clear in comparison to our Sanyo. It was very easy to assemble the stand and hook up to our components.

Reviews.Title: Exceptional!
Reviews.Author: ALG
Reviews.Content: For promptness in getting the merchandise and the very quality of the merchandise, my standards were met and were exceeded.

Reviews.Title: Great picture, poor sound
Reviews.Author: K. Leick
Reviews.Content: There seems to be an issue with the sound. It fades in and out. It has a great picture, so I'm sorry to have to complain regarding the sound.

Reviews.Title: very good product
Reviews.Author: Xiaochen Yuan
Reviews.Content: nice TV!!Like it. smaller than I though but anyway it is a very good product. Will recommend to other people.

Reviews.Title: No Audio Output makes this a wasted purchase.
Reviews.Author: Larry Christianson
Reviews.Content: My significant other got this as a gift so I suppose I shouldn't complain but I will anyway.I simply find it unbelievable that NO audio output is available on a TV with crappy speakers to begin with. The only thing that saves it is the fact I use it with a Roku3 which has a headphone jack I can plug in to. Unfortunately that jack is located on the Roku remote control so is still very inconvenient when I run Pandora to listen to music. If I were making this purchase I'd spend whatever it took just to get an output option.

Reviews.Title: just ok
Reviews.Author: samson lite
Reviews.Content: Compared to the Envision tv it replaced it's a six compared to the other's ten. Picture quality. Favorites is in name only, not practical. Just very disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Dennis Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV to go in the room I use as my man-cave, so I didn't really need the huge flat screen with all the bells and whistles. However this one fits the bill pretty well. Because its a Samsung it already came in the door with a reputation...and lives up to it well. The picture is very beautiful and the sound is nice too. I use it with my 360 and play tv through a Direct TV HD receiver, and a Sony Blu Ray. All play a beautiful picture. It arrived at my door safely ( I was duly impressed that I could order a flat screen online and get these results).

Reviews.Title: Easy Setup / Sound Decent / 4 1/2 Stars
Reviews.Author: Guy "Gibby" Wolgamott
Reviews.Content: Needed TV to replace for my dads old HD-tube based TV that finally died... bought this on recommendations of easy of setup. Turn it on let it scan and done. Remote is simply too so the TV is great for my 75 year old father. Only reason I'd take half a star away (Would have given 4 1/2 stars if it allowed me...) is that the out of box picture setup is off so had to play around with settings a bit which were surprising easier to do then his old tv was. The sound is good, not spectacular of course due to it being a flat screen, and the picture is clear. Not the best of the best but probably the best value in this range IMHO.

Reviews.Title: Not much to like.
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv hoping to connect it to my receiver, so that I could listen to the sound through my home speakers, but no go.  Not shown on the web site was the rear connection grouping, and there was no audio out port.  The picture was also of very bad quality,  supposedly rare in a Samsung model.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Ryan S
Reviews.Content: I bought this to hang on the ceiling in the bedroom....yes - the ceiling.  It works very well, and although the picture is only 720p, it looks great!  After we put the kiddo down for the night, we crash onto the bed and watch our favorite shows.  It's actually quite comfortable!My one gripe...I wish it had outputs for external speakers.  I'd love to have some in-ceiling speakers on either side of the TV...but for the price, I can't complain much.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied Customer!
Reviews.Author: Lonney
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love the TV.  The quality is excellent and I am very, very satisfied with my purchase.  Samsung makes good-quality products!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Rose Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Great flat screen. We purchased this TV for our room to replace an old TV that went out. Sleek look, easy to use controller, great resolution.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch LED screen
Reviews.Author: Ak Bear
Reviews.Content: It is wonderful!  So light, and easy to move around if necessary.  Bring in picture very well.  I can't see any difference between HD and non HD TV, but that may be just me.  Some can, some can't.  But it was easy to set up, and I have it about a year and works fine with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Quick Ship Easy Transaction
Reviews.Author: William Cory
Reviews.Content: I had no issues getting what I paid for...was a birthday present for my mom...she loves it.  Done deal quick and easy.

Reviews.Title: Bought two
Reviews.Author: USC Mom
Reviews.Content: Got two of these for our guys for Christmas.  One who never turns off his TV and the other who is an electronics snob.  Both love this TV.

Reviews.Title: Such an amazing product. I love the TV and my experience ...
Reviews.Author: Robert Fuller
Reviews.Content: Such an amazing product. I love the TV and my experience with purchasing and the delivery of the item was nothing short of perfect. The picture quality of the TV is excellent and the sounds is clear. I will definitely buy electronics from here in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Great price, just right for what we needed
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "book lady"
Reviews.Content: This TV was purchased for my sewing room, so it's not our primary unit.  It's a great size, has nice picture and audio.  Very affordable price.  Serves our purpose perfectly.  I was a bit hesitant to have a television shipped to our home, but the packaging was secure and effective without being difficult to unpack.

Reviews.Title: A good value
Reviews.Author: Patrick D. Parker
Reviews.Content: I have been a Sony person nearly my whole life.This tv has as good as picture, if not better, than any Sony. I read some reviews that said the sound quality was not good.  For my purposes at least, the sound is fine.The only down side I have found is programming the beast.  I am not the most technologically savvy person, so this was a bit difficult for me.  The menu is difficult to navigate and you have to be very precise and understand the controls on the remote.  It took me about 6 attempts to get the date and time programmed and keep the date and time programmed.For the money though, a very good value, better than a comparably priced and sized Sony.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: bob mills
Reviews.Content: great T.V. it is the 4th one i have bought .They are the best an the only one i would buy….

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my daughter, worked great for about 6 months, just started having issues with it.  The channels just keep changing, can't seem to resolve the issue.  I will be calling tech support to see if they can help me with the issue.  Not watchable at the moment, very disappointed that this is happening with a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: aleigha moss
Reviews.Content: I love my new tv!  I've had it for two months now and it works fine!  Great picture.  Of course I don't know how hd looks on it.  I just use it in mybedroom. It gets moderate use. I would deff buy again.

Reviews.Title: I really like my new TV
Reviews.Author: Kathy A. Benninger
Reviews.Content: I give it a 4 only because I've only had it for a few months - so far everything is working wonderfully and I'm glad I purchased this brand and model and price was very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV.
Reviews.Author: Wes Adams
Reviews.Content: We bought 2 of them. One for our son and the other for our bedroom. The picture is sharp and the colors look natural for sure! I'll just be repeating the great things that others have said. So I'll leave it at that! LOL

Reviews.Title: Perfect  tv!!
Reviews.Author: Rebal Mansoor
Reviews.Content: This tv is just perfect for a living room or a bedroom. I mostly use it for gaming and trust me it is very smooth like any other bran of tv, when playin game u will feel no lag or glitches. I highly recommend it!!

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: J. Dominique Andre "Dominique Andre"
Reviews.Content: It's a Samsung...hands down the best in this category to me...it was a gift for my parents and they are really enjoying it...lol

Reviews.Title: Samsung tv
Reviews.Author: Clara Barton "Angel of the Battlefield"
Reviews.Content: Perfect for bedroom. 7th just fine for viewing 10 ft away . Picture and sound very good. I have a 46 10th and this pic is better

Reviews.Title: Great TV

Reviews.Content: Needed a tv for office fits right in the space I had available.Picture is just as clear as the 55 inch Samsung 1080 that I have glad that I bought.

Reviews.Title: totally dig it!

Reviews.Content: rolled the dice on a refurb... glad we saved some bones in the process. it's more than i ever thought i'd pay for any TV set in my life but hey, who doesn't like The Masters in HD? picture quality is excellent after 6 months of average use. no problems, no fuss, no bologna. that's that with that.

Reviews.Title: Perfect purchase for us
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Just so cool and we love it!!  The size allows us to watch in bed without the glasses. Very good purchase.

Reviews.Title: Really loved it!
Reviews.Author: ceclia
Reviews.Content: It was really nice, but it did have minor scratches, they said it was new but the box had been opened. This tv was actually used...

Reviews.Title: Sharp picture

Reviews.Content: Light weight, easy setup, sharp picture and skin color just a little off, but good. You can even see the pores on the skin, very sharp.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV

Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my 85 year old mother to replace an ancient 25" console.  Its light and very easy to set up.  I had read issues with the volume but I didn't have any issues.  My mom is deaf in one ear and uses a hearing aid in the other and loves her new TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Television
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: This television is a great value.  I do not need super HD, nor anything huge for my tiny apartment.  It has decent picture quality, OK sound and is easy to assemble/use.  It fits my needs perfectly and did not break the bank.  I recommend this for those that want a decent television (picture and sound), a great value and a well-made product.

Reviews.Title: Perfect gift
Reviews.Author: Tammi
Reviews.Content: We bought this as a gift for my mother in law and she has been telling us how much she is enjoying it everyday.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for my mother

Reviews.Content: She kept messing up the other tv because she didn't understand the controls for the smart tv. This one is nice and simple for her. Samsung is always quality and this has a nice picture and the sound isn't as tinny as others.

Reviews.Title: Great TV

Reviews.Content: Can't go wrong with Samsung.  I bought 2 of these.  One as a gift, the other for the bedroom.Excellent picture.Digital tuner capabilities are impressive

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE my new tv!

Reviews.Content: Nice TV for the price. Good picture and sound quality. It surpassed my expectations. I buy one new TV every 20 years or so. I was surprosed at how good they have gotten.

Reviews.Title: Great price, great TV
Reviews.Author: MARK A GRIFFITH JR
Reviews.Content: There is no sense holding on to any of the old cathode ray tube TVs. These new ones are inexpensive, very light weight, and so much better. My girlfriend loves this TV and it is perfect small bedroom size. Samsung is compatible with so many of the other Samsung products allowing use of a single remote control most of the time (sound bars etc.).

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: sandylou
Reviews.Content: Samsung is a great product and I really love my Samsung TV.  The color is very vivid and clear and I really enjoy watching it. I would very much recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: Can beat this for the price.  Read all the other reviews before I purchase and they were all good.  Since I have no idea what to look for before buying a tv, it was nice to know everyone had good things to say beforehand.  Nice picture & sound.  Easy enough for me to set up with no technology skills.

Reviews.Title: Good TV and perfect size for a small room.
Reviews.Author: Alicia
Reviews.Content: I did some research for a tv, I noticed the reviews were great so I bought this tv in December. I love how easy to find the volume and channel button it because its just one button. Very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: A decent TV for the price. No frills.
Reviews.Author: W. Thrower "Woody Thrower"
Reviews.Content: There's nothing remarkable about this TV, but it works. It's hanging on our bedroom wall, and is completely adequate as a bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV set
Reviews.Author: ad4c
Reviews.Content: Without a doubt, Samsung are the best TV sets in the market, this one in particular have awesome video quality, its receiver is very sensitive, I am picking up stations at almost a hundred miles away with a simple outside antenna.The audio level although is not loo loud is enough to fill the bedroom where we have it.

Reviews.Title: Its a great TV for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Upham
Reviews.Content: I love it and have had no problems. Took me a while to figure out where the volume butten was though lol.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, not the best HD
Reviews.Author: Sears Tanner
Reviews.Content: Samsung has a good reputation and this is one of their best sellers. I have no complaints but I have very limited HD selections only some over air channels. For a better HD picture a 1080p Smart unit (at higher cost) would be a better choice.

Reviews.Title: Great Unit

Reviews.Content: This is the perfect size for my condo living room...not too large, not too small. It has a great picture and good sound. I had considered other brands but, this one seemed to have the best quality for the money.

Reviews.Title: I love my TV.
Reviews.Author: C Sherlock
Reviews.Content: This TV is life. I watch it every day. It arrived on time. I just didn't like the way it was dropped off. It was laying in the yard just waiting for a random passerby to pick it up. Other than incompetent delivery services, everything else is good. It was wrapped in a lot of protective packaging and I am grateful.

Reviews.Title: Bought it for our Pastor
Reviews.Author: tina burnett
Reviews.Content: Our pastor of our church TV broke so I thought I would get him one since he has been there for me. He claims to love it, great quality TV, he cant say enough good about it!! Fast delivery and everything.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase
Reviews.Author: Belkis Jimenez
Reviews.Content: I wanted to give my mother a nice present and this TV was really the best choice. The colors are vivid, the image is amazing and the sound quality is great

Reviews.Title: thk u
Reviews.Author: Tremaine Bailey
Reviews.Content: Yes it did my aunt loves it and still talk to me every day about it thk u for your prompt svv

Reviews.Title: not bad, for the price
Reviews.Author: vance eric coar
Reviews.Content: Pops loves it. Easy to hook up and extremely light. Word buy it again if I need another one someday.

Reviews.Title: Great price good tv
Reviews.Author: Brandon Jones
Reviews.Content: Works as expected my only issue so far is that tv makers keep putting the usb and hdmi ports on the back straight in. When wall mounted the usb port is not reachable and most cables can put pressure on the plug if you do pull the tv off to plug something into it.

Reviews.Title: best regards
Reviews.Author: API-4402 A.
Reviews.Content: The tv is great, awesome!!!!! No problems with a currier.  Isn't heavy, and i receive quickly. Best regards for your excellent work

Reviews.Title: perfect
Reviews.Author: cc
Reviews.Content: bought this Samsung as a birthday present the person loved it! As I have one in my bedroom the picture is perfect as well as the sound. Set up is very simple. Good buy!

Reviews.Title: An incredible value
Reviews.Author: cool guy
Reviews.Content: This tv is an excellent value for the money.  I have it hooked up to a roku 3 and directv and the picture is very good.  At 32 inches the 720p is more than adequate.  The sound is excellent for such a small set.  This is the perfect second tv, I would buy another one in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Kym
Reviews.Content: my first flat screen. the picture quality is great. i purchased it for my dorm and its a perfect size  (32inch) and price.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for the buck!
Reviews.Author: James H "James H"
Reviews.Content: For the price, this was a great buy from Amazon! This TV has excellent picture quality once it is adjusted and the sound is actually better than I expected. The only drawback of the TV is that it lacks ANY kind of audio output, so you cannot connect a soundbar or home theater system directly to the TV itself. It necessary, you can get around that by connecting your external sound system to your satellite or cable box.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV.
Reviews.Author: Jimmy
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV. It looks so perfect in my room. I live Samsung products. They are the best ones. I absolutely recommend this TV. Not too big not too small.

Reviews.Title: Good picture
Reviews.Author: ereed
Reviews.Content: Delivery came in 48 hours television is what I expected very fine quality from Samsung easy controls if you're looking for a television that has a lot of gadgets this is not the television but it's a great television for a spare bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Teresa D. Bradford
Reviews.Content: Even though the screen is on a 32 inch it was exactly what I needed for it to fit in a cabinet. The picture quality is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: David Geyer
Reviews.Content: This was given as a gift for a baby party. The receipent says it is great and has a very good picture.

Reviews.Title: My First TV.. and I love this Fresh Baby
Reviews.Author: Mr.John Doe
Reviews.Content: Awesome ..  I think it's The best purchase I've done with amazon so far .. I love <3333333 My first TVsmall and okay for gaming/ single room... If you have a bigger living room, buy a bigger model , coz this baby would be too smallMy xbox 360 certainly loves  it , my cable loves it , and I love it tOO...DONT HESItate to Buy it.. Worth every Penny. 1 year going strong baby

Reviews.Title: Nice Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: John Bartolotta
Reviews.Content: I don't particularly care for LED LCD or LCD tvs, but this one is pretty nice.  It's used in the bedroom.  Color accuracy is very good, decent black levels and plenty of pop.  Can't really go wrong with this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Sireesha
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great. Very Lightweight. Easy to setup. Good size for smaller rooms.Sound quality is subjective. I like it. Some may not as the speakers are behind. So it may seem muffled for some.One issue I faced was display resolution when connecting to my laptop. It did not work for the same resolution when connected to different laptops. It also won't duplicate the screens on my laptop.  Now it may be because of graphics card issues. I won't blame the TV as it worked just fine with one laptop. In any case play around with the settings if it does not work when you connect it.Do not end up buying a new HDMI cable right away. If possible try with a different laptop first and then change resolution settings and choose TV only projection view (This worked for me).Amazon rocks!!! Super fast shipping and they stood by their Low Price Guarantee deal and refunded me money when I filled out their claim for a lower price on the same site.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV LED
Reviews.Author: Heindery Perea
Reviews.Content: Excellent article came at the indicated time. I am very happy with the item for a reasonable price. Really it is very satisfied and recommend your purchase. Really, the material and design left me happy.

Reviews.Title: Samsung tv
Reviews.Author: Travis ingram
Reviews.Content: Great TV fast shipping love Samsung 32 In tv would recommend to everyone. They make the best products .I have Samsung in every room

Reviews.Title: Great! Great! Great!
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: Another of Samsung's superb. Excellent and worth the price and have the ability to watch movies from my USB Great

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: jessica peace
Reviews.Content: Got here when we were expecting it. Crisp picture and easy controls. Good average low cost tv. You definitely can't beat the price for the top quality that you get with it. Brand name for a generic price.

Reviews.Title: TYPICAL SAMSUNG TV...WHAT MORE CAN BE SAID.
Reviews.Author: maddog
Reviews.Content: Replaced an el cheapon, quickly needed so bought quickly from WM, it lasting less than a year, proving the old adage of "you get what you pay for"!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture for a 720P
Reviews.Author: Barry Scott
Reviews.Content: I was amazed at the quality of this picture at 720P.  I cannot tell any difference from my other 1080P TV.  It is light and easily wall mounted.  The sound quality is just OK but adequate for a kitchen or bedroom.  Very pleased with this and the price was great.

Reviews.Title: nice picture
Reviews.Author: cliff
Reviews.Content: I like this item it was a good price and well described would recommend this if you are looking for 32 inch TV

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: J. Sapp
Reviews.Content: In 2014, if you're buying a 720p TV then you are shopping for a budget TV. For $230, this is an excellent deal. (When I bought this ~16 months ago, I got it on sale for $250.) Every Samsung product I've had is high quality and this one is no different.Pros:- Excellent value for price- Very easy menu navigation- With some small adjustments, the picture is nice (if you want to use presets, the movie preset is probably the best)- For the price, the speakers are decent; definitely not for audiophiles though- Several inputsCons:- No audio outputOther:- The stand is a bit wobbly but very rarely are we in a position to touch any part of the TV these days- 60hz refresh is pretty standard for this priceConclusion: I definitely recommend this TV, but if I had to go back I would have spent the $20 price difference or so to get the 1080p quality. I don't recommend this TV if you want to use speakers or ever plan on upgrading the sound.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy! Highly Advised.
Reviews.Author: Adam O'Brien
Reviews.Content: Beautiful sound quality, easy to set up! Cheap for the quality of sound and visualization, A+ for sure! Definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a solid tv for cheap

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Laree Saline
Reviews.Content: I just got it haven't had long enough to rate it yet.. But it was very easy to set up. Got when I was told. So far it looks like a winner.

Reviews.Title: Our first HDTV
Reviews.Author: Holly
Reviews.Content: This is our first HDTV/flat screen TV. We love it so far. The sound is nice, it looks really nice. I wish we could've afforded a larger TV personally (my husband didn't care one way or another) but I'm very satisfied with this product.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Deal
Reviews.Author: Roberta Kochinski
Reviews.Content: Delivery almost immediate.....product more than satisfactory...installation was fairly easy except instructions never mention ... if you have a streaming device to attach you have to implement the "source" button to activate......the tech provided by Amazon was very helpful in that regard.

Reviews.Title: TV for gaming
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because the one in my bedroom had broken. It's been about a year now and it's still working perfectly. My only complaint, and this is my fault, is the stand broke. It still supports the television, but it has a slight lean.I use the television for mostly video games, but some movies, as well. I have no complaints what I use it for. The sound is good, although I did buy a gaming headset just so others in the house wouldn't be annoyed with sound. The picture is nice and crisp. After my Bravia died in less than a year, I was very happy to find Samsung was a better product.

Reviews.Title: good buy.
Reviews.Author: eric
Reviews.Content: I use this TV as a computer monitor. Looks better than any led monitor I have used in the past.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: judyhroberts
Reviews.Content: when i got it i gave it to my grand child for x mas so she can connect her dvd player

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: edgar alzualde
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture, very simple to use, I loved this TV, good TV without many benefits. with cable looks great, recommended

Reviews.Title: Good value for what I spent
Reviews.Author: Azure
Reviews.Content: Great value for the money I don't know much about TV and it was bigger than expected love it and so does my sons

Reviews.Title: Sooooooooooo happy
Reviews.Author: Beverly Kwit
Reviews.Content: Picture and color is great; TV is ultra light and easy to move around.  This was a truly terrific purchase!

Reviews.Title: very very good!!
Reviews.Author: chanwungpark
Reviews.Content: Samsung tv also seems to have the world's most outstanding.No matter who is buying will not be disappointed. Really!!

Reviews.Title: guest room tv
Reviews.Author: hollie
Reviews.Content: this product was exactly what i wantedit is currently in the guest bedroom where i have a dvd player and a google tv set up. the sound quality is fine if this isn't your "main" television

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Pro41
Reviews.Content: Samsung produces one of the best TV's out there, and this is another great one...  I am looking to buy another TV soon and just waiting for the right price..

Reviews.Title: Great TV for its price
Reviews.Author: Yousuf Hafuda
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my room, and it has been a revelation. The picture is crisp, and the setup was painless. I would highly recommend it especially because it looks much better than most other, more expensive TV's of its price. Furthermore, the TV arrived in less than two days which was great. I would highly recommend this TV, and have absolutely no complaints 3 weeks after my purchase.

Reviews.Title: No Audio Outputs
Reviews.Author: K. Langeneckert
Reviews.Content: The tuner on this TV is better than the one it replaced and the picture exceeds it as well.  As TVs in this size and price range go, it is excellent in every respect.  However, as with most such TVs, the quality of the Audio is marginal.  Don't get me wrong, it is no worse than any other similarly sized LED TVs, and in fact it is better than I expected.  But I never expected it to be great so I had planned to connect powered 2.1 external speakers to it.  Sadly there is no external audio output jacks of any type (RCA, S/PDIF, Digital Audio) to which you could attach such.Still worth the money and if floor shaking audio is not important to you, consider this a five star endorsement.

Reviews.Title: samsung
Reviews.Author: Patrick Morris "fitness fanatic"
Reviews.Content: Love this tv. The color is wonderful and the sound quality is perfect! It was fairly easy to set up and get started.

Reviews.Title: Decent picture, sound just OK, no way to hook up external speakers!
Reviews.Author: canyon wrangler
Reviews.Content: Pic is good, love the USB in capability, but sound poor especially when people are talking, and there is no way to connect additional speakers.

Reviews.Title: Great quality
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Great quality, I always have Sony TVs in my house, this is my first Samsung I buy, and the colors are great.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: scrichard3
Reviews.Content: Great tv, awesome picture!! Got it in a timely maner & was very easy to setup. I love the picture quality!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice and easy
Reviews.Author: Gabriel Orellana
Reviews.Content: Nice tv, low price, easy to set up, no further space required, and is samsung, trully reliable, and great working!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32". Led tv
Reviews.Author: Richard hicks
Reviews.Content: Have had Samsung tv's before and have always been happy with them. Very good picture and they hold up well

Reviews.Title: MY MOTHER LOVES HER GIFT
Reviews.Author: Squirt "Kickin' In Texas"
Reviews.Content: My mother still had the "box" tv in her bedroom armoire that was too small to watch a basketball game on so I decided that it was time to take matters into my own hands.  She called to tell me, "I didn't know what I was missing until now!"

Reviews.Title: i love samsung
Reviews.Author: Olivia Cardo
Reviews.Content: i absolutely love this tv, perfect size for my room, super easy set up, very light and convenient to move around! love love love love love samsung products.

Reviews.Title: a gift
Reviews.Author: DIMPLE REED
Reviews.Content: a Christmas gift for my husband and he get great pleasure out of this has great picture and like the size

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Joseph78
Reviews.Content: This tv has been awesome. It has a great picture and sound quality.  I have no complaints about this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: M. Murphy "amazon junkie"
Reviews.Content: Probably the easiest set up ever. This TV is lightweight and thin. We use it in the bedroom and it is the perfect size. Only thing is.. i wish the base swiveled.

Reviews.Title: Samsung
Reviews.Author: Lil
Reviews.Content: I am really enjoying this wonderful TV. It has a very sharp picture. I have this smaller TV in my bedroom and it is perfect.

Reviews.Title: I like it.
Reviews.Author: A. T. "bookworm"
Reviews.Content: It's a 32" which is perfect for me. Easy to work with, I like the picture quality. At first, it was too sharp for me, but now I like it. The sound quality is fine but could be better. Overall, a decent TV for a good price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32-inch 720p 60 hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This is  a great HDTV. I was looking for a HDTV bought 2 and they were everything I was looking for. The quality was excellant.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Product
Reviews.Author: rob kubsch
Reviews.Content: I bought hit product and thought it worked very well. The color scheme and brilliance of the picture was amazing and well worth the money I spent.Feel fгee to surf to my pаge content creation, writer for hire, free lancer

Reviews.Title: New TV
Reviews.Author: Jeanne Root "Jeanne"
Reviews.Content: One of our old TV's finally quit working after many years of use and we had to order a new TV.  We bought this one for my husband for a Christmas present to replace his 30+ year old TV, so when my TV was going bad, I bought a 2nd one of these.  It is amazing at the quality you see in these new TV's.  We love it.

Reviews.Title: Disappointingly Thick
Reviews.Author: D. Com
Reviews.Content: I was surprised by the thickness of this TV. I bought this for my mom, and she doesn't care. But I would want a more modern looking TV if I purchased this for myself.Picture and sound seem fine. Seems like a good value for a low priced LCD.

Reviews.Title: Really Good TV
Reviews.Author: Danny J. Goncalves M
Reviews.Content: Excellent price and excellent image for the value.Easy to install, light, able to set up on a stand easily.Clear image and good loud sound. Love the TV.

Reviews.Title: Just like "Duck Dynasty"
Reviews.Author: sleepebob
Reviews.Content: Happy! Happy! Happy!  Very clear picture that is easy to watch. I watch Duck Dynasty on it all the time. I expect to buy another one for my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great Entertainment
Reviews.Author: Marilyn M.
Reviews.Content: Great color, sound and size.  Samsung seems to make great products, at least this one is.  I really enjoy viewing, using my computer connection and listening to the performances which are a great pleasure to me.

Reviews.Title: Can't go wrong with this Samsung!
Reviews.Author: Dennis C. McCambridge
Reviews.Content: Great TV picture quality & the sound is really nice too!  Should have got this sooner.  Excellent priced TV for our guest room.

Reviews.Title: Great choice for a TV
Reviews.Author: donald alan diamond
Reviews.Content: The color, sound and function are great. Only thing that's a little hard to get used to is the white screen between channel changes. So far very pleased with purchase and delivery.

Reviews.Title: great deal when comparing to big box
Reviews.Author: Aaron Bond
Reviews.Content: I grabbed this for a guest room. Works great looks great, i am a samsung fan anyway for tv's. But it beat Walmart by $60-70 bucks. If you dont need it this minute and can wait a few days for shipping you can't beat this one! Get it.

Reviews.Title: What I expected from Samsung
Reviews.Author: William Fisher
Reviews.Content: Samsung has become the Magnavox or RCA television of this HD era. They are the go to company for TVs and more.

Reviews.Title: Great for my bedroom
Reviews.Author: John R. Hermes
Reviews.Content: Bought for my new bedroom TV.  It's perfect for me.  I wanted the Samsung trusted name and it delivers.  Completely satisfied!

Reviews.Title: HE LOVES THAT TV
Reviews.Author: pm
Reviews.Content: My son just loves his new tv.  He previously had a little screen with bad picture and he's disabled, so no money to buy this.This and his chair, also bought from Amazon, are his Winter Solstice gifts.

Reviews.Title: samsung 32-inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Pamela Ferguson
Reviews.Content: This TV more than met my expectations. It was easy to set up and operate. I am not the most techy person but i have found it to be consistently simple to use.

Reviews.Title: Get This Item
Reviews.Author: Ernest carter
Reviews.Content: Love the t.v.! I believe it is way bigger then 32". It was a steal to me. I'm watching tv on it now, beautifully displays everything nice in HD or SD. I use it for tv, netflix, gaming and its loud so I play music

Reviews.Title: Good Simple TV
Reviews.Author: B. L. Richwine
Reviews.Content: My Wife and I were looking for a simple (non-smart) tv to replace our 32" tube Sony and this Samsung was perfect.Great picture and simple setup.Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: I love Samsung products.
Reviews.Author: Smashie
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my son as a Christmas gift. I think Samsung makes some great quality products so I was not hesitant to buy. The only thing I worried about was having a TV shipped to me. It was delivered with no issue at all.

Reviews.Title: Great price for a great TV
Reviews.Author: B. Thomas
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for a few months now and I love it.  I put it in our guest room because it is a perfect size for that.  My guests have been very happy to have it.  It really is a good TV and you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Best for the Buck
Reviews.Author: Bozewell
Reviews.Content: All of the reviews state this TV is one if not the top rated for its size.  Bought the same TV for my bedroom several years ago and have been completely satisfied.  Through Amazon one can never beat the price, the ease of ordering, the order tracking and the delivery expectation.

Reviews.Title: nice TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: no issues.  good sound and picture.  Installed as a secondary TV in the basement.  would buy again.  Nice Samsung TV

Reviews.Title: Great tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Ben Powers
Reviews.Content: Tv was as advertised, I use it as a second monitor, and the quality is great, although it has no audio out, the speakers suit me fine.

Reviews.Title: I love
Reviews.Author: Brizeida
Reviews.Content: Very good resolution, volume is pretty good. The menu is easy to use, elegant design. The children are happy with their new tv. Very good price quality.

Reviews.Title: Really nice TV, great picture, sound and other features
Reviews.Author: MIchael B "Want only the best; Take only the ...
Reviews.Content: My mother in law needed a new TV for her bedroom, and she had done without one for quite a while. So, she came to me and said that she was ready to buy another on as a Christmas gift to herself, and would I find a few that she could choose from. Naturally, I came to Amazon, and found about five different ones around the price that she wanted to pay, actually cheaper, and she picked this Samsung 32 inch LED, LCD, which has more features than she will ever use, but that's what you get these days. Since Amazon had a great deal going on their TV's during the holiday season, she was able to get a great price. The order was delivered within a few days, and she loves it. In fact, we cannot keep her out of her bedroom now. Nice TV.

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected
Reviews.Author: Banker lady
Reviews.Content: Easy to just plug in and go! Beautiful picture and I have no problems with the stand being too flimsy.It was a simple(for me that's something)screw in 4 screws and it holds perfectly! love it! Couldn't be happier....Worth every penny of just over $250.00.....

Reviews.Title: awesome picture
Reviews.Author: Steve w.
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture good sound just no audio outputs but that is not a major concern for me at this time ,

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my grandmother, she said the picture was a little blurry(wasn't watching in HD), the one time she  ever even notices its not an HD channel lol of course when she is checking out this new TV she notices all of a sudden. Good TV for the price, very easy set up.

Reviews.Title: Great T.v
Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: Great t.v and very claer pic.Good valve,and fast delivery.What else can i say.You wont regret this purchase..........Well worth 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: petethepackrat
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV b because I wanted a new TV for my game room to play video games, replacing my old box TV. This TV has been perfect so far. It provides excellent quality images (after buying a cheap HD cable at a nearby store) and the size is perfect - not too big that it strains my eyes if I sit too close and not too small so I can view everything on the screen. The TV is sleek and fits perfectly on my TV stand, taking up much less space than my box TV. It was very easy to set up, requiring only a screwdriver. I bought this before Christmas on amazon and it was the cheapest price than any of the black Friday or Christmas deals than any other stores (trust me, I did a lot of research). It shipped great and without any issues. I am very pleased with this product thus far. My only complaint is that the volume button is incredibly touchy and is difficult to adjust at times.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Russell's
Reviews.Content: Got this television for my folks for Christmas and they haven't stopped  raving about it! It's the perfect size for a smaller living room, not obtrusive, subdued, with clean lines and sharp features. No bells and whistles but nice for anyone who doesn't want to mess with a lot of cords, or new remotes etc. Easy to hook up external devices (VHS/DVD) and super user friendly. So happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Smart tv
Reviews.Author: Linda L. Alton
Reviews.Content: Love the quality...the price was great...and my usb drive loaded with music plays on this smart tv!  So enjoying it.

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Martin J. Blumenthal
Reviews.Content: Picture is crisp and clear and sound is good.I am using it in the living room as is, no surround sound, etc.This was a great buy at this sale price, to get Samsung quality.

Reviews.Title: gr8 gift
Reviews.Author: gus
Reviews.Content: bought this for my 90 year old mother as in introduction to HDTV....she is really enjoying it and you can't beat the price

Reviews.Title: Nice t.v.
Reviews.Author: Deborah B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this t.v. For our master bedroom. We love it. It was so easy to set up, and I'm not a tekki. It's light weight, has a great picture and sound. I feel we really scored when I chose this t.v. Very happy and would buy again!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003
Reviews.Author: F. Yancey "Road Rat"
Reviews.Content: This is the second Samsung TV I have purchased.  It has a great picture and come with a remote control.  Work great.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Rafael
Reviews.Content: This TV looks nice. Clean front. It is extremely light. The base feels sturdy and big enough to support the TV without risk of falling over. It was simple to put together with 8 screws in the base.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Lucinda Pueblos
Reviews.Content: It has a beautiful picture and it's very lightweight.  We take it outdoors to watch games when we have guests over.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Carmen Samuels
Reviews.Content: I just love my Samsung Brand. I would recommend this brand to just about anyone who would like to purchase a TV.

Reviews.Title: best possible
Reviews.Author: edgar boza
Reviews.Content: really good this samsung tv with your high definition quality leads alo Real fantasia of the best LED technology a good color and image definition resulting in excellent image quality 100% guaranteed delivered on time with a high level of responsibility simply excellent space samsung conquer my many thanks

Reviews.Title: Great Quality and simple set up!
Reviews.Author: Christina Fusco
Reviews.Content: This TV arrived quickly and exceeded my expectations. It's so simple to set up and within 5 minutes of opening the box, I was watching a show! Picture quality and volume are fantastic as well!

Reviews.Title: Great picture, sound and value
Reviews.Author: A. Quint
Reviews.Content: This is the second one we've bought.  We liked our first one enough that we got this as a gift for a cousin.  Sound is good,  design is sleek, and picture is excellent in both HD and non-HD.  Super energy saver - at the very bottom of the estimated operating costs ofsimilar models.  Doesn't have the bells and whistles of some sets, but if you're looking for a simple tv in a smaller size, can't see how you'd go wrong buying this one.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Vvillebob
Reviews.Content: Got this for the bedroom, to replace an old 20" tv. Just have it hooked to the cable direct, without a box. Gets very good HD reception on basic channels. Picture is perfect. Absolutely love it. Price was right, shipping was quick. No problems at all. No regrets.

Reviews.Title: Love this tv!
Reviews.Author: DaTarsha Roy
Reviews.Content: Just what was needed for the spare guest bedroom.  I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a new television as it is clear and looks great mounted on the wall.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Theodore Reich
Reviews.Content: It came perfectly delivered. Great picture. I have it in my guest bedroom and even brought it out on my back porch in the sun (In Florida) and it is perfect. Sound is just fine. It also came with a two year warranty, no need to buy an extended warranty, especially when it's in the spare bedrrom and will last years.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Zachary S. "Game On!"
Reviews.Content: As always, it shipped safely and earlier than expected. Just in time for the holidays. This is a great 720p LED tv. The blacks are deep and rich. The colors are vibrant. There are plenty of custom and preset video and audio settings to make it look and sound how you want. 2 HDMI IN. 1 Component IN. 1 USB port.I wish it had more than 2 HDMI-Ins because I have 3, and soon 4 pieces of hardware that use HDMI. A good splitter will take care of that problem, but it sucks to need one in the first place.The only other problem I have with this TV is there are no VGA or DVI-I connectors for computers, so I am currently unable to use my PC. That's not going to be cause for removing a star, though, because my PC is 6 years old and I will upgrade it's Video card and use HDMI, but if you have a PC with only VGA or DVI-I connectors, this TV might not be for you.

Reviews.Title: good television for the price
Reviews.Author: Occasional Cook
Reviews.Content: We have had this tv for about two months.  It was easy to set up and it has worked well.  The picture quality is not as great as I might have liked, but I can't complain for the price.  If you have a smaller space, this is a good solution.  The exterior is attractive.  I am hoping for a long run with it!  I might even buy another.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: NTB
Reviews.Content: Good quality tv set, and the picture is crisp and sound is good .  It is light weight and was easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Merle H. Schmidt
Reviews.Content: I was forced to buy a nice new tv for my exercise room.  I picked out an inexpensive one since I am not into electronics.  To my surprise it is excellent!  Great picture, easy to figure out the remote, and sound is good.  I am very happy with my purchase.  I may even consider replacing my old, heavy analog tv's with similar new ones that weigh nothing and have a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Gift to my mom and she loves it.
Reviews.Author: Jack Marden
Reviews.Content: She has a small studio and doesn't sit far.  The quality for the price is awesome.  Samsungs and Sharps are the best tv's in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Okay for the money. Not very good picture
Reviews.Author: N.Sanders
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my son for Christmas. For a kids; the T.V it is ok, but I would not use it in our main room or family room. The picture quality is poor!

Reviews.Title: Met Expectations for a Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Meredith Pinkham
Reviews.Content: The picture is typical Samsung quality and I was actually surprised how good it was for standard definition. The TV is light and easy to install with a wall mount. I have nothing bad to say about this TV. It was also a good value, a little more ($30) expensive than the value brands of the same class, but I've always had good luck with Samsung and I'm glad I went with it rather than rolling the dice on a value brand.

Reviews.Title: A Great TVFor The Price
Reviews.Author: Green225 "Chef Wannabe"
Reviews.Content: This TV is in our exercise room and is perfect for those long rides on the Lifecycle. Despite what a couple of reviews state, I think in this price range the sound/speaker quality is above average and suits our needs just fine. Picture is spot on with a little tinkering of the factory presets. I would not hesitate to buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Television
Reviews.Author: 24/7 Mom "Val"
Reviews.Content: Like the quality of picture.  Had to adjust color from default settings though as sometimes the greens were really, really green but after playing with the color controls was able to get a color quality that I can live with.  Thanks

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom tv
Reviews.Author: S. Ovadia "TiVoVaDiA"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tv for my daughters bedroom and it truly delivers.  Picture quality is amazing and the sound is sufficient.

Reviews.Title: Lives up to research
Reviews.Author: Lisa Gering
Reviews.Content: Good set up instructions. Easy to follow. Tv has perfect picture and sound. Could not be more pleased.This is primary household set with a lot of usage and so was important that it be right.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Charles Hance
Reviews.Content: Good TV and video, no shipping issues. This TV was easy to assembly and set up. Only issue was it did not have the samsung Anynet+ feature to sync with other Samsung devices.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV if you don't need 1080
Reviews.Author: Boiler98
Reviews.Content: Overall excellent TV. We use it in our workout room so 720p was totally sufficient. I used to hate Samsung but have to say they make the best TV's these days. And yes they do charge a bit more but I have found it to be worth the small extra amount.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: pra4snw
Reviews.Content: I don't have much to say about it except that it was a great deal and works and looks better than expected.You can never go wrong with a Samsung, in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture!
Reviews.Author: Mary Beth Potamkin
Reviews.Content: Very nice sharp picture!  Purchased a wall mount on amazon and the tv really makes the guest room, "all that"!  Amazon is a great way to shop!

Reviews.Title: Amazing quality, great price
Reviews.Author: AmazonPrSubscriberAday
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on Amazon because of the amazing price. Samsung brand has a reputation for making quality televisions, and this purchase only reinforces that image. The TV is large, image quality is very good, was easy to set up, and best of all- the price is unbelievable.

Reviews.Title: Good one but not good with external HDMI input
Reviews.Author: MKN
Reviews.Content: The product is good and very light. It doesn't have screen protecting glass. So its not advised for homes with kids like mine. Also when I connect with my computer, the picture breaks and not enjoyable. Other wise it works perfect with my streaming device and cable.

Reviews.Title: Love Everything Samsung!
Reviews.Author: nonsensely
Reviews.Content: Never had any problems with anything from Samsung.  Nice little TV for my workout room/loft.  Great pic, as only Samsung has.  This is my fourth (and smallest and most basic) Samsung TV, and I'll never buy another brand.  Now if only the crappy sony blue-ray player worked, I'd be all set to get fit with Jillian!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: Yvonne D. Towns
Reviews.Content: Has a great picture.  Easy to use, Nice and sleek, looks good in any room.  Would recommend this set to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: L. Huffman
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my Dad, his first flat screen.  The picture is crisp and the sound is good.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality is great for the price
Reviews.Author: HelloAmazon
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a gift and the recipient loves it. The picture quality for an inexpensive TV is unbelievable.

Reviews.Title: great buy for the money..
Reviews.Author: Lola Baker
Reviews.Content: TV is great, awesome picture. would recommend buying it. price was best I could find.this is a good deal for me

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Derek
Reviews.Content: TV works great for video games and shows. Excellent picture. Good design. Exactly what I expected when I ordered this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Dennis E Robinson JR
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for the price. Very much love this TV. Using it exclusively with my Google Chromecast right now, and have yet to encounter a problem.

Reviews.Title: What a price!
Reviews.Author: Tired of Graffiti
Reviews.Content: Those who waited for the price to fall will be happy now.  This is an excellent deal on a great TV!

Reviews.Title: meets all expectations
Reviews.Author: neatfreak
Reviews.Content: Purchased for my 92 year old mother, with the size determined by the place it would be positioned.  She is very pleased with the bright sharp picture and sound. Prior to purchasing I sought info on the remote and was told the size of buttons is somewhat larger than most others and that the screen menu is relatively easy to use.  Both features seemed appropriate for my mother, and she has no problem with the remote.

Reviews.Title: Lives up to Samsung name!
Reviews.Author: Beth J. Stevens
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV on a recommendation from my nephew that it is the best basic set on the market.  The resolution is teriffic and it is very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Good quality, affordable and fast shipping.....
Reviews.Author: Stalynh
Reviews.Content: Very good quality of the product and at a very affordable price.... I'm very satisfy with the buy... I will buy again...

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: go_kendra
Reviews.Content: Its excacly how I thought it would be nice sound and picture and size I use it for my bedroom I use a HDMI connection from my laptop works great

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: cdf
Reviews.Content: Awesome picture and very easy to set up and install. Only wish i had bought another one for the living room.

Reviews.Title: WORST SOUND
Reviews.Author: B Mac "B Mac"
Reviews.Content: QUITE SIMPLY THE WORST SOUNDING TV WITH LIMITED OPTIONS TO UPGRADE. GREAT PICTURE THOUGH, I RETURNED IT AND GOT VIZIO

Reviews.Title: satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Mason
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality and arrived in perfect condition. I am very satisfied with this purchase and will be purchasing another one.

Reviews.Title: fantastic!!
Reviews.Author: Gabe gaslin
Reviews.Content: I had read reviews, some good some bad-of course! the bad  results I say:"read the instructions"it will tell you EXACTLY now tp correct any issue. Sometimes irs just a LOOSE NUT behind the wheel

Reviews.Title: met spec'
Reviews.Author: Denis Male
Reviews.Content: I searched for TVs within this price range and took a bet on this one.The sound is not so great but it is okay for home use. The picture is good and it also looks great!

Reviews.Title: Incredibly pleased with this tv
Reviews.Author: Christopher Jaggie
Reviews.Content: Tremendous price for an outstanding picture- I searched long and hard and this was by far the best option out there for the lowest price in this size class.  Sound is perfect for a modest living room or a bedroom.  While it is a flat panel, note that it is several inches thick- but you have to give up perks somewhere to get that kind of prices and performance. I would highly recommend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Judith M. Dalrymple
Reviews.Content: I love the TV itself but the sound is softer than other TV's I've had.  You have to turn it up a bit more to hear it clearly.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and lightweight.
Reviews.Author: Deanna Silguero
Reviews.Content: It was delivered on time and in good condition.  It was a gift and was set up after christmas with no problems. Picture is great and easy to program.

Reviews.Title: Samsung rocks
Reviews.Author: Edjeep
Reviews.Content: With all of the black Friday sales being thrown at me Im glad I used a little common sense and went with what I know to be a solid reliable brand.

Reviews.Title: not clear picture.
Reviews.Author: catjc
Reviews.Content: The picture is not as clear as it could be. Have a Magnavox (same size, similar price) and the picture is very clear.This was a disappointment  for this reason as it was for my 90 year old mother to use.

Reviews.Title: Grandchildren's Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Jose M. Lara
Reviews.Content: My grandchildren love it and don't have to wait until the grownups finish watching their shows, so they can watch their cartoons.Best gift they've gotten; their words; not mine.

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves it!
Reviews.Author: Chrys Barnes
Reviews.Content: Granted, this TV was a gift that was shipped directly to my daughter so I haven't personally seen it in action.  She tells me, however, that she loves it.  The picture is sharp, the colors are beautiful.  It is hooked up to her laptop so that she and her boyfriend can download movies and shows to watch on a full-sized screen.  Thumbs up!

Reviews.Title: The perfect TV!
Reviews.Author: Ms. Donna
Reviews.Content: Easy to install.  Perfect out of the box.  Excellent clarity and sound. I am so happy I purchased this TV.

Reviews.Title: What an easy great purchase!
Reviews.Author: ShopperCleveland
Reviews.Content: Techie friend at work told me about the cyber monday specials and I needed a new t.v.  He grabbed my phone, ordered it in 5 minutes and in 3 days it was delivered!  Took 5 minutes to un-box and hook up to my Roku and I was off and surfing.  Great picture, light weight, good sound, all for $220.00!  I could not be happier.  Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Seems like a great tv at a great price
Reviews.Author: condomax
Reviews.Content: Owned this one for 6 months or more.  Everything works great.  Clear picture, good sound, easy remote.  It's in a bedroom about 4 feet from the end of the bed.  Clear picture is easy to see and size is adequate but not a "large" screen experience.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Bedroom
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: This TV is without a doubt a worthy buy. As i am writing this very post ive already experienced a month of playing games and watching shows on this tv with crystal clear display. You get as much bang for your buck with this tv

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Danielle Clifford
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my father, he loves the picture quality! He says it is even better than the more expensive TV he has in the living room. I am considering buying another one for my mom.

Reviews.Title: great for me -- and probably anyone else who isn't a TV expert
Reviews.Author: Todd W
Reviews.Content: This TV is perfectly fine for me. It's not a "smart" TV, but I like the picture. The price was much cheaper than TVs with similar specifications. People have told me I should have a higher Hz rate for watching football, etc., but this 60Hz has been fine for me. It has also worked as a second monitor screen for my laptop (via HDMI) when I wanted to use a web browser on it instead of the Youtube app or the web browser in my Blu-ray player. (This TV does not come with an HDMI cable; the cheap ~$6 Amazon one worked fine and is the best deal I've seen out there for HDMI cables.) (If you're wondering about size, I now understand what people say about 32" really being the smallest flat screen that still looks good as a TV for a small living room.)

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Jackie Jacobs
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd  32  inch samsung  we have purchased, like them, only problem is sound could be better, a little tnney, but the picture is great.  Shold be a 4 and a half rating.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Harley
Reviews.Content: Tv is for my kids room love it for them great picture and it's not bulky so it's perfect for the stand and place I have it placed in

Reviews.Title: great purchase.
Reviews.Author: Bobbie
Reviews.Content: Just the right size and color is dramatic. Prime discounts just an added extra. Light weight for ease in setting up and moving.

Reviews.Title: Family
Reviews.Author: maybe retired
Reviews.Content: Great purchase. Fits ideally on book shelf. The family loves it and at the right size and easy on the eyes.

Reviews.Title: No headphone jack
Reviews.Author: Rosie
Reviews.Content: This tv came and I was very happy with it except that it has no headphone jack. That seems like a bad thing to cut. Otherwise it was great.

Reviews.Title: Merry Christmas
Reviews.Author: Sheray K. Jones
Reviews.Content: I am a Samsung fan. This was a Christmas present to myself. I love the television and the price was unbeatable.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Linda Johnson
Reviews.Content: This hdtv is great.  The picture is very clear.  The sound is ok.  The price was very nice.  I would recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Great TV! Color and sound is perfect, the HD looks great. Great quality TV for a lower price. 100% recommended.

Reviews.Title: Verdict: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Wayne Willis
Reviews.Content: The Samsung UN32EH4003 is an outstanding HDTV.  I didn't have to adjust anything.  After my favorite satellite company made the proper connections and the set was powered on--perfection!  The blacks are black, the whites are white, and all the other colors would make Crayola proud.  Oh yes, the sound is outstanding as well.

Reviews.Title: Great TV For The Price
Reviews.Author: M. Rolle
Reviews.Content: I got this tv on sale during Black Friday I really like it. It's lightweight and setting it up was easy. The picture's clear and the sound's crisp you can adjust the settings to whatever you like. What I also like about this tv is that it has a game mode for gamers like myself it makes gaming that much better.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my need
Reviews.Author: RB "RB"
Reviews.Content: I am no technology expert, so will keep my review short. The package was extremely light weight (took me while to be sure that there was a TV in it), it was easy to assemble the TV, the picture quality is amazing and is perfect for a small room where the distance from the couch to the TV is not more than 10-12 feet.

Reviews.Title: My X-Mas experience
Reviews.Author: tony cancino
Reviews.Content: the picture is great but the base seems loose so the tv is a little wobbly. that concerns me, but other than that it is awesome. the only problem I had this x-mas was the video game I ordered first for my youngest son did not come in for x-mas and i tried amazon prime. I know it was ups that messed up, but it happened to him two years in a row. Not from Amazon last year, but it still sucked for him and I. the UPS person i talked to was certainly dealing with many irate customers, but did not have to hang up on me and say it was Amazons fault. specially when I work for Amazon.com Phx5, which she did not know

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Laura Dulaney
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for our guest room and to hook up our Wii game system.  The picture quality is good and the features are easy to use.  The power button is slightly awkward to use on the unit itself. There is a center button to push and then you have to four points to push depending on what you want to do (power on/off, menu, etc).

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Tom Betz
Reviews.Content: Product arrived promptly, TV works great, picture quality is fabulous, I would recommend this to anyone looking for a mid-size TV on a budget without compromising quality.Thanks again ,Tom

Reviews.Title: good picture, good sound, nice to look at
Reviews.Author: Ruth Bittorf
Reviews.Content: This TV provides what I was hoping for when I purchased it. The price was okay and the quality what I was hoping for.

Reviews.Title: Samsung flat screen
Reviews.Author: richard a corona
Reviews.Content: Very good tv for the price.  It was setup and working in fifteen minutes. The picture and sound are above average.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Mikaele
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a new TV for my guest room/office. After shopping around, I found this one on Amazon.com.  Samsung is my brand of choice for TV's and I have 3 of them. Great color, sharpness and features. I needed the 32" to fit in a particular space and this one is just right. Good deal, good quality and I'm pleased.

Reviews.Title: TV stand
Reviews.Author: Brittaney Hanratty
Reviews.Content: The tv itself is great and in good condition but however I was sent the wrong stand for it. So I have to prop it against the wall...

Reviews.Title: Holy Galactic Lords of Thunder
Reviews.Author: thomas
Reviews.Content: This is like a futuristic TV sent from the heavens to conquer all of mankind. To grasp every male out there by their eye balls and have them glued down to the couch on Sundays. To make sure men get a break from the women in their lives and help restore peace on this planet for men every where. In other words this TV is pretty good.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Gloria Goelz
Reviews.Content: I purchased it as a Christmas present to my daughter and she was so happy to have such a good television

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Michael Pipersburgh
Reviews.Content: Can't complain about the my t.v at all! The figure that i love the most is the sound quality its really nice.

Reviews.Title: B/B- rating
Reviews.Author: Tamiyal Goodman
Reviews.Content: Great 720p picture as I come to expect from Samsung. However, with exception to the monitor, everything else has a cheap feel and look to it. Maybe this is what all the tvs have come to today. My first time purchasing a new tv since my 42" Sony Bravia purchase 5 years ago. I guess my standards were set very high as a result. Maybe this is just what you get when you spend less than $300 on a set. Not only do you get minimal inputs, but not much goes into to the quality of contruction.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: Deborah Edwards
Reviews.Content: This is a good TV for the price.  I have been very satisfied with the picture and the sound.  We use it in our bedroom as a second TV in our home.

Reviews.Title: Only real problem is NO Audio jacks to hook up speakers, surround sound or sound bar!!
Reviews.Author: Dmarie
Reviews.Content: I really love this TV picture & price is fantastic.  But am baffled as to why no audio jack is on this TV.  I didn't think they made TV's without a audio jack for hooking up speakers, surround sound or sound bar.  Great TV but wish it had ability to add audio

Reviews.Title: samsung television
Reviews.Author: Stacey Murray
Reviews.Content: So far no problems with anything has a great picture. We received it when we were supposed to and she was very pleased with it

Reviews.Title: Good basic flat screen, HD TV
Reviews.Author: R. Dils
Reviews.Content: Light wt., good picture, easy to set up.  Would have been nice if it had a slot for a flash memory card .  Otherwise works well as our bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money
Reviews.Author: chuckybuss
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with this set. I reviewed several different makes and models from here and best buy. This was the best bang for the buck. Samsung is a good name brand and while there were others cheaper I had never heard of the brands so was well worth the 20-30 more dollars to go with a proven brand name.

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: bjsaus
Reviews.Content: Great price for a 32" tv.. A very good picture, havent hocked it up to HD CABLE BOX yet. When I do It should be a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN 32EH4003 32-Inch TV
Reviews.Author: Martin Sandidge
Reviews.Content: This is a no frills basic TV with very small speaker which delivers only average audio quality.  Since this TV has no audio out capability, there is no way to connect it to an external speaker system or headphones in order to improve the quality of the audio received.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" for Mom in Nursing Home
Reviews.Author: KatB
Reviews.Content: This was just perfect, the installation was easy, the TV has a great picture, with easily adjusted closed captions. And, the price could not be beat!

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: robin insley
Reviews.Content: Great picture.  The only thing that I would change is to have a sleep timer on the remote versus having to gi through the menu.

Reviews.Title: Samsung happy
Reviews.Author: C. Myers
Reviews.Content: Purchased our Samsung 32" LED TV on black Friday at an exceptional price.  TV arrived quickly and was easy to set up.  Picture quality is exceptional.  This was one of the best purchases I have made on Amazon!  Highly recommend this TV for your viewing.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32in tv
Reviews.Author: lariat2020 "lariat2020"
Reviews.Content: We needed a small TV.  Our 3 year old Samsung plasma in our den has been trouble free and influenced the reason for considering a Samsung LED for the bedroom.  Only having it for a month all I can say is that the color is superb and I find the sound quality excellent.

Reviews.Title: great pic
Reviews.Author: PAT
Reviews.Content: It's not our primary TV but great for the Grand kids when they stay over. always like dealing with Amazon

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Lisa Meier
Reviews.Content: Works well! Super quality and price. Easy to use and great for both of my daughter's rooms. Glad I bought

Reviews.Title: Nice size for my bedroom
Reviews.Author: Carl
Reviews.Content: This set is just right to replace my older, smaller TV. The only real gripe I have is my old set had an audio out for speakers, and this one doesn't, I am stuck with the internal speakers/ They are not all that bad, but I got used to the less tinny sound and better bass. Other than that, even the lower resolution and slower refresh rate aren't as noticable as I expected.

Reviews.Title: Poor info
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: Vague and poor information to understand how to connect the TV to other devices like PC etc. the TV is good but if you are going to buy one be sure you have ALL that is required to make it function properly, I have made at least 10 trips to electronic stores and the result is still not great "cause Im not an expert in connecting TV to other sources. Sound is the mayor problem

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: Jennifer S
Reviews.Content: This Tv is great but please understand the size at 32 inches. It is very small and good for gaming in a small size space. Very lite to carry too!

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV for Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: donald stone
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality, easy to install, and great price. The TV arrived well before Christmas. Who could ask for more?

Reviews.Title: Great picture but....
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: The small plastic peice behind the TV that kind of holds and clicks on the plat forum to stand the tv broke very easily. I would be careful. Because now the tv is slanted to the right and it bothers me.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV
Reviews.Author: Brenda
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas present for my wife.  She likes to watch TV while in the kitchen.  We had an old 19" in there for years.  This is so much better.  She can actually see it while she is preparing food.  We also use it to watch the news while eating dinner.  My wife also likes to watch it while she is doing crafts at the kitchen table.  All in all, a good buy, but we have not had it that long.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV!
Reviews.Author: quiltlady
Reviews.Content: When my 9 year old TV bit the dust just after Thanksgiving, I immediately began doing research to replace it.  I read reviews,talked to neighbors, and went to Walmart and other stores to see what my options were.  Samsung consistently got the highest ratings, but Amazon had the best price.  I placed my order and my new TV arrived 3 days later, just in time for the holidays!  Afriend came over and got it set up for me.  It worked perfectly and is still working great a month later!.  The color is great, the sound is great, and I am enjoying all of the special holiday programs and football games.  I couldn't be more pleased with my choice!Thank you, Amazon, for the prompt service and the great product!

Reviews.Title: LOOOOVE it
Reviews.Author: Ms Pamela Lee White
Reviews.Content: This was my Christmas present too me.I was proud of myself because I assembled the  pieces by myself. The instructions were clear enough for a child to follow. And I love Samsung products.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32-inch un32EH4003
Reviews.Author: Chuck L.
Reviews.Content: Extremely satisfied with picture and over-all performance. First flat screen purchase other than small one in kitchen. Always have been satisfied with Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV!!
Reviews.Author: Teach40
Reviews.Content: Very good picture quality. Easy set up. Light and slim. Great buy! It is the perfect size for a cozy family room.

Reviews.Title: awsome
Reviews.Author: john aeverman
Reviews.Content: love it great picture easy to hook up and program also ease of use of the remote control is good

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Brian Bradshaw
Reviews.Content: A very good television. Looks very crisp and clear. Got it for my girlfriend and she loves it for her bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Over all It is pretty good.
Reviews.Author: Mitchell C.
Reviews.Content: Everything is great but the cord that plugs in the back. It doesnt stay in all the time, and is sometime annoying.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture.
Reviews.Author: Rangergirl
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for a bedroom to replace an old 19". I thought it would be too big but it isn't. It is lightweight, easy to set up, and the picture is fantastic. I love Samsung generally, but this TV is great. It isn't a "smart" TV, but not everyone needs those if you're not a gamer or you don't do a lot of internet-related stuff on your TV. The bezel is thin and attractive--looks more like a picture frame.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Vavaca
Reviews.Content: Good bedroom TV.  Did not waste each inch, light, and easy to use.  Gteat pictures and sound.  Very easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: It's okay, not great, but not bad.
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: This was a quick fix to replace a broken Samsung LCD 32" tv. So my comparison is based off that.Pros: This LED has very vibrant colors and doesn't noticeably suffer from the "ghosting" affect with dark movies, sports, or video games.Cons: The image is no where near as sharp and crisp as I was expectingMy old LCD out of the box settings were beautiful, crisp and very sharp. With this LED tv i can't seem to duplicate the beautiful HD quality of my old LCD tv even though the color on this LED tv is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Frank "Squidder"
Reviews.Content: Considering I was around for black and white TV, I'm still amazed and even more so with reduced size and weight. We have several Samsung TV's and are very happy with their performance and purchased them based on other reviewers options so thank you.

Reviews.Title: Love the tv!!
Reviews.Author: Lawro "OMG"
Reviews.Content: This a great Tv for gamers, like me, but I don't really care about the sound like everyone says about it because i only use my headsets for listening.

Reviews.Title: Great for the Price.
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I was curious & sceptical prior to purchasing this tv due to not seeing & testing this model before buying it. However after reading the reviews from past purchasers I went ahead & ordered it & let me tell you it arrived in 4 days & workks awesome.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG TV
Reviews.Author: keith van meter
Reviews.Content: First it arrived within the time frame a promised.  I was a gift for my daughter.  set up very easy and she loves it.  All of my TV's are Samsung and hve been very happy except for some sound issues.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Yesenia Vargas
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my daughter's room and she loves it. The picture quality is fantastic! The sound is very good as well.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: R. Manizza
Reviews.Content: Works Great. Just what I was looking for. Very nice screen quality for the price. Easy setup right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Brand Loyal
Reviews.Author: Dwight Edwards
Reviews.Content: This is my third samsung television. I have always loved the brand and will be loyal to the brand. Has never been disappointed with my purchase. By the way all three televisions are still functioning.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: one shot
Reviews.Content: Works great the picture is very clear would purchase again . We have another samsung but it is not a LED and you can see the different

Reviews.Title: For my parents
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my parents to watch in their bedroom.  Color, saturation and hue was pretty good.  Overall the picture quality is very good.  For the price it is well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Ken"
Reviews.Content: As long as you remember that you are getting a 60hz tv in a smaller size and don't expect 1080, 120 performance it is just fine.

Reviews.Title: Good Basic TV
Reviews.Author: Sean Sharma
Reviews.Content: Happy with the purchase, energy efficient, good picture, easy to install and set up, and good for our exercise room.  Would recommend to others.
