Reviews.Title: Clear picture , sturdy build without being too heavy.
Reviews.Author: Ramzi
Reviews.Content: My brother uses this TV  just to watch cable. We connected it using an HDMI cable, which provides a clear and optimal picture. I have no complains the price is fair and got what I needed out of a TV for my brother.

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv
Reviews.Author: clay
Reviews.Content: I use this tv everyday and it has a great display and works perfectly. I would most certainly recommend this product!

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: TK
Reviews.Content: Very nice tv for the size . Good picture & the sound is ok for a bedroom. I like the weight, it is easy to move . It has good stable stand.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't live with the sound
Reviews.Author: F. Woodard
Reviews.Content: Returned the tv after two days because I just could not put up with that  " tinny "  sound. It was awful. I never really expected a big Boom Box sound but this was rediculous. The picture was fair. No other complaints.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased buyer
Reviews.Author: Butterfly man
Reviews.Content: It arrive sooner than i thought. It is really lightweight with clear picture and sound. Very pleased with my purchase and would reccommend to all interested people thinking about making a purchase.

Reviews.Title: A great tv at a great price
Reviews.Author: Duane Ressler
Reviews.Content: I am a big fan of Samsung products.  This LED HDTV provides a great picture and was easyto set up.  I have seen this same TV in stores and in ads and none of them have had a lowerprice.  This is not our main TV but the picture is as good as any other I have watched.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG STILL TOP OF THE LINE
Reviews.Author: Richard E. Lane "LANER1"
Reviews.Content: TOP QUALATY TV for any potential buyer. We have this model installed on our bedroom wall and have enjoyed many hours watching without any problems ECELLENT picture and Sound Quality. Recommend. Rick

Reviews.Title: Super buy
Reviews.Author: lstntme
Reviews.Content: I needed to upgrade to flat screen so I could gain room space. This set was a super good choice and value.

Reviews.Title: Comments on Samsung 32" TV
Reviews.Author: A. J. Landry
Reviews.Content: Well pleased with Samsung 32" TV.  But, instructions were lacking I found!  Did not give instructions on how to set alarms and a few other things.  Had to call Samsung to learn how to do this.Delivery was on time and in good condition.

Reviews.Title: Samsung upholds tradition of quality.
Reviews.Author: Curmudgeon
Reviews.Content: My third Samsung TV upholds my high opinion of Samsung acquired over several years now.  Picture quality, color, brightness are perfect. Sound is as good as my 42" HD  'Sammy'. I am way ahead of the curve in quality satisfaction.

Reviews.Title: Flat screen
Reviews.Author: Bajarick
Reviews.Content: Picture is great ,easy to hook up .I use it for HD antenna stations .If one has a weak signal the TV has to be reprogrammed to pick that station up again ,other than that it has met my expectations

Reviews.Title: Good value.
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Randall
Reviews.Content: This TV was for my mother-in-law who really likes the picture quality.  I liked the modest price.  This was a good value.

Reviews.Title: Superior Television.
Reviews.Author: AJAU05
Reviews.Content: Wonderful picture.  Be aware that all of the inputs are on the back of the unit so use a wall mount that extends the television farther from the wall.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for 720P
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the price. Very good picture even though it's only 720P. Stand that comes with it is sufficient but the wall mount I purchased with it, even makes it look better.Would buy again.

Reviews.Title: vary happy with this tv
Reviews.Author: James Newman
Reviews.Content: so far so good just got my tv, looks and sounds great.  vary easy to set up looks bigger than 32 inc. glad I went with this oneas you can hook up your dvd player and other things I got this tv just to be a tv and dvd player and again glad I went with this oneit all so got here quick, another good thing.

Reviews.Title: Great Bedroom/Spare TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: C. Vacanti
Reviews.Content: Got this during the Black Friday sale and for the price this is a great TV.  Got it for the bedroom and could not be happier.  It is light and easy to hang, picture for this price range is good.  Sound could be better, as the speakers are on the rear, but not bad by any means and acceptable for what it is being used for.  This is not a TV you want for your main entertainment center. But for the money you can't do much better for a bedroom/spare TV.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Personal TV
Reviews.Author: Brandon Spadory
Reviews.Content: Bought this model 12 months ago and have enjoyed it so much I just bought another model this past weekend. the 32 inch is perfect for what I used it for: gaming (360 & PS3), watching sports and the occasionally television show. My Blu Ray's look great. TV picture is always clear, tends to look a little better with less light in room though. Don't buy if you're thinking this will provide picture to a large family room, I use it simply for my dorm at school and bed room at home (both of which are small spaces). Have yet to try next gen gaming on this TV so I can't say how it looks. Great price for a great brand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV; stand is steady.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Very nice! Excellent price and picture quality.  Two of the reviews said the tv tilts in one direction and the other has a wobbly base.  Well, I almost didn't get it but then I went to the store and looked at it.  Can't imagine how it is wobbly or tilted unless they didn't connect the 2 pieces of the base together properly. The base is two pieces snapped and screwed into place together and then the tv is screwed to the base with 4 screws. And the two pieces of the base has an insert that seats them properly together. It was easy to do. Mine does not wobble or tilt.  I am glad I went and checked it out.  I am so happy with this tv.  And Samsung has wonderful tech support for their products.  The guy at Samsung told me they give tech support for the life of any of their products; contact them to see if that is still true.  Should be, it was only 6 months ago that he told me that for another Samsung product. Standard warranty is a year, but if you register on line, they are giving 3 extra months right now.  And the Amazon extended warranty is less expensive than the store.  Thanks Samsung, I love my tv!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Bradley Lee
Reviews.Content: I like the size and the ease of set up.  The Samsung picture is great and exactly what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: fine tv
Reviews.Author: thomas w, hickey
Reviews.Content: excellent tv for the price;;no issues at all but note you cannot hook up external speaker systems directly to it.  if you have a stereo and speakers and a cable box you can plug the red and white directly into the cable box if the box has it and use the hdmi from the tv to the cable box

Reviews.Title: Samsung flat screen
Reviews.Author: Glenn L. Mattox Jr.
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace the large tv we had in the bedroom, have been satisfied with it so far

Reviews.Title: My Flat Screen
Reviews.Author: Fine1952
Reviews.Content: I had to go buy a HDMI cable cord. This piece of equipment should have been included.-- other than that the tv is great!

Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS.
Reviews.Author: Jeremy Lessard
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great! Speakers in TV work wonderful, even when turned up high. No crackling. Settings are easy to adjust for personal preference. Great for gaming, and movies. outstanding color dynamics.Well worth it!

Reviews.Title: FELICITACIONES
Reviews.Author: johnny
Reviews.Content: VERY GOOD CARE, THANKS TO KEEP ESPEREO ASI AND TAKE INTO ACCOUNT FOR NEXT SHOPPING ... GREETINGS AND MANY SUCCESSES

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: TimMd
Reviews.Content: I was hoping the 780P would not be an issue and it is not with the smaller size screen, the HD picture quality is fine. The sound is a little flat but I guess it is due to the small amp and speakers.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV's are the best!!
Reviews.Author: Tx Mimi
Reviews.Content: Great TV for our updated guest room! Great picture & just perfect for our space! Up & running in minutes!! Awesome!

Reviews.Title: cool
Reviews.Author: Jhon Hernandez-LEC-005250
Reviews.Content: nice, this is  one of  the best tv. i like it very much.burda de bueno lo recomiendo a ojos cerrados, un tiro al piso.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture Qaulity
Reviews.Author: Informed Consumer
Reviews.Content: Got this tv for my dad as a gift for his birthday. He put it up in his man cave and ive been able to watch football with him in HD for the first time and WOW is it great!. the picture is clear and the sound is great.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Kelly Engelhorn
Reviews.Content: It's been great! Nice tv fir the boys room. He uses for hoc X-box. Bought with his own money. No complaints

Reviews.Title: Great buy!
Reviews.Author: Amy B. Dawson "amydawson90"
Reviews.Content: With so many tvs out in the market these days, Samsung makes an easy choice.  The TV arrived unblemished and quickly.  Packaged perfectly, and has a crystal clear view.  This is in my sons bedroom and at this price, will order another for the guest room.  Easy set up.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: sandy
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the picture quality. For the money it is the best TV I have owned. Would purchase another one for my second bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Very Good TV for Price
Reviews.Author: jwz, rochelle
Reviews.Content: Although far from perfect, the TV has performed well. Easy set-up and looks nice also. I would recommend the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Paul Marguglio
Reviews.Content: TV was what I expected.I haven't hooked it up as of yet but it looks really good.The price was decent and will make a great Christmas gift.Yes, I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HD
Reviews.Author: kevin beresford
Reviews.Content: very good flat screen  HDTV. It has all kinds of picture setup features. This make a great first flat screen TV.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: mary t. obre
Reviews.Content: Needed a larger screen (had only 22 inch before) in a bedroom and this TV worked out very, very good.  Great product, Samsung has a very good rating and I can see why.  Would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Allen A Anderson II
Reviews.Content: Good reliable tv for children, great price, can withstad games, dvd and child punishment.  Well worth the price and stable picture.

Reviews.Title: Loved It!
Reviews.Author: Nina
Reviews.Content: I'm not an audio-visual enthusiast or anything, so I can't give you specifics, but the picture is clear and the sound is great.  The TV itself is sleek and pretty too.  I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: TV ~
Reviews.Author: Kimberley Cash
Reviews.Content: I didn't know whether I should buy a TV from overseas or not but I'm really glad that I did. It's perfect.

Reviews.Title: This is a great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Colors are great and vivid.  This is a spare bedroom wall-mounted TV with the Google Chromecast device incorporated.  We are very happy with the performance.. Thanks

Reviews.Title: can't beat it
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Looking for a TV that isn't s***, but not expensive... Here you go... My mom wanted a TV but couldn't afford it.  She went to Walmart and called me that a no-name brand was this price and for a 24".  I saw this, read other reviews, and it was simple.Shipping... My prime took care of me here sending it to Florida.  I live in Alaska, and my prime membership seems to screw me more than help me.  My mom got it in FL in 3 days.  She who is older now, hooked it right up, and was lost in NCIS....  Thanks Samsung...Love my Samsung TV, Note 3, and Galaxy gear watch....

Reviews.Title: Definately not a plasma TV.
Reviews.Author: Mick
Reviews.Content: I bought this highly rated 32" Samsung LED TV to replace a Panasonic 26" plasma TV. I intended on giving the Panasonic plasma to my nephew as a house warming gift. After reading the reviews on Amazon I thought the Samsung would be a suitable replacement and it was 6 inches larger. Boy was I ever wrong. The speakers sound really tinny and I was not able to adjust the video to a life like appearance. I was able to adjust the video to an acceptable level but it would change when I changed the channel. I did like the led backlighting on this particular model though. The Samsung was surprisingly light in weight as well. The TV was excellently priced on Amazon as usual.Bottom line is my nephew is getting the new Samsung led and I am keeping the Panasonic plasma for myself. You cannot beat a Panasonic plasma TV so just bite the bullet and spring for a plasma...you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Balty
Reviews.Content: read some negative concerns about not being able to attach other sound units and it was not true. attached my DVD player.

Reviews.Title: my samsung it is a very good i will like to get a Bigger one to everyone it is the best on the market
Reviews.Author: stephanie mckenzie
Reviews.Content: First I love the sound it makes when it comes on, the picture quality is unbelievable, the sound is awesome,and if I had to get another TV it would be a Samsung  smart TV, and perhaps a 42 or 60'' .I enjoy TV and I thoroughly enjoy my Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Jared Johnson
Reviews.Content: You won't find a better TV for this price, nice picture right out of the box, perfect for the bed room.

Reviews.Title: Easy Set Up
Reviews.Author: FelineFriend
Reviews.Content: I have only had the tv for 2 days....but so far, so good.  It was very easy to set up the stand--eight screws requiring a Philips head screwdriver.  When you turn on the tv for the first time, the menu pops up so you can make adjustments to picture and audio.  The menu will disappear after a couple of minutes, if you don't interact with it.  But, there is a "Menu" button on the remote control, so you can take care of your adjustments later if you wish.I will write more about this tv when I have had it a bit longer.  But, overall, if you are looking for a tv that doesn't have to have all the bells and whistles, that has good picture and sound quality, then this is the tv for you.  I am using this 32" television in my living room.  Samsung has a good reputation and I fully expect this set to live up to it.

Reviews.Title: I love my new TV.
Reviews.Author: Roberts Smits
Reviews.Content: I love my new TV. It was everything I expected and more. It's just great for my dorm room at boarding school.

Reviews.Title: Very good quality picture and sound, but...
Reviews.Author: Michelle McKone
Reviews.Content: It seems a little flimsy and easy to break the screen if a wobbly person accidentally falls against it. I have replaced this TV twice with the same model for my homebound father. Next time I'll have to look for a TV made of cement.

Reviews.Title: Great Price, but At the Cost of Some Basic Features
Reviews.Author: M. Ichiyama
Reviews.Content: Out of the box, the panel is easy to setup and configure.  It's a good choice for a bedroom or small room video panel, as the styling is clean and simple, with the thin black "frame" making the most of the 32" display.While there is a digital audio (Toslink) out, the lack of either a headphone mini plug or audio out is disappointing.  The work around is a digital to analog converter box, which may add $30-40 worth of hardware and cables that a $0.50 jack could have taken care of.  If the panel is being fed via a cable/sat tuner box or a home theater receiver, the lack of the audio jacks is less annoying.The remote is on the smaller sized, with Samsung's use of "Tools" and "Menu" on separate buttons.Aside from the lack of basic audio output, it's a good panel for the price.

Reviews.Title: New Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Margaret L. Hinkley
Reviews.Content: It was easy as pie!!!  we love the Samsung TV,  I don't buy that much, but I'll be checking Amazon first for anything I need.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: Margaret Harnett
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality.  The only downside is weak reception from certain channels but I believe a better indoor antenna would fix this problem.  This is a bedroom TV and while I have Cable TV is my living room, I did not want the same for the bedroom.  Any recommendations for indoor antennas to solve my problem?

Reviews.Title: perfect.
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Barton
Reviews.Content: great price, no volume problems, love the picture quality. We do not have anything else connected to it. We do not have cable just antennae.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Russell F.
Reviews.Content: Just bought two of these recently, and I am much more pleased than I expected to be.  The pictures are clear, the set-up is a breeze, and mounting the TV was simple.  I have read other reviewers complaints about the sound, but find that I have no problem with it. ( I also remember that I have speakers on my main home theater system that cost almost as much as this whole TV, and perhaps that makes me more charitable towards the sound than others might be.)  In any event, I did not find it to be bad at all. When I set the sound adjustment to "clear voice" I get as good quality sound as can reasonably be expected.  The TVs are to be used by an elderly, home-bound lady in her bedroom and living room, and I think they will suit her nicely.  She has two identical TVs so that she can use whichever remote she finds handy for either TV.  I have no idea how long they will last, but if they are still operating in two years, I will have spent less than ten dollars per month per television, and cannot find any reason to complain about that.  I pay more for the satellite service than that.  So far, I'm very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Quality Goods.
Reviews.Author: Prophet
Reviews.Content: It works perfectly and has great picture quality, gets the job done.. This is a really great buy, buy now!

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Shuqi zhao
Reviews.Content: good quality, but seems hard to connect with Lenovo.Can only play video in avi and mp4 form. rmvb is not allowed.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: clp
Reviews.Content: I used this HDTV to replace a very heavy 32 inch, cathode ray standard TV. It is much lighter and the picture is great.

Reviews.Title: Met all expectations
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: The TV was  even better than I expected. The description was very accurate. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Using this tv in a night club pool room, great picture, no complaints, easy to set up and does the job

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: Wonderful TV. Works great and has a good picture. Only thing keeping it from a 5 star review is the overall sound is kind of low.

Reviews.Title: Good material and excellent customer experience
Reviews.Author: Jean Herve NGUESSAN
Reviews.Content: Everything went well, timing and good product.The screen is nice and the TV is lighter than the previous model, we like itJean Nguessan

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: mimi
Reviews.Content: Great picture and sound. Set was fairly easy for the non technical 60 something age. Am very happy with the purchase so far.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.  Prompt Shipping.  Perfect in every way.
Reviews.Author: aoprods
Reviews.Content: I am a faithful Samsung patron.  Needed a TV for my son's birthday.  This was perfect and he loves, even better.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: K. Marquardt "madtown moo"
Reviews.Content: Came as expected. I have only had this TV for about a week but I love it. Great sound, great picture.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Un32EH4003
Reviews.Author: SEKWATI GODFREY
Reviews.Content: Thank you for taking such a short time to deliver my HDtv and love it a lot.I will buy something with you again very soon

Reviews.Title: Great price for basic LED TV.
Reviews.Author: ZechariahB
Reviews.Content: This is not a bells and whistle TV.  It is however low price and has a great picture.  Adding a Square Trade helped me make the decision on this TV as well.  A square trade ensures that if anything were to blow up in the TV after the manufacturer's warranty it is still covered.  No problems thus far with this basic LED TV.

Reviews.Title: Great HD TV for the Money.
Reviews.Author: Wyoming Outlaw
Reviews.Content: I haven't had a lot of viewing time on this tv, but the time I've used it so far has been great. Sound quality and picture are very good. I have not tried viewing a HD signal on it yet, but standard def is great. The tv stand feels very cheap however it works just fine for my application. 4/5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price
Reviews.Author: Dorene Hanson
Reviews.Content: Came quickly and great reviews.  Samsung is always a good purchase.  This one is smaller so it's in a guest bedroom.  Only problem is we hope our guests don't stay too long:)

Reviews.Title: great deal!
Reviews.Author: marvin ray
Reviews.Content: can't beat price for the product... highly recommend! using in camping trailer w/tao antannae,recieved items quickly and great bang for the buck!

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: This Samsung TV is ideal for my apartment. Great picture. Love it! I would highly recommend it! GREAT PRICE! GREAT BRAND!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture!  But missing a couple of things...
Reviews.Author: djdb
Reviews.Content: This Samsung delivers a clean, clear picture with DVDs and HDTV, as well as streaming Netflix via Wii. Samsung's have the best picture quality hands down at every price point.  This model is a budget model, and I want to mention a couple of things about this TV that I was bummed about.First, you can't connect a HDD to the USB input.  That means you can't connect that 3TB hard drive full of movies you have directly to this TV.  The USB input also does not read .ISO files (but will read MOST other formats).  The USB input reads audio/video/pictures from 'thumb drives'.And second, there is NO RCA AUDIO OUTPUT.  This means that you will need a receiver with HDMI ins/outs to run the TV's audio to a home theater.SO a couple of missing features for me, but nothing that would make me have buyers remorse for buying this TV.

Reviews.Title: My first flat screen
Reviews.Author: Peter Rozboril
Reviews.Content: I've had it for a few months now and I am very pleased and impressed with it. No problems and an incredible picture.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: M. Williams "MBW"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv to fit into our armoire and I was so excited until I opened the box and realized that this wasn't the right size. I do not fault the product at all as it clearly says 32", I just didn't know my armoire was so much bigger. The screen is completely flat, crystal clear picture and just an amazing TV. I went and bought a bigger samsung and made sure that it had enough ports to hook up my sound system. Samsung is a great brand and they make excellent TVs. I would for sure buy this again, just for a smaller stand :)

Reviews.Title: A mostly great tv
Reviews.Author: Shirley Bowers
Reviews.Content: I love this tv. But one small problem keeps me from giving it 5 stars. The sound quality on certain programs ls poor.

Reviews.Title: NICE TV
Reviews.Author: Pamela
Reviews.Content: Well this is my first flat tv, and I am very pleased with it. The picture  and sound is nice and clear, just as what the other people review and say.

Reviews.Title: Great TV. Love it.
Reviews.Author: Boyang Wang
Reviews.Content: It is a great TV. Looks good. work well. I just installed Directv and I am enjoying it. Everything is good so far.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for a Good Price
Reviews.Author: emeraldcityhooligan
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv for the casual user.  I have this as a bedroom tv that I use mainly for watching movies/connecting to my macbook.  It does the trick and has a fairly good picture.  Worth the purchase.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Tammy
Reviews.Content: Since I'm not totally computer savy, this tv was just right for me.  And as I learn to connect and adjust more products to it, it adjust with and for me!!!

Reviews.Title: JUST CRISP! :D
Reviews.Author: Slick
Reviews.Content: I got this for my Mom, just WOW!The price is off the HOOK! The picture quality is like crystal clear glass mannnn! I watched the "The Descent" on this and BOY OH BOY, quality like BOOM!And oh, the sound quality when adjusted  in your menu can be like real life. So, its BIG, SHOWS CRYSTAL CLEAR, HAS GREAT SOUND QUALITY, PRICE TO RECON FOR and it works USB which I think is plus. I just download my movies to my flash and plug and play.Only surprise I had was that they measured the size "diagonally" and not across, So I got fooled with the size. Oh well, its still BIG!

Reviews.Title: samsung tv purchase
Reviews.Author: coops123
Reviews.Content: Arrived as described, in the expected amount of time, completely satisfied. TV operates well, picture quality is good, would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Frank V. Cassarino Jr. "Yorkie Lover"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Samsung TV. As with the other two it produces a fantastic picture. Set up is easy and the price was great. It makes a wonderful bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: Recommend the product
Reviews.Author: Poppy Pattanayak
Reviews.Content: light, reasonably priced, good picture quality, easy to assemble. The black color gives it a sleek and elegant look and goes with any furniture.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Samuel
Reviews.Content: Works like a charm! Great for the price only thing that seems to not work is the media USB port but everything else is great

Reviews.Title: Nice LED picture
Reviews.Author: Lance A. Simon
Reviews.Content: As advertised this product is a great value. The only reason for my giving 4 stars instead of 5 is something that surprised me -- there is no headphone outlet on this TV. I would never have even thought to look for that, every TV I've bought in the past has had one. Other than that the product seems very good, has good sound and I like the HDMI inputs.

Reviews.Title: What I wanted
Reviews.Author: Warthog
Reviews.Content: At new tv for my 85 yr old mother.  She loves it because it's HD and bigger than her old tube tv.  Low feature, low cost.  Just what I ordered.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!!!
Reviews.Author: Justin DePalma
Reviews.Content: I use this as my monitor and my tv in the guest bedroom. The screen is so bright and sports look amazing on this thing. When i do graphic design on my computer its amazing how much detail you can see on the screen.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I was completely satisfied. Even if it said it was used, it did not look like it was used at all.

Reviews.Title: arrived intact and in working order
Reviews.Author: sallyb
Reviews.Content: Had this TV shipped to a rental unit in Wyoming. It arrived unbroken and was quickly installed.Everything was in working order. So it is as expected.

Reviews.Title: It's a pretty good TV
Reviews.Author: collegestudent
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a second TV to put in the living room, mostly for Netflix and XBOX stuff. I already have a fairly large TV in my family room so I wasn't looking for anything huge. I came across this and liked it a lot. The sound on this TV isn't the best, on higher volumes it can come off a little tinny, but if you're using this for a bedroom, office etc I think it'll be fine. Worse comes to worse you can pick up a pair of speakers to hook it up to.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, Hideous Sound
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: I see I'm not the first to complain about the poor sound quality of this product. It is hollow and tinny to the point of distraction, with no treble or bass options like on most sets. It's so bad it ruins the viewing experience. I'm going to try the Equalizer settings mentioned by another reviewer, since nothing else has worked. If I end up having to buy a cheap pair of speakers, then the price of the set won't have been such a bargain after all. I don't even know if speakers will fit in my bedroom armoire...

Reviews.Title: I only use it for flash drive play...
Reviews.Author: HonestPoorGuy
Reviews.Content: sleep timer doesn't work with a flash drive (have to use it before you switch to media player) and there is no search-time with the media player like in previous versions...price was good though

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Allan Cameron
Reviews.Content: I kept tinkering with the Equalizer and finally settled on updated settings. It seems that the 300Hz setting was the one that was controlling most of the background music, so I dropped it way down and words became much clearer.Movies, being shot at 30FPS, however, work better than, say, sports or games. LED cuts down on power cost, resulting in one of the most efficient TV of its size.

Reviews.Title: COMMENTS ON THE SAMSUNG 32 INCH .
Reviews.Author: Philip Sherman
Reviews.Content: IT WAS EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED IN THE LIMITED SPACE THAT WE HAD FOR IT.THE COLOR IS A VAST IMPROVEMENT OVER THE OLD  25 INCH SET  THAT WE REPLACED.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Steve Ramer
Reviews.Content: I like this TV, because it fits my bedroom perfectly. Also, it has a nice picture. The only con is the sound is a little tinney. I would recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: HARI
Reviews.Content: Good picture quality, sound is okay , not much impressed . Cannot connect to external speakers. USB supports most video formats. Overall -- A product what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good
Reviews.Author: and this is a great t rex
Reviews.Content: The price point for this tv was the biggest selling point for me and so far it's been pretty great. I only have two complaints...1) There's no audio out on the tv. I'm really not sure how common this is for tv these days. As someone without cable who's trying to watch netflix from a computer, an audio out would be nice so I could hook the tv up to my speakers instead of having to plug and unplug my laptop every time.2) It turns off every 2 hours or so. I skimmed some of the documentation as well as the menu and didn't immediately see anything about this. It's not a HUGE problem, but I wish it wouldn't happen. If it's some behavior I can turn off, I'd love to know how. And then I'd wonder why it's set to do this by default...

Reviews.Title: Great choice and the price it's better  I recommend this tv
Reviews.Author: eduardo sandez
Reviews.Content: Its a good tv  has a good image and the colors are more vivid, i would buy this tv again,  the size is perfect for the room or a living room the movies look so great on dvd and blue ray even the cable channels

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Miguel Lama
Reviews.Content: is an excellent tv is great with bright colors more than I expected I am very grateful thank you buy

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: boom 1
Reviews.Content: I love my new tv. It met my expectations. Great televisión at a great price..... Thank you Amazon.... couldn't have got it without you!

Reviews.Title: bought 2
Reviews.Author: Julie Faries
Reviews.Content: purchased one for each for my guest bedrooms. works great - crystal clear picture. works great wall mounted, easy to program

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price!
Reviews.Author: beegee
Reviews.Content: I was not disappointed at all with this tv.  I have a studio apartment so theother complaints about the tv not being loud enough did not effect me in theleast.  The tv is very lightweight - unbelievable.  Picture is great and just overalla great tv for the price.

Reviews.Title: love my new TV
Reviews.Author: patricia farrington
Reviews.Content: I have not purchased a new TV in over 15 years so I am so pleased with the weight of the set, the ease of putting it together on to the stand and the clarity of the picture

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG 32 IN tv
Reviews.Author: Marye
Reviews.Content: We bought two of these TVs one for the office and one for the kitchen because we have a larger one on our living room for several years and were happy with it. One of the 32 in has a great picture but the other one does not. The picture on one of the TVs is not very sharp and colors not as vibrant

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: wh6276
Reviews.Content: I wanted something smaller for the bedroom just I just settled with this one cause it was a great price but when I put it up the picture was amazing! For just 720p it looked way sharper then my 1080 LCD!! Great TV for price and picture.

Reviews.Title: Not too bad for the price
Reviews.Author: monthira mountry
Reviews.Content: Color contrast is not automatic but trying to adjust for the right color can be a pain.  Just have to work with it.

Reviews.Title: Whats not to like--it works perfectly and is attractive
Reviews.Author: Juanita M.
Reviews.Content: Very good value --works beautifully the remote is easily decipherable and the set itself is attractive ---good valuae for the $ spent

Reviews.Title: Gift was well recieved
Reviews.Author: Shazzer
Reviews.Content: the recipients really like this tv and it fills their need. they like the picture quality and I liked the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for Secondary Room
Reviews.Author: cphuey71
Reviews.Content: I brought this TV for my bedroom.  This television was very easy set up and mount on the wall.  The picture off the cable is great, I have the tv sync with my hi-def box.  No complaints!!!

Reviews.Title: It is great
Reviews.Author: Mara Irwin
Reviews.Content: If you're an avid TV person it is a great picture, but I guess not perfect. I am someone who likes TV for some crappy shows here and there, so it is absolutely perfect and definitely worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: bhafner
Reviews.Content: We got this as a replacement for an old 19" that went bad.  It took a little tweaking to get the settings right, but the sound and the picture are wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Very Impressive!
Reviews.Author: Fetter Mankowski
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Samsung 32 inch HDTV to replace my old tv which was not a flat screen. The thinness of the screen is perfect and fits just right in the location I need it to be in. The color quality is great and the HD is vivid real like I'm really there! As a person who works in the field of electronics and technology, it is hard to impress me with this sort of stuff but I have to be honest and say that this TV is very impressive!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: NYer
Reviews.Content: The TV has a sleek look with a tight frame on the picture giving the sense that the picture "fills the box."  The picture is clear and sharp and the colors are vivid.  I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: Fred Badger
Reviews.Content: The TV performs as advertised and is clearly a bargain at the Amazon price. I later bought a blue ray CD player and now I can stream Amazon Prime movies on this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: rebekah
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this purchase.  Lightweight, good color, perfect for the bedroom.  Only downfall is it has 1 connection port so you can't run cable and DVR

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Don Koenigsknec ht
Reviews.Content: Nice picture and sound, especially for cost.  No audio 'outs' but cable box provided that option to headsets.  good buy

Reviews.Title: A TOP RATED PRODUCT !
Reviews.Author: Ernest R. Kretzmer "music lover"
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality and surprisingly good sound quality!Excellent receiver sensitivity:  Flawless reception of about 40 channelsoff the air with an indoor antenna (about 30 feet above sea level)  --all but one about 40 miles away.Its narrow frame (around the screen) allows a perfect fit on a corner shelfin my breakfast nook....and it emits very little heat, thanks to the LEDbacklighting. Also its very light weight is a delight......after the 'heavyweights'of past years. Finally, the modest price (about $280 if I recall correctly) isanother delight.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Robert W. Fuller III
Reviews.Content: Very good value for the money. Great picture.  I use it for basic TV viewing (sports, news, mostly) and would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Just what you expect from Samsung
Reviews.Author: PIL
Reviews.Content: Beautiful picture, great sound, easy to assemble the stand/tv.  I am enjoying this TV.  I have a huge picture window that it sits in front of.  I did not want to block any of the view so this was the perfect size for me.  The only thing I wish was that Amazon provided an extended warranty.  They did with other TVs I have purchased as gifts to others.  With the Samsung quality though I should be just fine.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Joseph G Tobin
Reviews.Content: The TV is fine but the grand kids say it's too small!!It's in the studio so they can suffer.06757

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Bluzeharp
Reviews.Content: The Good:  Outstanding picture quality for the price point, acceptable audio quality, easy to unpack and prep, easy to set up the various functions with the remote.  The light weight means I could install it on a wall mount by myself, but was slightly awkward size wise to do alone.  It went into a room I set up in my home with gym gear so now I can watch while I work out, this size or slightly smaller is perfect for this use just a few feet in front of me.  Light enough to be portable, and the stand reinstalls easily for use in other places when desired.The not so good:  One screw stripped when attaching the plastic on plastic stand (it was not overtightened).  Makes annoyingly loud musical tones when turned on or off, (it could wake that baby you just got to go to sleep).  Glare reduction is poor, overhead lights cast unwanted images on the screen.  Feature set is a bit light, there's no RCA type audio output jacks, no smart features etc...  I HATE indicator lights that come on and stay on to tell you a device is turned off, it's a stupid and irresponsible waste of power.  It's also patronizing, even the least of the 'intellektuly inclined out there are bright enough to not need a light to tell em' that... grrrr!All in all a great value for those who don't need an extensive set of features.  Nice for a dorm, bedroom, reception area etc...

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 TV
Reviews.Author: Loubro
Reviews.Content: I was originally looking to buy the Vizio 32 inch until my son found this Samsung with better picture for price he has a larger one he purchased on Amazon,downstairs we have enjoyed for over a year so why not have one in my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV!
Reviews.Author: Elina
Reviews.Content: So far we are all very happy with the purchase!Great price for the great quality! The picture and sound are good. Has HDMI input.Very user friendly. I would definitely recommend it to buy!

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: J. Tackx "jojo"
Reviews.Content: Perfect size I needed in my limited space areaclearer sound and picturefast deliveryeasy to set upeasy to lift up

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: R. Clark "purplerose"
Reviews.Content: had a 22 inch Samsung and loved it. wanted something bigger and it is a bigger version and I love it.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: lasania richards
Reviews.Content: i love my TV it works great i have no problem and it shows very pretty i would definitely recommend.

Reviews.Title: Love Samsung
Reviews.Author: B. Fletcher
Reviews.Content: I have a 62" Samsung in my living room so when the television set I bought in 1986 finally went out in my bedroom I chose to replace it with a 32" Samsung.  I only had a hair over 29 inches to work with in the entertainment center and the 32" Samsung fit into that space perfectly with no room to spare on either side.  I am very happy with the size and quality of the picture.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my room
Reviews.Author: Seth Centerbar
Reviews.Content: I'm no expert on the subject of tv's, but I absolutely love this thing. I use it everyday, and the picture and sound are great. For the price of $200, I'd be surprised to find any reason to dislike it. HDMI ports work great, and though it may be the least of your concern, I love the feel of the remote.

Reviews.Title: Excellent tv
Reviews.Author: John Brady
Reviews.Content: I read a lot of reviews about this model and indeed it is as good as described by the reviewers.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: kbd
Reviews.Content: This is a perfect tv for watching satellite or DVD programming in a bedroom set up. Not a lot of bells and whistles, but a solid picture and nice looking set at a competitive price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Buy
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: Came in great condition. Works great. The tv was very easy to set up. Wish it came with a remote.

Reviews.Title: Good tv picture NO AUDIO OUT is a poor decision Samsung
Reviews.Author: Bob
Reviews.Content: No audio out with such poor internal speakers makes it very disappointing. Great picture but with such bad audio you'd better have it hooked to a satellite or cable box that does audio out. I do not so the only time I get good audio is when I'm using the ROKU 2 box which I have hooked to both HDMI out from the ROKU to the tv and the analog out cable to the stereo. Got it for $217 shipped so am not complaing too much and am overall happy it just seems it would have been a no brainer to give us an audio out on this tv.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: CT Mystery Fan
Reviews.Content: You really don't need 1080p for a 32" tv.  This is a bedroom TV so I did not want much in the way of bells and whistles since we have DirecTV with whole house DVR and on-demand.  Only annoyance is the red light on when the TV is off - hint most of us recognize a black screen with no picture as the tv being off and with a picture on.  It also likes to play a little tune when you turn it on - in case the red light turning off and the a picture appearing were not enough.

Reviews.Title: Good Qualitty
Reviews.Author: ShowbizHustla
Reviews.Content: Brilliant quality, good picture and sound, makes watching HD movies a dream come true, I often connect it to my laptop and do everything from there, lots of energy options as well , including automatic turn off, that especially helps save money when I fall asleep watching movies at night

Reviews.Title: A pretty good TV
Reviews.Author: Joe Renta
Reviews.Content: A good 2nd TV. Nothing special, it just works which is all I wanted. On sale I felt it was a good deal.Glad I purchased it.

Reviews.Title: Clear View
Reviews.Author: Ernie
Reviews.Content: This is a very good TV.  I am glad I made the choice to buy the Samsung.  It has a very good and clear picture.

Reviews.Title: Good TV price - features
Reviews.Author: Alexis Javier Ramírez Noguera "Alexis Ramirez"
Reviews.Content: I have been using this TV for a couple of days and I think this is an excellent product in terms of price quality and features. If you need a TV for a child room or guess room this is a good option. So far I'm very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: used Samsung 32 inch tv
Reviews.Author: Ralph Bates
Reviews.Content: I was worried because I'm a new customer, but it works great and my wife can't believe I got such a good deal.  Thanks and its good to be in the Amazon family.  I'll buy again!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Schwieterman
Reviews.Content: The television works wonderfully and I intend to use it for a long time to come.  Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Christian Lara
Reviews.Content: Not much to say except this is a great tv. I have an older version of this tv and I do have to admit they updated the operating system on this tv.

Reviews.Title: Bargain
Reviews.Author: Amale97
Reviews.Content: Does a great job, Worked as decribed. I have not had any problems so far. I would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32-inch
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Steffy
Reviews.Content: I cannot find an 'out' to attach my TV Ears. I do like the set; but, I do need help.

Reviews.Title: Decent Tv
Reviews.Author: Cory M. Easler "Cory Easler"
Reviews.Content: I thought it was the same TV as I have in the bedroom. Looks the same but much cheaper build. Picture and color are almost as good and it is lighter than the other one. Works great in the RV however. The light design is perfect for traveling as it doesn't stress the mount as much.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003
Reviews.Author: Jerry Downs
Reviews.Content: Very good quaility picture and easy to set up. A good value for the money. Good for bedroom or small family room.

Reviews.Title: Great LED TV for the money!
Reviews.Author: Austin Smart
Reviews.Content: Bought this Samsung TV knowing it was not an "upper end" model for my RV.  Great picture and sound.  Would purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Kristina N. Lane
Reviews.Content: Great picture, great sound, easy set up.  Using in a bedroom.  Excellent tv for the price.  Would definitely buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!
Reviews.Author: B. A. Ferstand "Barb"
Reviews.Content: Bought for bedroom.  Perfect size!  Great pic quality.  VERY pleased!  Easy to set up.  Quick assembly.  AA +.  Samsung products rock!

Reviews.Title: Much better than I expected
Reviews.Author: Louis J. Fisher "lone wolf"
Reviews.Content: Simple to set up and to adjust picture and sound to my preference and the price was reasonable.. Excellent technical help from Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Bright and Sharp
Reviews.Author: Electrico88 "LopezValerio"
Reviews.Content: This i a TV that is old for the new generation that outcome in the market.But it's a excellent product with an excellent price. Only with a HDMI output, it's good for your child's place.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Michael G. Zulinski "power"
Reviews.Content: Easy set up and nice looking bezelQuality of the images is not the high but it is a low price good value

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Reidherr
Reviews.Content: Love the uni-button on the TV. one button controls all.Also Playing video file from flash drive on TV is awsome.

Reviews.Title: Samsung HDTV
Reviews.Author: Sharon Branson
Reviews.Content: Order arrived on time with no problems.  TV has good cable HD reception, good picture & sound.  Enjoy the variable options ofpicture, color, sound, etc.  Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32 inch HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Peppy M
Reviews.Content: I enjoy my Samsung 32 inch TV everyday. The picture is sharp and the size is just right for my bedroom. I would highly recommend this TV to everyone. The sound system is great too!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Miguel
Reviews.Content: easy setupgreat picturesound is fine using standard setupoutstanding contrastcompact table top spaceExellent choice saving money...

Reviews.Title: Unexpectedly poor picture, but great service by Amazon
Reviews.Author: Stan G
Reviews.Content: I thought that the 720p resolution would be very adequate for a 32" LCD TV, especially a Samsung product.  My wife and I were surprised and very disappointed to see that the picture was soft and often smeary.  Moreover, yellows were inordinately intense.  This was despite trying most of the (many) available adjustments and looking at many different TV channels, both hi-def and non-hi-def.  To their enormous credit, Amazon made it very easy to return this product, although we had to pay a return shipping fee of about $20.  But we felt that was fair.This was another example of why I continue to make many purchases from Amazon with complete peace of mind.  As for the TV set, we decided that we needed to go and see various 32" TV sets in person, and we came across the 1080p Samsung model, which had a markedly better picture than any of the 720p sets we saw - and much better than the unit we had returned.  So we paid the higher price to buy the 1080p Samsung model.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and Price
Reviews.Author: James L. Koss
Reviews.Content: The TV works great, picture and sound are outstanding.  Very quiet compared to my old flat screen and less heat too very easy to set up too.

Reviews.Title: Predictable Samsung Quality
Reviews.Author: OlTex
Reviews.Content: Have been buying Samsungs' for computer monitors and HDTV's for several years, and have never been disappointed.  This is "low end" non-smart 720p HDTV for bedroom, but great quality for price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Audra Snyder "Dra"
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing.  The picture is so clear and the sound is awesome. I have zero complaints! Get this tv :)

Reviews.Title: Picture is good, crisp
Reviews.Author: Manny
Reviews.Content: The picture is clean and crisp, sound is loud and clear. Installation took a bit longer probably because I am using Comcast mini cable box, and the remote had to be replaced and re-programmed. It is in my spare room, and it is not used very often. I give this item 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Mostly fine, with an explanation
Reviews.Author: Bill Weeden "billyweeds"
Reviews.Content: The resolution is great.  The picture quality and sound are great.  But the flexibility of picture size is limited and the wide screen look is pinched.  I have to select "zoom" to get a full-screen picture that is in correct proportion.  The closed captions are also a problem.  Had to call the cable man to fix it for me.  The "closed captions on mute" function just didn't work correctly.  It's fixed now, but is more complicated than I would have hoped for.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture for the value . . .
Reviews.Author: Carlos Moreira
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv for various reasons, first the picture is very good, its very thin since it is a led lcd panel, and the price was very good too.In my case, this one is mainly destinated for cable watching, and so far it's doing a great job.Very recomended for anywone that's looking for a product of high quality at a good price.The package came in impeccable!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Stephen J. Benulis "Steve B."
Reviews.Content: Priced at $268, this was a great find.  Picture is clear.  No issues with delivery or picture.  Perfect for the bedroom. I may get another.

Reviews.Title: Exactly What I needed
Reviews.Author: A. Taylor
Reviews.Content: Love the TV. Works well as a monitor when I'm doing late night work as well. Have no regrets buying

Reviews.Title: Perfect - Can't beat it for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: The picture is amazing, the menu is fast and responsive, it is beyond bright and vivid and sharp and pretty much whatever else you want it to be...not to mention it is light! Very easy to move and set up. No complaints at all!

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Elly Gil
Reviews.Content: Great image and Sound!  Perfect size for a medium room.  We had to attach it to the wall because its not stable on the base that it come with it.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE PROC DUCTO  RECOMIENDO  BIEN .... . . . . . . . . . .. . . . . .
Reviews.Author: CCC
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE PROC DUCTO  RECOMIENDO  BIEN .... . . . . . . . . . .. . . . . .

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: high flyer
Reviews.Content: This set is good but not excellent. It lacks any audio out. The picture is quite good. Sound is only adequate.It is good enough for a location such as the kitchen or a bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Tv
Reviews.Author: LCS007
Reviews.Content: This super little Samsung is a great spare bedroom TV. It's picture is best in class as far as I'm concerned. I actually purchased it for my daughter since she had the big ol 27 inch dinosaur tube tv. She was thrilled. My wife and I will sometimes raid her room just to watch TV. Great way to get back at your kids!Picture quality is good if not great. I was sure a 720p/60hz TV would be subpar but we have been so surprised. Watching Blu rays is really fun.Now I'm not a videophile but for my eyes, and the rest of us, it was an excellent choice. Not many HDMI ports but for us it was great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung un32eh4003 32inch
Reviews.Author: King_cj
Reviews.Content: I love my tv it shows very clear nothing has gone wrong with it and it was priced great I recommend this tv to anyone looking for a tv for there room or where ever

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: cghantique
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a birthday gift for my wife's scrapbooking room.  It performs as well as our two larger Samsung TVs and the price was great.

Reviews.Title: Its ok for what you pay
Reviews.Author: Alex Davis "awdavis22"
Reviews.Content: Its ok. Display is a little dark, not too crisp, but it is fine. I haven't seen the HD channels yet but I can't imagine they are as great as they could be. If it lasts longer than the 3 years I have on the warranty then I will be happy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the Roku in Bedroom
Reviews.Author: John Hall
Reviews.Content: As of this review, we have had this television under two weeks. I did a lot of research before buying and overall, I am impressed with this television. To provide context, I upgraded to this television from a 32in JVC flat screen HDTV.We use this television in our bedroom. The primary positives for this unit are great picture quality in general, very little noticeable jittering in action sequences (configuration required), and the eco modes that we run in high to dim the television to the lowest light possible for nighttime viewing. We also make use of the screen off function to simply listen sometimes. I also make use of the auto off feature so that the television turns off after 4 hours without input on the remote.This unit isn't without some minor detractions (though some of these are correctable with settings). As most people report, the remote is too crowded. Additionally, the remote's layout is not intuitive to touch (I had a hard time feeling the arrow navigation apart from the menu key). In addition, the sound and picture quality are garbage out of the box. We easily rectified this by setting the sound and display to Movie. I feel like the volume of people reporting this problem indicates that the product should have probably been preconfigured differently.I had seen some notes that the remote was backlit. It, in fact, is not on this model.To fix the motion jitters, turn on LED Motion Plus in the Picture Options menu. (Why isn't this default?)

Reviews.Title: For a light TV
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth B. Warner
Reviews.Content: I finally graduated from a 30-year old TV that belonged to my mother and it had gotten very blurry until the bulbs warmed up a long time.  This TV totally amazes me for its clarity.  And I can actually pick it up and move it.  No more handcarts in order to place it in another room.  The buttons on the remote are user friendly and well marked.  And it was an good price because I got it when it was on sale.

Reviews.Title: 32" LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Janet Baldridge
Reviews.Content: The TV has a great picture and sound for the cost, actually it is much better than I expected.  The screen however is NOT 32" it is 27". I am not sure how Samsung measures things but it must be in South Korean not English.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Mary K Roetzel
Reviews.Content: I did have a little trouble getting it set up, but the customer service rep was excellent -- she walked me through everything. Consumer Reports did note that the sound wasn't great -- i don't notice that, but the TV is in a small room. Def. would buy samsung again!

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: labaron
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because the TV has VERY nice true colors.  We do not have HD, but the TV doesn't care; works great & we are VERY happy with its quality.

Reviews.Title: Nice and light
Reviews.Author: Joy W
Reviews.Content: The picture is good and the product is very light and easy to move. Directions for operation with cable (sync) are a little difficult to follow.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice TV for den
Reviews.Author: Uncle T
Reviews.Content: We just received this TV, plugged it in out of the box. The picture is great, sound quality certainly better than the TV it replaced. Samsung integrated with current satelite remote and Samsung tablet for controls. What a great price on a nice TV. We ordered another one to put in our guest house.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Man Cave
Reviews.Content: We got the TV for the Bedroom to replace a 19in tube.  Its a nice Size,  I had to do alot of adjusting to the screen to get it how I liked it.  But you have to do that with any new TV.  The sound is good.  It measures 29in wide.

Reviews.Title: Never thought I would buy a tv on the internet!
Reviews.Author: Teacher "Bookworm"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this as a second tv and we have found it to be an excellent product.  The picture is clear with great color and easy  set up.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: wilkeila
Reviews.Content: se recibio la mercancia en buen estado y en corto tiempo. excelente servicio, el televisor cubre todas mis expectativas y es de buen precio

Reviews.Title: Love this tv.
Reviews.Author: Bronze Puppy
Reviews.Content: Free shipping - arrived in two days! Reasonably priced. Easy to set up, great picture, Factory settings are fine; no need to make any adjustments. Excellent size for my spare bedroom. Would definately recommend.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG 32' TV
Reviews.Author: Daniel J. Griffin
Reviews.Content: The set arrived in excellent shape. I followed the set-up instructions from on-line; so simple even an ME can sit backafter following the "hook-up" directions. The directions say wait about 20 minutes but I was exuberant and wait about 12.The picture is superb,  the sound is OK, and I expect to add some audio assistance.

Reviews.Title: FANTASTIC
Reviews.Author: Carl Leroy Harrold "Weird Harold"
Reviews.Content: GREAT PICTURE  EASY TO USE AND SETUP  Took this out of the box and put the stand together and attached it to the tv was the hardest part of the entire set up. Plugged the HDMI cables in and then plugged the tv set in and turned it on. That was pretty much it. The rest was simply learning what the remote did and adjusting the picture to soot my viewing likes. Pretty dang simple for someone in my sixties and being a very low tech type of person. The picture was just amazing for us and the sound was just fine for viewing in our kitchen. Love that I can change aspect ratio from 16:9 to 4:3 with just a touch of a button on the remote. Some of the shows I watch were made in the late 50's and look a little strange at 16:9 changing to 4:3 puts it in it's normal aspect ratio and looks great. GREAT TV AND A GREAT PRICE THAT MAKES THIS A GREAT VALUE ALL THE WAY AROUND  Thanks Samsung

Reviews.Title: Great delivery, great tv!
Reviews.Author: Irish Indian "Martha"
Reviews.Content: The tv came faster than expected and in perfect order. Setting up the stand was simple, once I'd found a screwdriver with a smalll enough head. The 32" size is very easy to handle but not so light as to seem tippy. Understandng and following written directions for anything electronic is always challenging for the retired English prof who undertook the "Plug and Play" feature. Said prof also insists on using only an indoor antenna to "grab off air" the limited number of channels, public and commercial, she enjoys. So she dithered between "Air" and "Auto" for the "antenna source", not knowing if the tv understood what she wanted.  It did, though: one of those worked: she doesn't remember which, or if both really did. In any case, the rest of the Plug and Play set-up was a snap for her, and when one of those favorite channels came on, she couldn't have been happier. The picture is beautifully clear and needed only an adjustment in brightness, easily made, to be perfect. The poor challenged prof now intends to read about "smart antennae" in the  useful guide provided by Samsung and try to smarten up some more herself.  I feel smart to have purchased this size flat-screen, though. It seems rather splendid in my smallish tv room after my 19" analog, but I expect to get used to the home theater feel. I do love it. Thanks, Amazon!

Reviews.Title: bedroom tv
Reviews.Author: twomiraclegirlsmom
Reviews.Content: We bought this as our Christmas gift to each other to replace an old bedroom one. Great quality and picture!

Reviews.Title: love this tv
Reviews.Author: Anita Meyer
Reviews.Content: I went from an older 15 year old tv to this....the picture is so clear and I love the size of it.  It is also very light.  I can pick this tv up with one hand, and dust around it....it is great....

Reviews.Title: Very adequate for second TV
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: A replacement for a spare bedroom TV. Very good size, HD picture very good, sound quality is fine but could be better. We have had another Samsung in the Master bedroom for the past 5 years and were very satisfied with its performance and dependability.

Reviews.Title: Great Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: B. Recknagel
Reviews.Content: This TV was a replacement for a 5-year-old, 26-inch "flat screen" LG TV for use in a bedroom.For starters, the TV's bezel is extremely narrow and the TV is MUCH thinner than our old TV.  Additionally, I was surprised how much lighter (at least 15 pounds) this TV is than the older LG.On to the important information... This TV's picture is beautiful!  I cannot over state this.  Samsung LED TV's are simply gorgeous, and this "lower-end" model is no different.  It's much better than the older TV and is similar to, or better than, our primary 55" Samsung LED TV.  Colors are vibrant, whites are bright, and blacks are dark.  Setup out of the box took around 30 minutes--this included screwing the base to the TV and completing the simple, guided on-screen setup.The contested point, and what I was worried about:  the sound.  In my opinion (and more importantly the wife's!), the sound is perfectly fine for a bedroom TV.  And I'm sure it would be OK for a primary TV setup (although a soundbar would be MUCH better).  My only complaint about the sound is that there is little graduation between the low and high volume.  What do I mean?  To me the TV is quiet, and then it is LOUD!  There is little "in between" volume.  Other than that complaint, the sound is fine.Overall, this TV is a great buy.  It has an awesome picture, and is a perfect TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Tv, Awesome price
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: Now that's what I'm talking about!!  Got this after Christmas, was waiting for the perfect deal.  The price seemed to drop quite a bit after the hype of christmas and post Christmas sales.  Easy to set up out of box.  Up and running in about 1/2 hour.  Speakers not the best but I hooked up my little stereo and it sounds awesome.  Would def. recommend Samsung after reading previous reviews and the picture is absolutley perfect.

Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: Anne
Reviews.Content: Delivered on time, as advertised.  I am pleased with this item. I was somewhat concerned with ordering sensitive electronics in this way, but I am pleased with the result.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful picture
Reviews.Author: Joie L. Morgan
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv for the price! However the the sound does leave something to be desired.....which is typically the case with most flat screen TV's. Plan on getting a sound bar or some other system to boost the quality of sound. But for $267 you cannot beat the TV. And BTW, it's light as a feather!!!! The tv it replaces was a 26 in. Vizio flat screen and that tv was twice as heavy!! Hope this helps!!! I'm off to order my sound bar =)

Reviews.Title: TV
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Samsung made a good TV and sold for a great price picture quality and response time is good would recommend.

Reviews.Title: For the price you cant go wrong
Reviews.Author: lonewolf5460
Reviews.Content: No other 32in tv in this price range has such a thin bezel as this tv, granted it is thicker than the bezel would make you believe but I knew that before purchase. Screen is sharp and clear with respectable sound from its speakers excellent tv with the pricing considered.

Reviews.Title: exelente producto recomendado 100%
Reviews.Author: PEDRO GUERRA
Reviews.Content: muy exelente producto.entrega rapida y sin complicaiones, me siento muy sastifecho con el producto.recomiendo 100% tanto al vendedor como al producto.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: Janet Mettner
Reviews.Content: The Samsung system is easy to use.  The picture is excellent.  Amazon delivered within two days which was wonderful .I didn't have to go without a TV for long.

Reviews.Title: great buy for the buck
Reviews.Author: JO RHONDA BOX
Reviews.Content: I've only had the TV for a couple of days - it came on time - it was simply to assembly even for me - my husband does all the installations for our audio video wares and we have many - so this was my first tv purchase and I like the idea that it was simple even for me to set up - it shows well too

Reviews.Title: Perfecto
Reviews.Author: Wendy Fermin
Reviews.Content: El producto llego en el tiempo estimado, bien empaquetado, es un producto original, estoy conforme con la compra y podría volverá comprarles

Reviews.Title: Nice Samsung TV
Reviews.Author: Don D. "Don DiNunzio."
Reviews.Content: Good contrast, crisp picture.  The colors a little harsh, set on Dynamic, compared to my older Samsung LCD TV but I did not try to 'tweak' the colors through the menu features.  Extremely light for a 32" TV, only about 10 lbs, so it was easy to get it out of the box and set it up in the guest bedroom.  Amazon Prime is great....  TV arrived in 2 days.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Claire
Reviews.Content: Nice TV, great picture, we have it in our bedroom.  Definitely worth it for the price given that it will last longer than most others out there.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: V.S.Srikanth
Reviews.Content: I ordered the product on march 13 and got it on march 19. The product was delivered exactly on time. The packaging is also very good. This was my first LED tvMy likes:1. The picture quality is very sharp2. The size is absolutely enjoyable3. The options available for changing the sound quality and video quality are very much useful while watching films4. The option tiles are stylishDislikes:1. The sound quality is terribly bad. Even my 2 years old laptop gives much better sound than this product.I was disappointed while watching movies. But we can adjust the sound to somewhat better extentOn seeing the overall performance, samsung wins the race with its high quality and sharp resolution.I strongly recommend this product to any one. Samsung is doing a great job.

Reviews.Title: Good stuff
Reviews.Author: Lobsta Johnson
Reviews.Content: Very inexpensive, I put it in my kids' playroom to use with the XBox 360.  It does yeoman's service and the speakers are good enouigh that I didn't need to add an amplifier or new speakers.  For the price, this TV can't be beat.

Reviews.Title: samsung
Reviews.Author: Anthony J. Busillo
Reviews.Content: quality tv, that was bought for my son. I still own one from a few years ago. the price was right

Reviews.Title: Just a smart Choice
Reviews.Author: Douglas Scott
Reviews.Content: First the size is what I needed for a small area in a 5th Weel room,The reception is super and the color and graphic of the picture are more exceptional  and high def than my 2  52"LCD Sonys in my House. and I find that I don't miss the bigger 52's  when I am in the room with this 32" It was a Smart Choice!

Reviews.Title: Great quality for the value.
Reviews.Author: Irene A Castro
Reviews.Content: I got this for my son for X-mas since he wanted to play video games on an HD TV. This TV was great for the price and has been holding up great. Not the flattest TV, but it's very light and easy to move around.

Reviews.Title: Expected
Reviews.Author: margaret palkovich
Reviews.Content: Picture is crisp and clear, the sound quality is good and the size is perfect for in the bedroom.  It was just what I was looking for at a good price

Reviews.Title: A great HDTV for the price
Reviews.Author: 21_Guns
Reviews.Content: I picked out this TV because I wanted to upgrade my bedroom set from an old tube TV to an HD without breaking the bank. It's a little small for a large living room, but for a smaller den or a bedroom it works great. The channels look fantastic for a cheap set, and Blu Rays and video games look great too. DVDs and older, non-HD games look a little off, but with enough tinkering of the settings you can get them looking decent enough for an HDTV. It was very easy to put together; the instructions were clear, it's very light, and all you need is a screwdriver. My only complaint is that an HDMI cable is not included, but Amazon bundles it with one for only 5 bucks more so that really isn't a huge issue.

Reviews.Title: Very sharp picture
Reviews.Author: KMF
Reviews.Content: Very slim, perfect for a smaller room (ours is in a bedroom). Very sharp picture, and ours does not currently have an HD feed into it. Only drawback is the volume has to be turned WAY up to hear it if you are in front of the TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV.
Reviews.Author: john steele
Reviews.Content: Sent this to my sister to replace a crt and she loves it.  This would be a great addition to anyone that wants a smaller set for a small apartment.  Sound is excellent!

Reviews.Title: love this tv!
Reviews.Author: Teresa Brown
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this TV! the picture is flawless, it's super light, and it looks great! No complaint's at all, I can't wait to get the bigger one! Great product, I'm satisfied with my purchase :)

Reviews.Title: It's such a good tv,
Reviews.Author: Nasri714
Reviews.Content: It's such a good tv.I got this tv on monday and I don't regret  it. The colors are bright and clear. The image is really high definition.It has a good volume. it's easy to handle.Notice that in order to really see the high definition you should have one of the next options.1- high definition cable2- blue ray player3- 3d blue ray playerIt looks pretty cool with ragular cable but it is better with high definition, a good hdm cable is required.

Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Title: awesome

Reviews.Content: This Tv has a great picture. My son uses it for gaming and it looks like the real thing. Definately happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Good enough !!

Reviews.Content: It is the best thing available in the market at it's price !! The sound is good enough for a small room.

Reviews.Title: Great quality

Reviews.Title: Perfect

Reviews.Content: Does the Job and more and the price is right on.  The remote can be complicated to work but only takes a week to learn

Reviews.Title: nice TV

Reviews.Content: This LED TV work very nicely and was offered at a reasonable price.  Also, shipping was free.  We use the TV in our gym and its picture is clear.  The slim screen made mounting easy.  I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great product, great price.
Reviews.Author: Eagle3000GTO
Reviews.Content: I received the TV before the date, and works great. It's a great value. I recommend this product for the price and quility.

Reviews.Title: so far so good
Reviews.Author: Zlatko Palaska
Reviews.Content: works fine, easy installation, perfect for a bedroom/smaller living room. I do own it for only two moths now so I cant talk about the durability but knock on wood it is all good so far.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Trenner1
Reviews.Content: Good clear picture, great color, and it is just the right size for a cabinet. What more do you want?

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Marbil "Marbil"
Reviews.Content: Only had this Samsung UN32EH4003 TV for a few weeks.  It has a great picture - better than our LG.  We are very pleased with it.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: KV
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great on this little TV so I'd say it was worth the price we paid. The sound is about average but then again, I really wouldn't know the difference if there was something marginally better. The only complaint I have is that we could not get the TV level in the stand. Though we really don't mind since it sits across the room from our bed on top of a dresser.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Rodolfo Noguera
Reviews.Content: muy buen producto era todo lo que esperaba y mas me parecio una buena compra excelente producto muy bueno bueno

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV
Reviews.Author: C. Douglas Dahlquist
Reviews.Content: Man, talk about a great TV.  We are very pleased and love this Samsung.  Saved quite a bit over the discount stores.

Reviews.Title: Excellant picture
Reviews.Author: Charlie Mack
Reviews.Content: Machine has a good picture, was easy to install, shipment was very prompt. Package was recieved in good condition, like the TV very much

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!!!
Reviews.Author: Steven M. Uchic
Reviews.Content: The size is just right for my bedroom. Had no problem setting it up. The picture is great and once I set the sound, that was great too!  I would recommend this Tv for those people on a budget, because you get a name brand for the price.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Product!
Reviews.Author: QStorm
Reviews.Content: I am more than happy with my purchase. The delivery was lightning fast. Assembly of the item was also super easy! I had it up and running in no time. I read a review before purchasing where the buyer said the audio was terrible? This is not so! There is an equalizer feature in the menu options to adjust the volume and my unit is loud and clear as ever. The main feature I love about this unit is the usb media plug and play. I download loads of media online and no I can just load it onto my usb drive, plug it into the back of the unit and all my movies,videos & pictures are ready to go!So if you are in the market for a moderately priced 32 " HDTV I promise you this Samsung is your best bet! I am so going to purchase a 40" model for my bedroom next.Well done Samsung! This unit is awesome awesome awesome!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Received package in good condition. Works fine. Nice picture quality... Nice sound... Easy to operate... I recommend for others who are looking for a good deal on this tv...

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv
Reviews.Author: JosieJo
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love this tv, nice bright crisp colours. Extremely light + very easy to set up. Wondeful purchase! Recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade. Good Job Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: jerry nelsen
Reviews.Content: Have had the t.v for a month and love it. Has an excellent picture and fits perfectly in the armoire in our bedroom. This is replacing a Vizio which didn't  have anything close to the picture quality. Overall very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good for a small room
Reviews.Author: L. Armour
Reviews.Content: Fits well in a small room. Nice and light to move. Only thing I wish i has was the ability to set the aspect ratio by program.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: NCM
Reviews.Content: Great tv for a bedroom, or office.  Not looking for a high end, 1080p, this should do the trick.  We enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Sensational Picture!
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Rhodes
Reviews.Content: I totally love this tv.  Its the right size - not too small and not overwhelming.  Great on "older" eyes too. Out of the box, hooked up to antenna and dvd player within minutes.  No need for cables - existing video in/out cables worked like a charm for the dvd player.  And watching movies from a flash drive is also awesome!  Do not hesitate on buying this tv.  Its that good!

Reviews.Title: Can't be beat for the money
Reviews.Author: R. Perry
Reviews.Content: Bought this during the 2012 holiday season for $247 with free shipping.  TV is light as a feather and is very basic in constuction compared to my  top-line Samsung 50" Plasma but as soon as I turned it on and adjusted the picture, I was amazed.  This TV is awesome.  Sound isn't that great but it's acceptable for a bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: Great Value & Performance
Reviews.Author: Dstealth "Dstealt"
Reviews.Content: This is my second purchase of this model. One is used for a bedroom & one is used for my CCTV camera system. Picture is very clear(I would not recommend the 720p for any larger screen size) & sound is acceptable for a TV costing $240!

Reviews.Title: good but not so good.... read on please.
Reviews.Author: Edward Scott "ewscott"
Reviews.Content: Rewritten 6/1/2014:I've had this tv for a little over a year now.  It is a good receiver for picture quality, but I bought it for a bedroom tv, which was a serious mistake.What I LIKE:1.  Good picture, sensitive receiver (I am rural and use an amplified antenna... no satellite or cable used).2.  Will play MP3, MP4, AVI, XVID, MKV files directly via USB.What I dislike:1.  Remote is almost impossible to use in the dark (Important for a bedroom tv)2.  If you press the wrong button you will probably have to start over finding your program, which means if you are watching a DVD or video file (MP4, etc) you will have to select buttons and fast forward to where you goofed up.What I HATE:1.  THERE IS NO OPTION FOR HEADPHONES, EXTERNAL SPEAKERS, AUDIO AMPLIFIER, ETC.  WITHOUT MAJOR, WARRANTY-VOIDING MODIFICATION.  NONE!Explanations and rants:***** This TV has a good 720 pic that at 32-inch screen size is almost the same as 1080p.  I have no complaints at all about that feature and would rate that part of the TV 5 stars.***** You can record a video file on your computer (however you obtained it) and put it on a flash stick or on an SD card plugged into a USB converter stick and easily select and play it in HD on your TV.  Many TV's have a USB input but will not play recorded files.  This is the first low-priced unit that I found that could do it.  Note that some DVD players have a USB input to play files, so if you have a good Samsung DVD player, you can do that on any TV.  We enjoy downloading movies, watching them and then deleting them so that there is not a huge collection of DVDs we never watch a second time.  This is a 5-star feature.*** Sound quality is what you would expect from a 3-inch speaker.  Clear but no bass, tinny sound.*** Remote control is fairly intuitive in daylight, but almost impossible to do more than change channels or volume in the dark.  As a bedroom TV, you might not want one where you have to turn on the lights to fast forward or rewind a disc or file.* There is absolutely NO WAY to listen to this TV other than the tiny speakers built into it.
