I knew there was no headphone jack when I bought it, but I thought surely that I could hook up an amplifier and run headphones and speakers through that.  THERE IS NO AUDIO OUTPUT AVAILABLE WHATSOEVER... not even through the USB.  NOTE:  If you have cable or satellite, you will probably be able to connect an amplifier to the set top box furnished by your Dish, DTV or cable company... or from TIVO, etc.All-in-all, this is a great TV for your bedroom if you don't mind the cheap sound, as long as you sleep alone and don't disturb anyone that wants to sleep.  You cannot turn off the sound and use headphones, and you will need to turn on the light sometimes to see the more complex remote buttons.  The remote is made up mainly of identical buttons that can't be distinguished easily by touch.

Reviews.Title: Everything I wanted and more
Reviews.Author: GerBear
Reviews.Content: Great picture, deep rich colors, solid black, ok sound when tweaked, great value, very light, modern look easy to assemble

Reviews.Title: de las mejores compras posibles
Reviews.Author: Jesus Fernando Roman "Jesus Roman"
Reviews.Content: televisor bastante bueno, con imagen muy nítida y multiples funciones. el precio oferta, mejor imposible, ahora con mi sistema audiovisual completo

Reviews.Title: Cost  matches deliverable
Reviews.Author: ALI
Reviews.Content: Clairty is much better while watching movies on HDMI port .Sound is quite  fab and is a surprise for such a good product at the rate purchased. was delivered on time and in a good condition .

Reviews.Title: Great buy for the price
Reviews.Author: Becky Foster
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv because I wanted an led flat screen and couldn't afford to buy brand new. the picture is great and when I watch a dvd even better I highly recommend this product, If you want something cheap and not picky this is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV for occasional viewing
Reviews.Author: Eli G.
Reviews.Content: This is a great addition to the bedroom.Crisp quality and great sound.I only have Samsung TV's in my home and I am perfectly fine with that!

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: KHolden
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV after sitting for a week on whether or not to get this or another brand. It's hard not to narrow in on the negative reviews, but went for it anyway.Sound output is great. My wife and I put this in our 100 sq ft bedroom and at only 20/100 can fill the room with plenty of sound. Put it on a wall mount, and it looks great without taking up valuable floor space.The picture is excellent. Even without a true HD source. We've tried streaming Amazon Instant Video in HD, but our internet speed is apparently not fast enough and the connection times out. Have streamed a few ripped DVDs from a hard drive that are around a 1gb mpeg file size, and they appear quite well. We've used our Sony BlueRay Player to up-convert the first Lord of The Rings, and the picture was incredible.It would nice nice to have additional HDMI plugs, but for a budget HDTV, I won't complain.The USB port for ConnectShare only recognizes Thumb Drives. I even tried formatting the hard drive to Fat 32, and still no luck.Overall, great TV for a nice price. I would definitely recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: Good Tv,really good price.So far no problems. My only issue was the thickness.For a LED,it is thick! The tv has a good picture

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Colin B
Reviews.Content: Pros: Amazing picture, easy setup, best looking TV out there. Great value.Cons: A little thicker than other TVs in this class. Very slight motion blur, but it's hardly noticable

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Reid Zimmerman
Reviews.Content: Much better than our old tube TV....bright and clear.  I've little experience with the finer details of HDTV, but this refurbished model was a great buy for the price...hope it lasts.

Reviews.Title: 32" Samsung HD
Reviews.Author: Shirley
Reviews.Content: The TV was everything I wanted.  I hooked it up to a digital antena and can get more than the local 3.  I serves my purpose exactly.  The sound is good and the picture better.  Easy to install - put plugged it in and it was ready to go.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Matthew Daley
Reviews.Content: I love this tv got it for a second bedroom and its a Great add for this location. Use it for watching movies and playing video games.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Rocky
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly.  I had never order a TV online before.  Put the stand together and had it set up in no time. Very light and easy to handle alone.  Picture is fantastic and is used for a bedroom set. Doesn't have a lot of outlets for other things to be hooked up to it.  But maybe a DVR.  But fine with me. This is my first LED and now I want to upgrade my den set.  I would highly recomment this for a bedroom set.  Great quality picture.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 TV
Reviews.Author: bboy
Reviews.Content: Ordered this as a gift for Christmas. Been a month and couldn't be happier with the TV. It was mounted in a bedroom and looks great. The sound is fine for a bedroom TV. I saw where some have had issues with it but not me. Amazon delivered it in a timely manner with no issues. Being a 720P has bot been an issue. Will look at buying another one as prices drop for older models to place in a spare bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: S. Bowman
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV a month ago, so far so good. It took no time at all to set up, it provides a great picture, and is quite slim. No complaints at all. Great value for $277, no regrets at all.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32 Inch LED
Reviews.Author: Satish Kumar
Reviews.Content: Easy to setup, great quality, worth buying. Would Recommend to buy, Light WeightEasy to setup, great quality, worth buying. Would Recommend to buy, Light Weight

Reviews.Title: Best value for money
Reviews.Author: T. Knox "Regular Guy"
Reviews.Content: There are lots of TV's out there.  This one seemed to have the best price for size and performance when I bought it a month ago, and it's a little less expensive today.The remote seems like it will hold up well, and the picture quality is better than I expected.

Reviews.Title: High quality, reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Steve Wainwright
Reviews.Content: I've only had the TV a couple of weeks, but so far I'm quite happy with it. Considering that I'm coming from a big CRT TV that was not high-definition, I'm discovering which stars and newscasters are older or more heavily made up than I realized. That was a bit shocking. But as for the Samsung TV, I really appreciated the ease of customizing the picture & audio setup. I didn't have to consult the manual until I wanted to find out how to delete channels; everything else was pretty intuitive.As a chronic channel surfer, I appreciate how legible and well laid-out the remote is. So many remotes have a haphazard layout, with label printing that wears off after a few weeks.I noted that some other reviewers considered the audio to be weak. I haven't found that to be the case, even though I have some hearing loss. Selecting the setting that emphasizes voices over other sounds did the trick for me.If I had a quibble with this set, it would be that the stand doesn't tilt or swivel, but other than that, so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Samsungs always work
Reviews.Author: N. Scott Brown
Reviews.Content: This is my fourth Samsung TV's and all of them have worked flawlessly.  No complaints whatsoever.  But I am not very demanding on TV's as long as they deliver a good picture, which this TV does.

Reviews.Title: Great television
Reviews.Author: Margee "Spring Fever"
Reviews.Content: We love the Samsung television. Beautiful picture and it is so light to move. Also the price was great. Thank you.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT TV
Reviews.Author: Jesús Alberto
Reviews.Content: Just amazing tv great design and good quality really recommend for everybody. Clear image and sound. Very good led TV

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: This tv is great! Quality is awesome, and simple to use. It also has fun sounds when turning on and off. haha

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Calsey crowe
Reviews.Content: Great product. Quality is great and it was exactly what was advertised and what I expected. Very happy with my purcahse

Reviews.Title: Samsun TV
Reviews.Author: Larry Sibala
Reviews.Content: It was everything I wanted in a HD TV. No dislikes. I would recommend this brand to all, even though I am a SONY fan all the way.

Reviews.Title: Great product. Just as advertised, but received more than I bargained for...
Reviews.Author: Ocean Rich
Reviews.Content: Perfect TV. Awesome picture, hooks into my computer with no problemsHighly recommend this product and would have no problem ordering another one.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: F. Radon
Reviews.Content: I only payed $247 on a black friday sale and couldnt pass it up. What a great TV for that price. Its for my bedroom and the size is perfect. The picture in HD is excellent. The only thing that could inprove is the sound quality. Its plenty loud but has no bass what so ever. Like I said though its great for the bed room.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: MH
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought this TV for our bedroom. We have a 46 inch Samsung in our living room, and wanted to purchase the same product just smaller.  This TV has a great picture and is the perfect size for a bedroom.  I would recommend this product.  A red light stays on when the TV is off letting you know it is powered off, but there is no way to turn it off.  I did some research hoping to find a way to turn it off, but it is a feature that cannot be turned off.  I would purchase this product again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: theddrake
Reviews.Content: I would highly recommend this Samsung. Great TV for a bedroom or kitchen. I think you would be hard pressed to find a better value in the market for a 32 inch LED.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32-INCH 720P 60hZ LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Mary Anne
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality picture even without an HD receiver.  Great colors.Highly recommend this TV. Mounted it to VESA swivel arm very easily.

Reviews.Title: Best tv i have ever owned
Reviews.Author: KL
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to upgrade my crappy 26" lcd tv that was ancient, being two years old. I love this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Dennis M.
Reviews.Content: This tv is light as feather.  It was easy to set up, the picture is crisp and for under 300 dollars I call this a great deal.  I've also successfully connected my roku player to it and have been streaming movies without incident.  All in all, great tv for a great price.  And to think, ten years ago, I paid 1200 dollars for a 27 inch flat screen.  That one still works too though!

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV
Reviews.Author: WC
Reviews.Content: Cant say anything bad,  I had a vizio and this give a superior image,  quite impressed .  Very vibrant!! Nice

Reviews.Title: Great budget TV
Reviews.Author: oscar
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV to replace a 32" Sceptre that was on sale for $180. I bought the Sceptre thinking you cannot lose on a 720P HDTV for $180. This is incorrect, I mostly use the TV for PS3, 360 and HD cable and the Sceptre was giving me flickering lines, which in games such as COD will hinder your gameplay. It got to the point where  I return that Sceptre and bought this Samsung and I am very happy with the purchase.  Although you still get flickering lines it is BARELY noticable, the picture is beautiful and I cannot complain about the sound. At the price of bout $330, it is a budget TV, Yes you can buy another brand of tv the same size for under $200 but Samsung is a reputable brand in TVs and I am satisfied with this purchase.  There is only one con and I know most people already mentioned it, there is no audio output! For some, that may be the breaking point but for me the speakers on this TV is decent enough where I don't need extra audio hookups. So keep this in mind when considering which TV to buy.

Reviews.Title: Nice bedroom computer.
Reviews.Author: Steve McCullom
Reviews.Content: This is a nice bedroom computer. Sound volume could be better. I can take movies on my removable drive and play on TV, Great technology!

Reviews.Title: Clear TV
Reviews.Author: gnhuntn
Reviews.Content: very clear. good color.  not as thin as i was hoping for it to be but still mounted well on the wall.

Reviews.Title: All Quality
Reviews.Author: Monstruos 0809
Reviews.Content: Good product!!! Buy it if you are looking for quality to your home; soft and easy to use it offer you a nice image and good sound.

Reviews.Title: Great for bedroom!!!
Reviews.Author: Jackie D. Buffat
Reviews.Content: Got this for the bedroom. Just what we wanted.  The color is great. We have another Samsung that is a 46" 3D HDTV with 1080p and cannot see too much difference in the two. If you're looking for a basic HDTV without all the bells and whistles then this is the TV for you.PRO: Great bedroom TV.  Great picture quality.  Can't see difference between 720p and 1080p.CON: The sound sometimes changes after fast awarding on my DVR.

Reviews.Title: Clear, clear, clear
Reviews.Author: N. Matthews "autofill"
Reviews.Content: Nice size; minimal set-up, enjoying it.I would like to have the same set with an incorporated DVD.You will like it !

Reviews.Title: Thoroughly Enjoying!
Reviews.Author: Sharon Peart
Reviews.Content: I am watching my new TV as I write this review & I love it. The picture is clear & the menu easy to navigate. The remote is also user-friendly for those of us who use only the basic features.

Reviews.Title: Ts tv
Reviews.Author: Patricia J Bernas
Reviews.Content: He's thrilled with it. Does everything he wanted it to do and has a beautiful picture. He also plays games on it.

Reviews.Title: Like my Samsung
Reviews.Author: jv
Reviews.Content: I purchase my Samsung about two week ago and so far it is great. It was easy to set and everything is working well.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" TV
Reviews.Author: clare
Reviews.Content: I think samsung makes great products and this TV has a wonderful picture. I'm very happy with it and would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Great T.V. for great Price
Reviews.Author: Elka
Reviews.Content: The price was extremely reasonable for this T.V. - The picture is very crisp and clear. Arrived promptly. Overall, I am very satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: Marilyn 7100
Reviews.Content: The Samsung arrived on time, in excellent condition. It was a perfect addition to the guest room to enjoy while they're visiting.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied with this LED TV
Reviews.Author: Uncle_Ken
Reviews.Content: Very clear picture and weights very little compared to the vacuum tube set it replaced and the remote control is easy to operate. It also uses very little energy.

Reviews.Title: I trust the brand.
Reviews.Author: Laura S. Heinzel
Reviews.Content: It works perfect for a great price.  It was simple to set up.  lightweight beautiful picture with high quality sound.

Reviews.Title: Good quality great price!
Reviews.Author: D.
Reviews.Content: We ordered this around black friday and it matched all the best pricing in our local stores and was free shipping with our prime membership! It was a real easy setup, but I really didn't have much to set up other than my standard cable box since it is in my bedroom. The stand definitely seems a little wobbly, but it is in the corner of the room on a tv stand and won't be touched by my kids so it's ok. Really great picture, but of course the sound is lacking since these tv manufacturers don't put any quality in their internal speakers. I will find some additional speakers to hook up to it soon. Checking out the Atlantic Technology Soundbars - I have their AW-424 all weather speakers outside and a 2200 system as my main home theater system and love them!

Reviews.Title: Mr. Brian
Reviews.Author: Daddy
Reviews.Content: Great picture, slim design almost frameless. Wish I would have purchased  a 40 inch because the is virtually no frame, like I thought there would be.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Danbar "Dan"
Reviews.Content: Choose this TV for picture and sound quality, have not been disappointed.  Would highly recommend this product. Easy set up good picture, light weight.

Reviews.Title: Slim, light, and pleasing to the eyes.
Reviews.Author: David Le "Math Nerd"
Reviews.Content: I have a 55 inch Samsung LCD that was bought 5 years ago at Sears and a 37 inch Samsung plasma that was bought 4 years ago.  So when it comes time to buy another tv, I had no hesitation with buying a Samsung.  At Best Buy, I was able to compare this model with several other brands.  The Westinghouse was the slimmest, but I don't trust the brand.  The Toshiba and LG are nice, but they were a little thick.  The Sony was nice, but I didn't like all the buttons at the bottom of the screen.  I chose this Samsung because it has the thinnest frame.  I am putting this tv in a very small space so size definitely matters.  The only thing I don't like is that the back of the tv is not slim at all.  Other than that, it is very light.Plug and play features mean that the tv was ready to go as soon as I plugged in the cable.  Picture is sharp and sound is just fine for a small room.  The tv is definitely worth the $300.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for Bedroom
Reviews.Author: DGW
Reviews.Content: Great TV for bedroom. Great picture right out of the box but you can calibrate to get an even better more realistic picture. Don't worry about it being 720p. You will never notice any difference on this size TV. If you aren't looking for a TV with all the bells and whistles, this is the one. Use for what it was designed to be used for, a basic TV for a smaller room such as bedroom and you won't be disappointed.Shipping from Amazon was very quick. I received mine in just 3 days.

Reviews.Title: Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: gene perri
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV to have in your bedroom is just the right size was easy to set up and the remote is very easy to use picture is very good on this TV and sound is OK

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Ally
Reviews.Content: This is a gift for my mother-in-law to replace her old antique TV.  I think the picture quality is good the only draw back is when we try to program it with our universal remote control, there are just too many code to try.  The automatic search result have the remote control could not get the volume button works like it should be instead you have to punch the up/down button non stop to get to the level you want.  It is not the fault of the TV though.  I sure will love TV manufacturer or DVD or any AV equipment come with a code for those universal remote control.  It sure will save a lot of time for a user.

Reviews.Title: Best basic 32 inch tv you get today
Reviews.Author: Andrew Basdeo
Reviews.Content: Samsung is really good at making television. This tv is brilliant, and it's the best basic 32 inch you can buy. Picture is bright and crisp, details to perfection. It has great black levels, but not the best because companies dont improve it on this size (don't know why). Xbox 360 with HDMI attached. It also has gaming mode but you dont even need it, gameplay is already smooth. Cool tv, i recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Unit is definitely brighter & clearer than the previous TV
Reviews.Author: StanMobile1
Reviews.Content: This was a recommended model from Consumers Reports and it appeared that the size would work well for the proposed location.  Setup instructions require a close read especially if connecting to satellite through a remote receiver.  Appears to have been a good buy and we are pleased with the TV.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME PICTURE!!
Reviews.Author: xJosex
Reviews.Content: I liked this quality of the picture so much that i bought 2. I even got an awesome deal when i did. i saw them like 60 or 50 dollars more at other retailers, once i saw the deal amazon had, bought it!!The sound is also nice, i have only turn up the volume to around 30 and you can hear everything loud and clear

Reviews.Title: Great for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: John Gainor
Reviews.Content: Got this for my wife to watch in the bedroom. Have had it a couple weeks and it's doing fine with no problems.

Reviews.Title: Night bright image
Reviews.Author: Ricardo Pedraza "astroricardo"
Reviews.Content: This TV has a nice bright image and it's very light compared to the 32 LED HDTV it replaced.  The sound is a little weak but it seems like all the LED TV's have this problem.

Reviews.Title: A beautiful HD tv for the bedroom.
Reviews.Author: Skip In Dallas
Reviews.Content: I enjoy watching HD tv on this tv.  Picture is extremely clear and sound is very good.  You may need to adjust the picture quality and sound quality to your needs, but other than that it is ready to go.  Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: 32" Samsung LED TV
Reviews.Author: innkeeper
Reviews.Content: This TV provides excellent viewing with many options to fit your viewing needs.  I wold recommend it for anyone in the market for a new or additional TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Jen B
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my husband for Christmas. It is a great tv for our bedroom, not too big and good picture quality. We are both very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great value, great quality
Reviews.Author: Justin M. Ma
Reviews.Content: High quality from Samsung, as expected.  I purchased this while it was on sale for $250, which was hard to beat for a higher-end brand like Samsung.

Reviews.Title: It Is True
Reviews.Author: C. Courtney King "RocketQueen"
Reviews.Content: Consumer Reports says it is so, and I am a believer - Samsung is the way to go if/when you need a TV!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jessica L. Tudor
Reviews.Content: So far I have no complaints! It works well without a huge amount of lag time between channels like some other Samsungs have and the picture is great.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 HDTV
Reviews.Author: James L. Berry
Reviews.Content: Nice picture. Perfect for what we bought it for, a bedroom TV.  Amazon honored their best price guarantee promptly. This is the fourth Samsung TV I've bought thru Amazon.Com in the past eighteen months and each purchase has gone flawlessly. JB---Pinedale, WY

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!
Reviews.Author: Alex Luedtke
Reviews.Content: This is a great tv.  Picture is clear.  Great resolution.  Perfect size for my dorm room.  Definitely met my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Really good
Reviews.Author: M. Mills
Reviews.Content: I have no complaints. If you don't need something big, this is the TV to get. Plenty of inputs, great picture, decent sound.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Benjamín González
Reviews.Content: The tv is amazing and came as fast as I imagine. Verry chip and one of the most trusfull brands

Reviews.Title: Great value for the cost!
Reviews.Author: Gary Rock
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV for the money! Bought it for the bedroom to replace old style TV and am happy with it. Samsung makes good products.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32" LED TV
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: This unit works fine.  Sound is good, and has a very good picture even though I am using the set for SD programming.  I would expect nothing less from Samsung anyway.

Reviews.Title: A goob buy
Reviews.Author: thelatejc
Reviews.Content: Right Size - Excellent picture - what else can I say? - Very satisfied!I'm not going to say any more just to fill up your page!

Reviews.Title: Great price
Reviews.Author: Lori Sipiorski
Reviews.Content: Great price and great picture, only complaint is projection of sound. It works well for our "lake cabin". We do not want to spend a lot of money on a receiver, so we will leave it as is.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: Jorge Luis Oviedo Rivero
Reviews.Content: This product filled my expectations, was delivered very quickly without a hitch. It is the team I wanted. It was delivered in perfect condition, and much like the functionality it has

Reviews.Title: good TV
Reviews.Author: Mike Yoder "Seniorgeek"
Reviews.Content: This is a sold TV and works as expected but likes many features that you would expect in a modern TV. No USB, audio out, and doesn't have the "smart TV" features. Average for current technology. It is not as thin as expected from an LED TV

Reviews.Title: Solid TV
Reviews.Author: Sarah Thompson
Reviews.Content: Solid TV for the price. The picture is solid and easy to set up. I am using in the bedroom, huge upgrade from an old tv, glad I bought it. I've always enjoyed Samsung Tvs.

Reviews.Title: Great TV; Great Price!
Reviews.Author: frenchiefellow
Reviews.Content: Bought this during the Christmas Sales bonanza for about $279. Thought it was a decent price.Bought this for my parents to use in their room, to replace their 20+ year old Zenith 20 inch TV. It was more than time for them to replace it, and I knew they wouldn't get one for themselves.As a college student, the budget for a TV was pretty low at about $300. However, TV's have gotten so cheap since we last bought our "big" TV for the house, and I wasn't that worried going into stores.Was going back and forth between this TV, an Insignia, an LG, and a Toshiba. After deliberation, looking at the reviews online, and taking into consideration of the price, the Samsung was the best pick for me. The Insignia, to me, is still kind of an "off-brand," the LG was a little more expensive, and the Toshiba didn't wow me picture wise.Originally looking for a 32", and it actually ended up being a little big, but its a nice TV. Its better than what I expected for sub-$300. Its one of the "thicker" flat panel tv's, but that's no problem as we had a good amount of depth to work with. Not a lot of inputs; 2 HDMI, coaxial cable, and a component input that doubles as an AV port. It has touch buttons on the front, instead of physical buttons.Overall, the picture is pretty nice from what I've seen. My parents don't have HD programming in their room, but from what I saw in the store, it had the best picture compared to the other similar monitors. The box claims the TV has some technology that improves color or something; and it seems to work well. DVD player looks pretty nice as well.Sound is decent, seeing as its a bedroom. Couldn't say much for a larger room, but I'm assuming it would be fine for that too.They don't use the remote, as I programed the DirecTV remote to control it, so can't comment on that.My only complaint with this TV is the stand. It comes with a two part stand. First you've got the base, and then you've got a piece you screw onto it. Then you screw that piece into the bottom of the TV, and you have completed the stand. I know I screwed it in tight and it should be fine, but the stand is definitely wobbly. Checked the screws a few times, still wobbly. Its not in any place where I'm afraid it will fall or get knocked over, its not a huge problem for us. However, the stand is pretty important to the TV, so, I think more detail and care should be put into the design and production of the stand.Really nice TV, and I recommend to anyone that needs a good TV for a bedroom or something. Great for the price!

Reviews.Title: Good price but bad sound
Reviews.Author: salman subhan
Reviews.Content: Overall a great tv for 250. Only cons is the sound and doesn't come with tools to put in screws

Reviews.Title: Nice TV!
Reviews.Author: Adam R. Edwards
Reviews.Content: Have been using the TV for about two months now. The picture quality seems to be really great. The only problem i have with it is limited hook-ups in the back of the TV. Other than that if your just using it to watch movies or Satelite there should be no issue. If you want to hook up some old game systems to it that use AV "red, yellow, and white" cables you are out of luck. Component and HDMI are the only conections available besides the antenna.

Reviews.Title: Very nice HDTV...
Reviews.Author: A. Garcia "Al from Texas"
Reviews.Content: We installed this in out baby's room, so that we can watch tv while looking after out baby. This LED TV has an amazing picture, and sound is adequate for the medium size room. Adjusting the setting for a better quality picture is a must. At this time, Samsung has the best looking TV's on the market, and at this price, you can't beat it. This TV is a 720p, but at this size, you will not be able to tell the difference.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Jeff Lindsey
Reviews.Content: Great picture-High quality tv!I have bought Samsung before and loved it.This one is well worth getting.Delivery was fast too.Great X-mas gift.

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed
Reviews.Author: Judie Trcka
Reviews.Content: Wonderful price, great delivery and finally I have  a television I can use!  I had an old one in my kitchen that was so old I only got 13 channels!!

Reviews.Title: Great HD TV for office or bedroom
Reviews.Author: Quill
Reviews.Content: Gift for my husband for his office at home.  It was easy to install.  Only issue, no HD cables - strange to sell an HD TV and not provide the needed cables.  Once those were purchased, the quality of the picture was great.  My husband loves it.  The 32" size is perfect for his office.  He sits 4 to 5 feet away from the TV, even that close the image is perfect, no pixilation.  Would have given 5 stars if it included the needed cables.

Reviews.Title: television
Reviews.Author: jill allen
Reviews.Content: It is the perfect addition for our basement so the children can play video games with a clear picture and sound.

Reviews.Title: Love It.
Reviews.Author: Camille Bastian
Reviews.Content: This tv has a great picture that is crisp and clean and shows great. I like that the remote also has the sleep feature, totally necessary for me as I always fall asleep with the tv on.  It was very easy to connect including the cable hook-up too. I would invest in another one, if I needed it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32-inch LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Martha L Kaplan
Reviews.Content: Clear picture, great sound, and coordinates well with Satellite TV. The price was just right for my limited budget, and the flat screen is the first I've ever owned.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32-inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Morgan D. Wynneahwmd
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased so far.  It has only been in use one week since Christmas day and not used often during that time.  So far I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Sweet TV
Reviews.Author: A. Cooper "Constant Reader"
Reviews.Content: The TV works great. Perfect picture, easy to set up and lightweight. Adds a new dimension to watching tv with a clear, crisp picture.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Gramma Cat Lady
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I purchased this.  I have it mounted to the wall and love how much bigger that makes the spare bedroom.  The picture is wonderful, color great and am glad I purchased this model.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Jonathan D. Collins
Reviews.Content: I got this TV at Best Buy for $279. I originally got it to replace my family room TV which is a 4-5 year old Samsung TV. However, I opted to leave the old TV downstairs and use this one upstairs in the bedroom. Mainly because the audio lacks depth. There's basically no bass to the audio and it's really more so what you might get from a laptop for sound instead of what you would usually expect from a TV. There's also only one component/RCA input. So, unless you have devices that plug in with HDMI (two ports here for those), then you may have problems. My DVD player and Wii both use RCA, so, I would have to switch back and forth on the back of the TV. No thanks.The picture is great. Very nice quality.Yes, as some have said on here, the stand wobbles a bit when you go walking by, but that doesn't really bother me. It's not as bad as it sounds.Overall, it's a great TV for the price, just understand that with the lower price you are not going to get a top of the line TV, but a very good budget alternative. At it's price point, I think it's the best TV you can find.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Joy E. Davenport
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my niece for Christmas.  It is a perfect size for her bedroom, and the picture is gorgeous.  Samsung makes great products!

Reviews.Title: Makes a little tune when you turn it on.
Reviews.Author: Ran
Reviews.Content: Annoying tune when you turn it on or off.  Nice picture off of over air HD.  Not running a cable box to it.  It is for the bedroom and in that capacity it works like a charm.

Reviews.Title: A very happy friend.
Reviews.Author: Dennis Keenan
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for a friend, as a gift.  I continue to get "thank you's" from that friend.  Wow.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: My second Samsung...won't be my last!
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: I love this TV.  The picture is crisp, and the color is awesome.  I purchased this one for my bedroom, and it's perfect!

Reviews.Title: Love my new tv
Reviews.Author: LillyPearl
Reviews.Content: I love my new tv...the delivery time was excellent...the color pops and the sound is nice.  I'll be adding a surround sound system shortly to enhance the sound but as is its adequate.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: karo
Reviews.Content: I bought it black friday , special price , so far so good the picture quallity is good the sound excellent , and is great for my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Very satistified
Reviews.Author: Sharon L. Brennen
Reviews.Content: A great TV for a great price!  Easy to set up and use!  We were very happy with our purchase

Reviews.Title: Nice for the price
Reviews.Author: cajun
Reviews.Content: Had them for a week, was a little hesitant to get 720p instead of 1080p but the picture quality is great and setup was easy

Reviews.Title: Almost what I needed.
Reviews.Author: G. A. "Looking for deals"
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because of the Samsung name because I have a smaller version of this TV in our bedroom that is not LED lit. I was seriously considering the Panasonic VIERA TC-L32X5, but I had hope in the same quality of picture with the Samsung. The picture on this 32-inch TV is great, and I have enjoyed watching things even more than the old Sony 27-inch tube TV we had.The sound is acceptable for now, BUT I expect that when summer comes, and we are running fans and window air conditioners, it might not be loud enough (from personal experience with the smaller TV I have upstairs). This TV DOES NOT have any audio outputs, so I am disappointed with that, and removed 1 star (I would have gone 4.5 stars). I do have a work-around, because my TV box has audio outputs, and I ran a wire to my stereo, and it works great, no loss of sync with the video, so I decided to keep this TV for the price!I was originally looking at the Samsung UN32EH4000, but it was discontinued and also looking at the EH5300, but did not want to spend so much more money for the built-in WiFi and 1080p at the 32-inch sizing (maybe a distant future upgrade?).

Reviews.Title: Great 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Aeacus
Reviews.Content: This tv was purchased as a gift for my mother-in-law.  The picture is beautiful as well as the tv set itself.  Makes a great tv for those not looking for a feature packed smart tv and does it at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Great Little TV
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Lee
Reviews.Content: I'm not a TV afficionado, and I read most of the reviews before I bought this TV.  Considering I'm coming from a 30" Sony Flatscreen Picture Tube TV, this new one is pretty slick.  It's light weight, has a great picture and was easy to set up.  Dealing with Comcast to get the HD signal and box was something different, but the TV was inexpensive, has good sound quality and fit where I needed it to.  If you're AV-phile, you might want to refer to people that know more about this stuff than I do, but from a lay-person's point of view, it's a great TV for the price!

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Micah
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV because of the Samsung name.  I think their quality is top notch.  Their customer service has been great.

Reviews.Title: TV purchase
Reviews.Author: Donna
Reviews.Content: Very nice tv...quick delivery...lightweight...we are enjoying it very much! No regrests on this purchase.  Clear picture easy set up.  Great

Reviews.Title: Fast delivery
Reviews.Author: cp
Reviews.Content: I love my new LED tv, i bought it to replace my old TUBE tv, its sleek, thin and perfect size for a bedroom. THe assembly went fairly well, and so much more light weight than a tube tv. Can be easily handled and put into place

Reviews.Title: Video excellent - Audio mediocre
Reviews.Author: Lobod
Reviews.Content: Excellent low power consumption - measured 32W, which is very important for use in my RV when camping without electric.Video quality is very good - a definite step up over my sharp aquos 32" in color and contrast.Audio is disappointing, not as good as my Sharp, and worse yet, no audio output capabilities at all - no headphone jack, no analog or digital audio outputs of any kind - unforgivable Samsung!  I was planning on using an external sound bar or speakers.  I don't know why the TV manufacturers don't collaborate with Bose or Yamaha to produce something worth listening to besides just good video.Power consumption 5 starsVideo 5 starsAudio 2-3 stars

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: David Newell
Reviews.Content: Great TV for the money.  Better than the Samsung 32" TV I bought 2 years ago.  Sound is good and picture quality is great,

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: Aquena
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Samsung 32" LED television for my bedroom. Easy to set up and mountable. We have HDTV cable and this is the sharpest picture I have seen. I prefer Samsung's picture quality over Sony. Here is what I recommend that you do after setting it up, it's not complicated: just open the on screen menu, and go through every setting and tweak it how you like it. That's it, and anyone can do it. There are settings for EVERY thing you can think of, and I cannot imagine anyone having a reason to complain about this TV. There are sound settings even for hard of hearing people. You don't need extra speakers, unless you prefer it because the sound is just fine. This is an excellent television for a great price. Don't pay more. Just simply go through the settings (15 minutes of your time) and you will be thoroughly impressed! Even my husband, a die-hard Sony fan is considering replacing our 8-year-old Sony Wega in our living room with a Samsung. Picture can't be beat. Hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: My 32" Samsung
Reviews.Author: Tom Quinly
Reviews.Content: Fine picture all ok. Right size. Everything I wanted in a 2nd TV for our bedroom! Would recommend it for our friends

Reviews.Title: Sweet Picture
Reviews.Author: Xavier
Reviews.Content: I'm not even sure what to write about this TV, other than the fact that is pretty much perfect for it's size. It produces wonderfully vibrant images. My nephews are happy to have something other than a crappy 19-inch CRT to play their video games on. And my sister uses it as a monitor for her laptop to watch Sherlock on repeat and to watch Korean dramas. Out of the box, everything looks great, but properly calibrated it looks as good as any floor model at Best Buy. We're all very happy with this display.

Reviews.Title: Meets all expectations
Reviews.Author: q
Reviews.Content: Easy to read directions leads to easy set-up and instant viewing enjoyment.Packaged to withstand postal shippingLooks great and forever has that Samsung quality

Reviews.Title: Lovely TV
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth G. Reynolds "TexasLiz"
Reviews.Content: We put this television at a nursing home, in my dad's room. He can finally watch the Dallas Cowboys and see the players well. Great buy.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV is GREAT!
Reviews.Author: K. Henry "Soupman"
Reviews.Content: This TV had many good reviews so I decided to go with it. I'm glad I did. It was priced right and the picture is fantastic. I will definitely recommend this TV to my friends and relatives.

Reviews.Title: Just the  right TV for a bedroom.
Reviews.Author: GIGI
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my bedroom. When my grandson saw it he asked me to order one for his room. We are both very pleased with the picture, style and feel we chose the very best - a Samsung!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Gunther Harman
Reviews.Content: This was a gift to my mother and she loves it.  Has a very clear picture and great sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV for the price
Reviews.Author: TB
Reviews.Content: First "flat screen tv" (hey, the old one worked fine for 16 years), and while thought of bigger ones, I already have a nice entertainment center and I also have limited wall space where to place it.Spacing:  This tv uses all its space for screen size.  Less than 30 inches wide, which is one of the "smallest" 32" screen size tvs out there.  It uses all of its real estate in the picture itself. which is great!Performance:  While other reviews have complained about the sound, I've noticed no problems.  The sound is great, and easily adjustable for different settings.  The pictures can be adjusted easily too depending on the type of tv watching you like to do.Cons:  If sitting at an angle, the colors wash out a bit (which seems to be common for this type of tv), but the picture clarity and sharpness are still there.  Also, I'm not certain if it's me not setting it right or the limits of my refresh rate, but there is a slight picture freezing.  (Not if someone's running on football or a car chase action sequence.  It' just noticable on like a facial closeup and someone is shaking their head--their nose doesn't move).I would definitely recommend this tv to others.

Reviews.Title: This TV matches my needs perfectly.
Reviews.Author: Patty Hamsher
Reviews.Content: The size and the price are just right for my small sitting area.  I don't need any of the more advanced features.

Reviews.Title: Great price for an LED TV
Reviews.Author: marslist
Reviews.Content: It had all the features I was seeking and a great price, too!Perfect size for my wall unit - fit right in.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Billy Stevens
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this product, the picture is great and was able to get the same black friday price and not have to fight the crowd.

Reviews.Title: Lovely picture
Reviews.Author: Glorious
Reviews.Content: Hadn't set up the television, so held off on reviewing it. Assume this model had been discontinued, as it was steeply discounted.The picture on the set is terrific, but then I am not much of a techie. Liked the HD and am still slightly amazed at how crisp the images are. Was very happy with the 32" size, which is plenty large enough for a Victorian cottage. Interesting that the LED seems to be winning out over the liquid crystal.A happy purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good quality
Reviews.Author: ken lam
Reviews.Content: The picture and sound quality are clear.Tried the other brand but found this is the best. Would recommand to to others

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: loremi inc
Reviews.Content: great tv, love picture quality and color, and great price too. Would recommend to anyone looking for a 32 inch screen

Reviews.Title: Fine picture, but barebones
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Frank"
Reviews.Content: The picture is as good as the higher-end 32 inch HD TVs. Only has one HDMI input. Very minimal functionality and features. Very satisified with the value. For what we paid it's more than adequate. To get more functions and features you would have to buy a more expensive TV.

Reviews.Title: samsung 32 inch tv
Reviews.Author: Roy D. Greene
Reviews.Content: everything works great. nothing I can say that would be negative. very well pleased with tv. Would recommend to anyone looking for tv.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: D. Seidman
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my wife's study/office. Easy to set up. Got all the cable channels without much effort on my end. Wonderful picture.

Reviews.Title: Good Choice
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Heaney
Reviews.Content: TV was easy to setup.  Colors are true to life and the sound is good.  Overall a good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied all my needs
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: Lightweight, responsive, does everything I want at a great price.  Cheaper Flatscreens available, but not with the quality name such as Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Adalinda Buezo
Reviews.Content: Awesome tv! It works really well. I got this tv for an excellent price, and I recommend to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Belinda Williams
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my sister and her husband and was very impressed with the picture, especially since they don't have cable!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Stephen Zielinski
Reviews.Content: Great TV for  our bedroom. Easy to set up. Good picture and sound. I was totally satisfied... Would recommend .

Reviews.Title: Nice TV,
Reviews.Author: Ernie C Johnson
Reviews.Content: It was simple to set up. Seldom use, spare TV for bedroom. Not hooked to HD cable box, so colors good, but doesn't produce HD as it did when I looked at it in Walmart before I ordered on-line, where I save $40.Amasing - I ordered it Tuesday morning before Thanksgiving, it arrived good Friday! I did not even order expedited shipping.  I have always used standard shipping from Amazon, and everything has always arrived earlier than stated.Picture clairty is very good. If you're really into action movies and have the money, get 1020i and 120hz, but this TV is a great.  Well worth the money. Has some great options.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: What a great television for the price. Color, clarity & sound are great. Would recommend to anyone. Looks great in our entertainment center.

Reviews.Title: Excellent purchase.
Reviews.Author: Harold W. Blot
Reviews.Content: 720p picture that I can not differentiate from my larger 1080P in the main room.Very light, excellent picture with a good looking cabinet.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Pinkfier
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this T.V Its very clear and picture is perfect. I was truly missing out with my old T.V set. I recommend for a average size bedroom. It's the perfect size.Couldn't be happier with it.

Reviews.Title: Una excelente desición
Reviews.Author: Letty
Reviews.Content: El Televison llegó bien, y cumple con lo que indicaba la pagina de internet.  El precio es muy bueno, lo único es que quería regalarle una pantalla a mi hermano y solo permitían comprar uno por persona.Yo lo recomiendo.

Reviews.Title: new TV
Reviews.Author: Eve Dixon
Reviews.Content: I love this new TV--the size is perfect for my small apartment, installation was easy, the picture is clear and beautiful.

Reviews.Title: very good!
Reviews.Author: Julio
Reviews.Content: The image quality is very good. It doesn't have Audio out but I don't really need it. The sound quality is good although not spectacular. Very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Jenell
Reviews.Content: Everything is great! Great picuture and great sound and very light!!  I would tell anyone to buy this TV!It came very fast too!!

Reviews.Title: Great picture; OK audio
Reviews.Author: RD2015
Reviews.Content: The picture is crisp and clear. Although it's 720p, it does not look any different than 1080p (due to size). However, the audio is quite sad. Often times, I have to turn the speakers almost all the way up and sometimes the speakers rattle. But for the price, definitely worth it. You can also buy a cheap external speaker bar.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV & Service!
Reviews.Author: Dr. Gregg Lanzen "Pastor & Police / Fire Dept...
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV based on reviews and Consumer Reports.  Ordering was easy, confirmation and shipping info came within seconds after ordering.  TV was delivered 2 days later as promised, and in great condition.  To top it all off the TV has an awesome picture and very good sound!  The entire experience through Amazon was great.  We'll keep buying through Amazon!

Reviews.Title: GREAT PICTURE QUALITY!!
Reviews.Author: Dao The Star
Reviews.Content: You can ALWAYS count on Samsung to make the best quality products!  The picture is perfect and doesn't have that funny slow motion movement that some LCD's have.  I thought it was going to be a little bigger than expected but it's a perfect size for my bedroom.  In summary, I am happy/satisfied with my purchase, mainly because I got it on amazon's black friday pre-sale!!  When I move out, I'll DEFINITELY consider getting a bigger version of this for the living room!!

Reviews.Title: limited
Reviews.Author: Mr. Mark J. Ainsworth "whethermanm"
Reviews.Content: I expected this to be a better version of an LCD 40 inch tv I purchased from Samsung about 6 years ago, which had a seamless Hi def pic with few flaws.  This Samsung has sometimes has a grainy, shimmering, and unstable picture. At times, the picture jumps and has jitters.  I have messed with the picture settings and have adjusted the picture so it is better but cannot achieve the picture clarity and stability of the 40" model of 6 yrs ago.  very unsatisfying for the money.  I have blu-ray and the picture is much better and approaches  the picture quality, after the adjustments, but jumps.  these jumps don't happen when there is a chase scene or much movement, but when there is a love scene or a scene where they sit and converse.  what a disappointment :-(!!!  not worth the $ I paid for sure!

Reviews.Title: Samsung32tv
Reviews.Author: Lawrence R. Brown
Reviews.Content: Wonderful HD image.Would recommend this HD TV for the home or business.Has the necessary bells and whistles without overdoing it.

Reviews.Title: So Far So Good
Reviews.Author: Matthew Daniel Pleasant
Reviews.Content: Haven't had it long, but my kid was stoked. Color's good and the resolution is right on. We had an Emerson Black Friday special and it was a joke. We hope this does us better.

Reviews.Title: Great looking picture
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv for my bedroom and have been really happy with it so far. First, the bezel is attractively thin, and adds to the sharpness of this tv.The picture is really nice looking. I'm watching the new Star Trek blu ray on it right now the picture looks fantastic. The picture on this tv definitely benefits from calibration (I use a calibration blu-ray). I was initially disappointed with the flesh tone representation on this set, but after some color correction, along with balancing the brightness and contrast, I can honestly say this tv looks great.I already own a 46" Samsung 1080p LCD, but I think this 32" 720p set might look just a little better.The only downside for this set is the remote. The buttons are kind of jammed together and it's hard to use in the dark.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32 inch 720p 60 Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: Bruno Berghammer
Reviews.Content: Like it, just the right size for viewing  I am happy with the picture quality and Sound. Good Buy Recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: shaney
Reviews.Content: This TV is the perfect size for my kid's bedroom. Picture quality is great for both watching tv and playing video games. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the price
Reviews.Author: M. Vonbokern
Reviews.Content: It shipped super fast thanks Amazon!  I just started using it but from what I see so far I'm happy with it.  It was really easy to set up as well.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: S. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I love this tv. It's definitely an upgrade from the last tv I had which was a box set. It's a great quality tv and the sound is great. Couldn't ask for anything better.

Reviews.Title: Nice!!!!
Reviews.Author: Terrance Lark
Reviews.Content: I am sold on Samsung flat screens. This is a real good TV at a great price. Get One! It real lite in weight as well.

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality and USB function for a great price!
Reviews.Author: Cristina
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is stunning. I think 720 keep things looking more real yet images still look crisp. The colors also look more natural than other brands that I have seen. I have also played higher and lower resolution .avi and .mp4 files and they work amazingly! I would say that the picture quality looks better than on my MacBood Pro mid-2009 version. Also, I purchased this during Black Friday for $250, so have absolutely nothing to complain!

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for a little over a week and so far, absolutely no complaints. colors are great, and the black looks amazing and doesn't look grey

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Karen Eppler
Reviews.Content: We are delighted to have this new TV after only analogs and the price is amazing. The picture is so clear and the sound is great. We are so thankful to have this product.

Reviews.Title: Great television
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: I wanted to finally  get a HDTV and chose this one when it was on sale for Black Friday. I have to say I am impressed - the picture is clear, the sound is decent.The only gripe I have with this TV is that the stand doesn't swivel, and that the button to turn the television off and turn the volume up/down is tedious and annoying.

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love the quality of this TV.  It was also the perfect size for the bedroom we put it in.  I was worried it would be too small, but it works great for us!!

Reviews.Title: Picture Perfect
Reviews.Author: susan
Reviews.Content: This TV has a crystal clear picture, was super simple to set up (we hung it on a wall) and was extremely light!

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Heather
Reviews.Content: Great picture!  Good deal! This was a birthday gift for my youngest son...my husband and I both like this TV.  Would not mind having this exact one in our bedroom, plus it is now 100$ cheaper then what we paid in June!!

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: RT
Reviews.Content: A great economical LED TV. The picture is great, and the sound is good (not great). I would definitely recommend this good, economical TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: This TV is absolutely perfect if you're planning on using it in a bedroom or small study/den.  Has a good picture, solid sound, and very easy user interface.  It's a great little TV!

Reviews.Title: Great Led TV
Reviews.Author: G. Rosales R
Reviews.Content: Well, My girlfriend bought this TV and I have to say that for the price and the features that it has is an smart buy. Great Led TV from a respected company.I can recommend this to anyone who wants to buy and affordable led TV.Thanks!!!

Reviews.Title: Great picture at a great price
Reviews.Author: W. A. Wood
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for the price.  It's only 720p and not 1080p, but I don't notice a difference.  It doesn't have a ton of bells and whistles.  The remote is simple and there aren't many real features to speak of.  Also, there are only 2 HDMI inputs, and no separate audio channels, which is a point of contention for some.

Reviews.Title: HD TV is a winner
Reviews.Author: A. H. Ullman
Reviews.Content: This set was easy to set up and it has a very good, sharp picture. Using it in my bedroom so the sound and picture are fine.

Reviews.Title: Good value for the price
Reviews.Author: Jill Bennett
Reviews.Content: This is not a top of the line model but given the price we are willing to live with its shortcomings, the biggest of which is the quality of the sound.  (Were it not for this I'd give it five stars.)  The sound is tinny but this can be somewhat overcome by choosing the standard audio and then tweaking the equalizer settings to increase the bass frequencies.  A shame they don't provide a headphone jack; the TV this one replaces (a $189 22" Philips) had lousy sound too but you could get pretty decent sound by connecting a set of inexpensive computer speakers.  (We liked our Philips just fine but it died in less than 18 months of infrequent usage; hoping the Samsung will last a lot longer.)Our primary television is a 3-year old 37" LG that is outstanding in every way.  This Samsung doesn't compare to the quality of this particular LG but we were unwilling to spend that kind of money for a bedroom set.  We watch mostly broadcast TV in the bedroom but also have blu-ray and Roku boxes connected to the Samsung via the two HDMI ports.  Sure, 1080 would be nicer than 720 even on a 32" set but we were looking for value and feel we've gotten it with this model Samsung.

Reviews.Title: perfect bedroom tv
Reviews.Author: A Regular Joe
Reviews.Content: This is and excellent bedroom tv. I spent about an hour walking around bb last month and settled on this bad boy. I wasn't interested In a slightly bigger tv for an extra $400 when a 32 inch sufficed in a bedroom. Samsung has always been high quality and you can't ask for better quality in a $250 tv. We bought the $60 e5400 bluray player to go with it. The picture quality is crisp and bright for its size and its nice having one remote instead of two. I would recommend it at this price.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: R. Paul Minter
Reviews.Content: Great picture, sound and size for a bedroom TV. Was exactly what I was looking for.I highly recommend to product.

Reviews.Title: NO SOUND outputs!!!!only built in which is terrible cant play TV through surround
Reviews.Author: wfaraoni
Reviews.Content: This TV gets a good picture but the sound is TERRIBLE. Ok I can fix that , Right.----->>>>>> Wrong.  The tv has NO audio outputs so I can't play it through my blueray surround sound. that's right No audio outputs at all. No optical, No coax, no component, nothing. I called the Samsung support and they verified it every connection on the back is an input. Therefore If I play something through the Surround its fine because the blueray already has the audio but anything directly in the TV such as live TV. Your stuck with the internal sound >> ONLY Consider yourself warned The Sets built in audio sound is also very, very poor. I think I should have added a few more verysIf I still had the box I'd send it back.  maybe I will ask if I can send it back to amazon anyway and get something else.From an electronic tech

Reviews.Title: NOT HAPPY!!!!
Reviews.Author: Deborah King
Reviews.Content: I have always bought Samsung TV's. I always thought they were the best. Until I got my last two. Both have the same problems. Turn the TV on, it goes off, comes back on, goes back off, comes back on, goes back off. Usually it takes 3-4 times before this TV will STAY on. Called Samsung & they said sorry we cannot do anything about it. Well I'm doing something about it. DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM SAMSUNG!!!!!! If they can't take care of the consumer then they are not a company I'm going to deal with anymore!

Reviews.Title: Lower Price for Samsung at Costco Black Friday
Reviews.Author: Amazon Satisfied Shopper
Reviews.Content: Great Pictures!  I bought this 32 inch Samsung this morning at Costco for $224.99 and bought it home,  Lower price at Costco!

Reviews.Title: Connectivity issues made this thing worthless to me. until they replaced it.
Reviews.Author: chris ameigh
Reviews.Content: This is a nice looking TV. the stand assembled well. The power cord falls out of the slot. and I had to tape it in place. My apple TV was not compatible with the TV's HDMI Slots. No customer service could help resolve the issue. My PC hooked up via HDMI and looked like crap. I couldn't locate any settings on the TV menu to correct the picture, which was dropping pixels. Then the HDMI slot stopped recognizing the signal from the PC. and I was unable to replicate even the poor picture the TV had been producing before. I hadn't changed any settings on either device when the connection simply stopped working. I'm generally unhappy with this product. TVs should accept an HDMI input, and if there is an incompatibility issue, produce a recommendation for correcting the issue not just tell you to "check the settings." I surfed forums and called support for several hours before I just chalked it up to a limited and customer unfriendly product. I guess a cheap TV wont have the nicest user interface. As it was useless to me without the connectivity to external devices, I returned it. Update. A replacement tv hdmi slot worked fine. I am now happy with the tv.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Brandon A Bitic
Reviews.Content: For the price this is not a bad tv. Good display, easy to set up. Don't except great things. This isn't top of the line. If your looking for a budget tv for a spare bedroom or if your just cheap like me this tv works. The only thing I didn't like was the box it came in was beat up by the time it got to me. But thats an amazon thing.

Reviews.Title: Meh....OK for the price, but just OK.
Reviews.Author: Larry99
Reviews.Content: Not crazy about the picture quality on this one. I always thought to not bother paying more $ for 1080 resolution on TVs 32" and smaller, so I bought this 720 TV for the kitchen. However I think there is a noticable difference in picture quality between this and my older LCD 1080 40" Samsung in the family room (which is incredible!). And its not so much the resolution but the overall picture quality - maybe the difference between LCD and LED; but I thought LED was better? ...anyway, out of the box, I had a VERY hard time getting a decent picture on this, tweaking the numerous picture settings (there are MANY, and I hit them all), then tweaking them some more; then turning the TV on a day later and tweaking them yet again, only to find that no matter how much I tweak, I can't get a decent picture on it. Also, the viewing angle gets really washed out at only 40-45 degrees off center. Maybe I got one of the bad panels on this one? Who knows but I suppose you get what you pay for. I guess for the price it's an OK TV but I now wish I maybe would've spent the extra $50 for the 1080. Meh.

Reviews.Title: Returned it...
Reviews.Author: Joseph Oppenheim
Reviews.Content: It's much more worth it to buy the 1080 Samsung. Quality was horrible on this one and there are no audio outputs.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: jitu patel
Reviews.Content: in this price this t.v is really awesome I like this is this really nice I m usding with my lappy also

Reviews.Title: No audio out connection
Reviews.Author: Daniel C. Morgan
Reviews.Content: Before you buy, make sure you are comfortable with listening to the factory speakers of a 32in TV. There is no audio output connection to hook up to an amplifier for broadcast television. My 13in Hitachi tube dial television from 1984 had an audio output connection. Major oversight by Samsung.

Reviews.Title: No audio out
Reviews.Author: leslies_library "leslies_library"
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit at a Black Friday special at Best Buy.  It has a great picture and was easy to set up and use.  Had it going within 30 minutes and connected to the blu-ray player.  Disappointment came later though, when I tried to connect it to my shelf-system stereo, to find that it had no audio output.  I even went to Samsung online live chat to further inquire; they confirmed I could not connect this to an external audio source.  I wish I had done more homework before purchasing.  Since then, I connected my blu-ray player to the stereo with RCA jacks, but the tv itself is not connected to the stereo. Very disappointed in lack of audio out.

Reviews.Title: great picture
Reviews.Author: iron joe
Reviews.Content: i was a little apprehensive about getting a tv via ups but the set was packaged very securely and the required assembly was simple.the set up was very easy and fast. the set is incredibly light.  i was expecting a good picture but was a little concerned about the audio, but it is pretty good .  i watch from about ten feet away and have no trouble with finer print . the price was very attractive, it arrived via ups very quickly and i am very happy with the purchase

Reviews.Title: major bummer
Reviews.Author: Sue Stephens
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Screws don't fit for stand. TV on floor. Very disappointed by purchase. Probably wont by through you again.

Reviews.Title: glare
Reviews.Author: Ann Descheene
Reviews.Content: Overall a good buy.  I failed to consider non-glare picture.  I am having to close shutters and turn off lamps to avoid glare.

Reviews.Title: Samsung has the worst customers service.
Reviews.Author: Carrie Ingham
Reviews.Content: Samsung has good ratings for their products but the worst customers service.  They were very rude and not helpful.  Wished I checked out the Samsung customers rating on line before I even contacted them.Thank goodness for Jessica(Amazon customers service), we were able to solve the problem.  Never will ever order Samsung directly from them.

Reviews.Title: First Samsung TV..and probably not the last..
Reviews.Author: Reyna Garcia
Reviews.Content: Great picture! Clear, and sharp! Although the sound is a bit muffled a the speakers are on the back of the tv. Regardless, this is the first time I purchased a Samsung TV and I am not disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Great Price - Great TV
Reviews.Author: Stuart Hinson "Majestyk007"
Reviews.Content: Great TV for bedroom when the 26" Westinghouse died... Picture very clear and sound is acceptable (for a bedroom tv)

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is very nice to look at and very slim. I feel I could probably put it anywhere in my house with no problem. Picture quality is very good, though it seems to have that weird blur thing that most TVs do now. I read some reviews that reflected negatively on the audio of the device, and though I can see why it was mentioned my device is only slightly tinny on very high volumes. Overall a great TV for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: Steve182T
Reviews.Content: Excellent picture quality.  Great price for the quality of the product.  The speakers aren't great, but are adequate.  If you connect to external speakers, it will make all the difference with the sound quality.  I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Did not meet my expectations
Reviews.Author: Gizelle
Reviews.Content: I decided to purchase this for a guest room after reading all the great reviews but this television did not give me the same satisfaction as others. The picture and color were not great, no matter how many changes I made thru the tool and menu options.  I sent this product back and Amazon.com made me very happy with how easy their return was.

Reviews.Title: Nice, but thought it was larger
Reviews.Author: D. Thomas
Reviews.Content: I guess thats really my fault for not checking. I was comparing it to my parents 37" television, which I was guessing was 32" (I remembered incorrectly of course) and was disappointed when I realized my mistake. I guess I could have sent it back but the television is adequate altogether so I decided to keep it. 32" isn't bad and Samsung seems to have made a nice TV here. Picture and audio are good. However I will say some say the audio could be louder, but this is easily remedied by going into the Settings and raising the audio levels so as to increase the volume range. After that it is much improved.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 32-inch TV
Reviews.Author: Suzanne M. Dixon
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this tv to ll my friends and family. It's perfect for my bedroom.  One thin g that would make it better is if the base would swivel.

Reviews.Title: Fast shipment & item as described
Reviews.Author: Vincent Chan
Reviews.Content: The item was just as described. Nothing wrong with it. Easy to assemble, and very light. Perfect size for my room. Don't have any reason to return it.

Reviews.Title: really good
Reviews.Author: goodboy
Reviews.Content: It is good price and tvI dont understand why people say soso or badGood and  niceI recommend you

Reviews.Title: Review Samsung TV.
Reviews.Author: John P
Reviews.Content: It arrived early. Set up easily and works like a charm. Very satisfied with it. I've encountered no problems at all with it.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, Great picture
Reviews.Author: TIMOTHY RIBBE
Reviews.Content: Tv is thin and light, picture is sharp and clear. I would recommend this to anyone who needs a tv for the bedroom or office.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Darian Herrera
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV. Nice quality and size, and it looks good and sleek in addition to it's quality.

Reviews.Title: Basic LED TV
Reviews.Author: Raman
Reviews.Content: Its basic LED tv. It has all the features which we need except one sound output. Please do not go with sound output option because its don't work in any case. I tried to fix it with the help of customer services but they denied to tell me speaker or tools which is compatible to this product. They just told me you need amplifier to use speaker but never suggest what kind of amplifier, company, speaker etc.So be careful if you need sound output.

Reviews.Title: Very disapointed
Reviews.Author: kurtis bassett
Reviews.Content: In general I love Samsung procucts, they are built well and usually ahead of the competition for new technology. However this tv is not one of those. The Visual is just ok. and the Audio is equivalent to tying two tin cans together with a string and  yelling at your friend at 50 yards. Overall a bitter disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Bought from Warehouse Deals :)
Reviews.Author: P. Irving
Reviews.Content: Great TV, clear picture...plug and play set up! Keep in mind, this TV is just for watching TV, at this point, we are not streaming, we don't ever plan to hook up video games...our use is not the least bit demanding.  It is a great TV for the bedroom...fantastic value at about two hundred dollars from Warehouse Deals.  Cannot find anything wrong with it.  We've had it several months.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Rose Anonymous
Reviews.Content: I like everything about this TV... the picture is great (even with just the cable and no box), the sound is good (there is an equalizer to adjust it) and the features.  I like that when I adjust the aspect to fill the screen it displays that way on all the channels.  And that the DVD player and Roku can have different settings that remain. If I had one small negative it is that I liked one HDMI port on the right side like my 26", but I saw that ppl didn't like the cable sticking out of the side of the tv so they put them both on the back. Is ok...actually looks neater that way.I like the "Tools" quick adjust button on the remote - if I do want to change the pic, sound, etc easily without accessing the whole menu.  And I set it up to just show my favs so I can scan quickly thru them.  All the settings are easy to use and easy to see on the set.I had purchased the 26" and was happy with that one... so got this bigger one.  I now have 3 Samsungs- they have all been good and all purchased from Amazon.  All good experiences, great prices, and fast delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: BG0310
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV recently and am very happy with it. I agreed with the popular review that the out-of-box sound settings left a lot to be desired, but after experimenting with the equalizer, I found the audio to be much more tolerable. Still, if you can swing even a modest 2.1 speaker set, you'd be much better off.The picture is great - no complaints.If I had to find something to quibble about, it would probably be the sturdiness of the unit. I have TV on top of a dresser, and the screen will wobble whenever I close a drawer. If I had a bigger problem with it, I'd find another option for positioning, but I still felt it was worth mentioning.Overall, this is a terrific TV, especially for the money and I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: 720p? WOW! sharper than 1080p!
Reviews.Author: A. C. Doyle "Sniperbait1966"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a new monitor to replace my 24" that had been stolen. I looked at many of the same size, but then decided to treat myself to a monitor/TV that would fill the entire space of my Computer Desk/Workspace. I measured it and chose 32 inches as the optimal size. I stumbled across the Samsung, and was impressed with the look and the light weight. Unfortunately ignored the resolution because I assumed it was 1080p. When I realized my oversight, the TV was already on its way. I figured that it was my error, and I'd suck it up. The TV arrived, and I set it up as a monitor for my new gaming PC. From the moment I turned it on and set up the options I was impressed. I became more impressed with the quality of this Samsung TV/Monitor. Sharpest image I've seen on a flat screen TV that I've ever seen. While playing War Thunder online there are NO issues of any kind with the video speed or quality. I am really impressed with this TV. I've even talked friends into buying one of their own, after giving it a look-see. They too are impressed with this Samsung 720p monitor. I'll be looking at Samsung equipment when I shop for a 3D LED HDTV.

Reviews.Title: TV Time.
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: Clear picture screen, the slim frame made it easy for me to place it just about anywhere in my room.

Reviews.Title: great for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: flowershopp
Reviews.Content: I have this TV set up in my bedroom.  Its perfect.  Cant say enough good things about it.  Clarity and color looks great, even with the sun shining in the mornings it still comes in clear.  very happy!

Reviews.Title: Great picture, decent audio
Reviews.Author: LoveAmazon
Reviews.Content: Great quality and the price was right.  The audio isn't that bad, and is better than other TVs I have owned in the past.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Thorstein Veblen "Conspicuous Consumer"
Reviews.Content: I am using this TV on an arm in the bedroom of my vacation home.  It has a high quality picture and is light enough not to overtax the arm.  Very few bells and whistles.

Reviews.Title: Amazing tv
Reviews.Author: Kj
Reviews.Content: I was really nervous buying a tv without seeing it in person, but I must say that this was one of the best purchases that I have made! It's a great quality tv with a great picture. I would completely recommend it to anyone. The size is great!

Reviews.Title: I bought this to replace the exact same one.  Love it
Reviews.Author: Patricia P. Surrey
Reviews.Content: Simple to assemble and great quality.  The old one got coffee spilled on it and it became unsafe to use.  But I had to have this one back.

Reviews.Title: Good Quality
Reviews.Author: Allie
Reviews.Content: Good sound and screen quality. Plus it is light weight and was very easy to set up. Was a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!!
Reviews.Author: Dan Hauck
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this tv.  The sound and picture are great.  I am amazed at how light it is.  LED uses very low energy which is a bonus.

Reviews.Title: Worried a little because I don't usually like led picture
Reviews.Author: steven
Reviews.Content: I was worried, but once I got it, it was way better than expected, almost as good as my plasma Samsung in picture,but won't get burn in from playing games on it

Reviews.Title: This TV rocks but watch out for warranty coverage...
Reviews.Author: E. Tucker
Reviews.Content: This TV works perfectly in a smaller room.  It has bright, crisp colors. It is very portable and extremely light. Set up was a breeze.  Recommend it to anyone looking to upgrade. Good Job Samsung!That being said. Be sure on the main product page below, it says that it is shipped from and sold by amazon.com. If it isn't, then it will most likely not be an authorized dealer and it won't carry the manufacturer warranty.http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0078LSTWU/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=UTF8&camp;=1789&creative;=390957&creativeASIN;=B0078LSTWU&linkCode;=as2&tag;=stupisms-20

Reviews.Title: Not what appears in the pictures
Reviews.Author: Catalina Briceno Murillo
Reviews.Content: I was expecting a much thinner tv... I bought a LED tv a few months earlier, about 1.5 inches in depth..  this LED tv is deeper than many plasmas...Picture is fine.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: John Cieslak
Reviews.Content: First time Samsung TV buyer..Always been a Sony fan.. Picture is very clear..  Great size for my bedroom..Only complaint wish it had more hdmi hook ups.. Great picture for Blu-rays and Xbox..

Reviews.Title: Somewhat disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Thomas Cooney
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is good, but the sound quality stinks.  Price was good, too good to be true!  Samsung must have saved a bundle on speakers and jacks.  No audio out put to connect up an external sound system.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV
Reviews.Author: David Toon
Reviews.Content: Very nice TV with a great picture.  I purchased this TV for the guest bedroom and I've only had it for a week or so.  The only drawback is that there is no audio out for a sound bar, so you have to use the TV speakers in most cases.  Even though the sound is satisfactory, I'm giving this TV 4 stars.  Other than that, I'm very happy with the TV, and the picture is better than I expected.

Reviews.Title: DAMAGED TV
Reviews.Author: Rosa Josefina Caraballo de Arteaga
Reviews.Content: I came with the product internal damage the screen looks with colored stripes image is indistinguishable totally did not like the article and I have to repair it on my media ...

Reviews.Title: Misleading Information
Reviews.Author: DanielJ
Reviews.Content: Samsung, Amazon and Best Buy all advertise this TV and the UN32EH4003F as having a digital audio output.  Folks it is just not there.  I bought one from Best Buy and found out while installing the TV.  Then I called Samsung.  They claimed that there was one, but when I told them that I was looking at the back of the TV while on the phone they started backpeddling.  I'm very disappointed.  Maybe some did get made and shipped.  But I would go to the store or have someone at the other end open the box and see what the back panel looks like.  Amazon should show the back of all the TV's they sell.  Good Luck.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003 32in 720P
Reviews.Author: Empiror22
Reviews.Content: received this as a gift and can say it is a good TV set, i would probably buy the cheaper LG with very similar performance and look.  I do like the TV just wish they would be cheaper.Pros: great picture.Cons: cost a little more then similar other brands. only 720P ****Conclusion: Samsung step it up a little and lets see some innovation.  I returned and got the 32in 1080P version (cost a little more but i have a need for 1080P signal processing)

Reviews.Title: Screen came with cracks
