Reviews.Author: S.P
Reviews.Content: I opened the sealed box and it was cracked all over and it was quite disappointing and very very sad.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Picture
Reviews.Author: lulu moon "26.2"
Reviews.Content: If you have ever had a good HDTV this is not for you. It says Samsung but it is cheap and you have to adjust the picture mode constantly to get something even fair.  One day and this is back in the box.  Even for a dorm TV it is unacceptable.  Do Yourself a favor, pay the extra to get a better TV.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: PD
Reviews.Content: Try watching the Cosmos on this baby! Great deal and in my opinion its the best picture out there. Only rivaled by the Aquos.

Reviews.Title: decent, except for one moronic design flaw
Reviews.Author: Roundeye11 "I Can't Promise I'll Try, But I'l...
Reviews.Content: First, it seems like a decent tv. It starts ok, looks ok, has weak audio, and a so-so remote.  The really astonishingly moronic design flaw is the absolute inability to direct tune a channel if the auto search has failed to find the channel. If, like me, your reception is better during evening hours, you might find a channel doesn't receive during the daylight hours. God help you if you try to tune that channel and reception is poor. What this tv does is reroute you to the nearest receivable channel and delete your otherwise receivable channel. If you want to go to channel 8-1, and you key in "8-1", you will henceforth be redirected to the nearest currently receivable channel. No opportunity to tune to the channel and then adjust the antenna. Nope. Not possible. The ultra geniuses at Samsung think this is a bad concept and will not allow it. Stupid. Astonishingly stupid. I thought something was wrong with this tv but it is designed this way (I contacted Samsung customer support and they told me this is the way it is designed). Why this would be so, I cannot begin to fathom, but it is nonetheless true. It seemed like such a good tv.....but I was mistaken. I will not buy Samsung again.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE!!!!
Reviews.Author: Martie
Reviews.Content: PURCHASED THIS ITEM AND ALTHOUGH I MISTAKENLY PURCHASED A USED TELEVISION I COULD HAVE PROBABLY WORKED WITH IT BUT, I WAS ASTONISHED BY THE CONDITION THE TELEVISION. IT WAS FILTHY, SCRATCHED REALLY BADLY, AND HAD WHAT SOUNDED LIKE A LOOSE SCREW INSIDE THE TV AND NO REMOTE CONTROL. I HAVE PURCHASED USED ITEMS BEFORE BUT THIS WAS A DISGRACE. HE DIDN'T WANT TO RETURN MY MONEY SO I FILED A COMPLAINT AND HE THEN TRIED TO BRIBE ME. HE TOLD ME HE WOULD GIVE ME A LITTLE EXTRA MONEY FOR MY TROUBLE IF I CANCEL MY COMPLAINT. THEN HE TRIED TO CLAIM THAT  I DIDN'T MAIL THE TV BACK TO HIM DON'T BUY FROM THIS PERSON THEY ARE NOT TRUST WORTHY AND YOU WILL BE SORRY IF YOU BUY ANYTHING FROM THIS GUY. TERRIBLE!!!!!

This TV is perfect size for your bedroom or maybe your home office. Using the HDMI cord is definitely the best viewing option for this flat screen as the picture quality is clearer than in the general TV input mode. I have had no issues so far a great buy at a exceptional price.

Reviews.Title: Raffle item

Reviews.Content: This tv was raffled at our church. Hope winner was happy with it. Samsung is usually good quality brand and that's why I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Great sound and picture

Reviews.Content: We bought this TV for our spare room mostly for our grandkids to watch movies and play games.  It has better sound and picture than our other TV! Plan to make our next TV a Samsung.

Reviews.Title: found cheaper

Reviews.Content: Great picture quality and sound. The TV is lightweight and the stand is easy to put together. It was even delivered within 4 days! I am very pleased with everything, no complaints.

Reviews.Title: absolutely love this tv

Reviews.Content: goes perfect with my new tv stand and the color is rich, the texture is rich, the picture and sound are amazing. nothing negative to comment here. I bought this to upgrade from my non-flat screen of years an years ago so this is a great improvement.

Reviews.Content: There's no audio out for this tv so your better off getting a different one. They should really advertise that there isn't one.

Reviews.Title: Simply OK.  Nothing to write home about for sure.
Reviews.Author: J. Humphrey
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV to go in my spare bedroom for guest.  The picture is OK, nothing fancy (I have HD programming and sometimes the images are over "sharp").  The sound is horrible.  I expected it to not be that great due to other reviews, but I had no idea it was that bad.  I have to have it turned up to near 40 to hear the average program.For a spare TV, this will do the trick.  If you're considering this as a primary, forget it.

Reviews.Content: I didn't like it Had missing parts in the saving wasn't that great there were too many good deals online for TVs anyway n New

Reviews.Content: Amazing deal.  It works great and is perfect for an extra tv in the guest bedroom.  I've had this for a few months now.

Reviews.Title: updating our 18 yr old tv
Reviews.Author: debi
Reviews.Content: We like the new Samsung flat screen tv, it had high ratings so we went with it.  I don't know why these new flat screens are shaped like they are?  It cuts off the heads of people and we cant read things on bottom of screen like the number of phone call that is coming in.  If we use other setting then it makes picture smaller with black on top and bottom.  Why did they change from square to rectangle.

Reviews.Title: just ok not great
Reviews.Author: kenneth cook
Reviews.Content: i don't fine the picture that great just o.k. lower channel or to blue higher fine than it might be my cable i'll look into it

Reviews.Title: Amazing values but one huge flaw
Reviews.Author: ken-K
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this tv for what I thought was a great price, like 240 or something.  I don't think it came with screws to connect it with the tv stand, but I didn't care about that; I ordered a wall mount with it and that came with everything, even a level.  So for the first couple weeks I thought this was an amazing deal.  It has great picture, amazingly low energy costs,(the sticker claims $6/year at 5 hours use per day) and it makes my living room look a lot better and more spacious.(with the wall mount)But then, a couple of days ago, I was trying to set up a surround sound system, when I learned that it is incapable of any form of audio output.  There's no a/v out or even a headphone jack.  This just surprised the hell out of me.  I would expect a flat screen to have no on board speakers more than no source for output speakers...But I'm still happy to have the tv.  Hopefully I'll find a more appropriate place for it by the time I decide to afford replacing it in the L room.  But when I do that, I'm going to make sure to make a more careful selection and read the reviews better.

Reviews.Title: Great gift and price
Reviews.Author: Wendy Galinn
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for a friend and they love the set.  It was easy to set up, has a great picture and the price was very reasonable.. The product arrived on time and in good condition. My friend now raves about watching the football games on this set!!!

Reviews.Title: Good cost-benefit
Reviews.Author: Leandro Martins de Lima
Reviews.Content: Bought it a month ago and was not disapointed.  Good image quality and nice sound.  I bought it for gamming and it works like I expected.Only two cons: no audio/video output, only inputs.  And not a p2 output either, so you cannot use a headphone.

Reviews.Title: gave it away for a customer promotion, so I couldn't say I love it
Reviews.Author: Willie g
Reviews.Content: Samsung always makes a good product which is why I chose them over anyone else in the market. I have Samsung TV's in both of my houses for a total of 4 TV's. The picture quality is 2nd to none and the new Smart TV feature I have on 2 of them is a great enhancement!  I recommend Samsung if you're looking for a flat panel TV!

Reviews.Title: Great deal and Fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Rhusbh Vora
Reviews.Content: Great tv quality love it, and great price would recommend any one to buy one!! thanks again will get my stuff from you in the future

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: fred
Reviews.Content: one of those purchases I feel happy about. Very light in weight, but colors are and sharpness is a punch.

Reviews.Title: a more accurate review
Reviews.Author: lonnee92
Reviews.Content: Soo I dont usually write reviews but this tv got bad reviews and I bought it anyways. Many of the reviews complained about the picture quality. At first when you set it up it is not the best picture quality for example it has a low refresh rate but I left it on and as it adjusted the picture is just fine. I play battlefield 3 on my ps3 and the tv works great. Would buy it again

Reviews.Title: It's a TV - but....
Reviews.Author: Al
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom when she moved into a new apartment.  It's a TV.  The picture is fine.  However, the stand that it sits on is very cheap, thin plastic.  The TV actually tilts somewhat to the left.  It's not so bad that it's worth returning considering my mom's useage, but I wouldn't have kept it as a main TV in my place.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Exceeds Expectations
Reviews.Author: Alabama
Reviews.Content: Bought this model for a travel trailer and it is wonderful.  Color quality and sound are perfect.  Will probably buy another for the outside area on this (tailgating) trailer.Thanks to Amazon for the prompt delivery!  Right on time.....every time!

Reviews.Title: Great HD for the price
Reviews.Author: Bradee Morton
Reviews.Content: This HD TV is great for the bedroom, not too big and not too small and has a fantastic picture

Reviews.Title: Cant go wrong...
Reviews.Author: Shane Huddleston
Reviews.Content: Another fine product by Samsung. Years ago I bought one of there first full screen MP3 players and loved it. All four of my TVs at home are Samsung including one on my patio that has lasted 4 years in the hot AZ climate. I just bought the UN32EH4003 32-inch and use it for a monitor for my Mac Mini. The picture is amazing and it makes recording music so much easier. I can pretty much have like 8 tracks open and be able to see them all. I did a wall mount on this one and everyone thats seen it is pretty envious of my set up. If your thinking of purchasing this TV you will not be let down. I hope this helps, enjoy..

Reviews.Title: Love it !
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Lockett
Reviews.Content: It is a reasonable price for this tv and it works just fine for what we were using it for.

Reviews.Title: Great Addition to the Kitchen
Reviews.Author: John Q.
Reviews.Content: initially I gave a review on the wrong tv. But all the same, this TV was a great buy. I mounted this one on the kitchen wall and it has a very nice picture and the sound is perfect for a wall mount in a nice open area.

Reviews.Title: Good but not for viewing up close
Reviews.Author: John O'Reilly "JOR"
Reviews.Content: Solid TV - easy to use, good remote. Picture quality is good if you view it from like 10' away, but a little painful/jaggy if you try to use it as an external monitor or watch movies with it on your desk as I did.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: Camilo A. Santos
Reviews.Content: The audio can be better and it also needs an output audio jack for headphones. But it's got a good image quality and I always trust Samsung. I am sure the TV is gonna last a while

Reviews.Title: great TV
Reviews.Author: Zack
Reviews.Content: Its bright, light, clear, has hdmi, coax, and component inputs, it holds me when I'm scared, reminds me to brush my teeth in the morning, and takes out the garbage.

Reviews.Title: Poor Customer service
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: The TV itself is good quality, easy auto setup.  But it came to me with a crack on the plastic around the screen.  I did not notice it right away since I unpack it to look for damage , the placed it back in the box until I prepared the room I was placing it.  Around two weeks later I started to set it up.  I saw the crack when I removed the protected film that was pressed on the frame. The crack is in the upper left corner and separates the frame at that point.  I was disappointed when I called Samsung and explained the situation to customer service. I only asked that they send me a new trim piece that I would snap on myself.  After being placed on hold they came back and indicated they would not do that since 2 weeks had passed and they could not determine how the crack occurred.  They told me to contact my retailer and they would probably have me ship the TV back.  Not much sense to do it this way and poor decision on Samsung part since the replacement cost on the plastic trim is pennies for them to make.  I plan to purchase two additional large screen TV this year since my Sharp is about 10 years old.  After this I will not purchase any additional Samsung TV, Sharp has been great and will continue to deal with them

Reviews.Title: Short on plugs for DVD player.
Reviews.Author: Joe K
Reviews.Content: Could not connect my dvd player. Not enough plugins on back, with by cable I don't have anymore room . My dvd doesn't have a HDMI plug.

Reviews.Title: Samsung UN32EH4003
Reviews.Author: Paul F. Perisho
Reviews.Content: Picture is grainy and of poor quality.  Perhaps as a result of being 720p instead of 1080p but I didn't expect to need 1080p on a 32" screen.  Would spend more time looking for a higher quality picture next time.

Reviews.Content: easy setupgreat picturesound is fine using standard setupoutstanding contrastcompact table top spacelots of interface optionsprovide flexibility

Reviews.Content: I understand why people think audio is crap,they need to adjust the audio input from factory setting and it is just fine. First turn it on and it sound like a tin can speaker. Adjusted it and it was normal, Samsung does not produe crap. Sharp picture ,my parents love it.

Reviews.Title: Samsung tv 32 inch

Reviews.Content: the picture is clear but the sound is not good.  the people seem squashed.  It is an improvement over the old tv.

Reviews.Title: Excelent product

Reviews.Content: The product is of excellent quality and all products offered by Sansung, I really like the image quality, sharpness of shapes, size, speed, power, because most of the generation TVs will take a long time in turn and change the channel, this has great speed imaging appearances, I like that it is slim and thin, as the latest products with LED technology, but overall is good

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: mediasavvy
Reviews.Content: Rating is not price dependent.Picture is so-so, with not terrific blacks and not terrific detail, but at the price point it is exactly how I expected, and it is certainly usable. Volume, while not as quiet as some TV's in this range, is still not overwhelming, and once you get it to a certain level, adjusting it up more numerically doesn't seem to create any real additional volume. In a room that is not noisy with lots of people it will be fine. Lack of any real external sound output options is really inexcusable and cuts down on the usefulness of this set.TV is easy to use, responsive to remote commands and should give years of faithful service. I'm happy and comfortable with the overall purchase, but it's not a standout.

Reviews.Title: Performance/Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: 50jeffrey
Reviews.Content: The TV has a terrific picture.  Only time will tell with regard to reliability.This part is filler - done now

Reviews.Title: great picture, sound limited

Reviews.Content: great price during black Friday weekend, but wish i had stepped up for the unit with some outputs!  i didn't realize that the sounds (its ok for tv) , would be so high end, no bass... haven't watched movie yet ....  dont know how that's going to sound.. its for the bedroom so it didnt have to be crazy pounding surround sound bass.read that you couldn't add on speakers, never thought i would need them but going from a great maganvox tv with front facing speakers with a little bass to this, a bit of a let down.. if you like full sounds, go for a more expensive unit as i am going to try with sony dt 150 system, hope it works!if anyone has any experience in hooking up some extra speakers, people are saying that it can be used  cablebox via hdmi to sub system (sony ct150) then hdmi from sub to tv and that the video will pass through?  advice appreciated, thanks!amazon great, tv was there in 2 days, my first led tv, nice...

Reviews.Content: Opened TV and tried to connect it to a receiver, only to find it has no audio output. Ridiculous, going right back to Amazon.

Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time. Plugged it in, worked for ~ two minutes and then no picture.After a month the repaired product was return and now it works. Their service people are the worst to  deal with!!!

Reviews.Title: broken hip
Reviews.Author: warren
Reviews.Content: this was life saving for me;  my seat was low and this raised it up many many inches so I had no problem taking care that my hip wasn't in the wrong position.  this is a must for anyone that has a hip replacement;  some of the other products are not high enough.

Reviews.Title: Slow
Reviews.Author: Marcia Coty "photographer/writer"
Reviews.Content: I guess there's no more instant channel changing or even powering on these days.  And why do all the new TVs have to be rectangular when the narrow picture ends up showing short squatty people instead of normal people?  I had to get an HDMI cable and still I'll probably need to call the manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: ****NO AUDIO OUTPUT****
Reviews.Author: coachnick
Reviews.Content: I've had this TV for about 4 months.Picture is pretty good.But I recently wanted to upgrade with a sound bar.So I looked at the back to see what kind of cable I would need to purchase to hook it all up.......No audio output. -_-I find this to be a major design flaw, thus the low rating.Samsung is supposed to be a great brand, so this was shocking to me.

Reviews.Title: Poor Audio
Reviews.Author: Maria B. Bolivar
Reviews.Content: Picture is just o.k., there are plenty of menu items to satisfy you.  You have to play around with the audio to get a decent sound.

Reviews.Title: No headphone jack or audio output
Reviews.Author: Heather2010
Reviews.Content: This tv is the stupidest purchase I've ever made. We had to purchase it fast out of necessity because our other tv broke, this was on sale and the right size so we got it. Little did I know that newer tv's (I have had 3 other flat screens without this problem) do not have a headphone jack or any way to rig one because it doesn't have an audio output. I've tried various ways to get cords that would fix this problem and nothing has worked. I'll be selling this on craigslist probably at a loss just to get a tv with all the appropriate outputs.

Reviews.Title: Product arrived without screws to assemble the stand. Had to go out looking for 10 cent screws.
Reviews.Author: E. Thompson "Tundra02"
Reviews.Content: I have three other Samsung tvs and I have never had this problem before. The company needs to find another way to save money.

Reviews.Title: i received the tv damaged

Reviews.Content: i received the tv damaged screen was heading, as I can not give me warranty for this product. I cheated

Reviews.Title: Good for a short while

Reviews.Content: While the product itself seem to be ok, I wouldn't recommend purchasing the refurbished version. After 4 short months my money was wasted. The TV no longer functions and flickers constantly.

Reviews.Title: Plasma Screen T.V.

Reviews.Content: My parents think that y'all tricked us they think y'all gave them a 29 inch T.V. Instead they aren't satisfied

Reviews.Title: got it

Reviews.Content: It short with outletsJust 2 HDMIAnd NO VGAAnd what is even worst it not stabile on the stand which coming with it.The price was ok but I don't recommend!

Reviews.Content: Nice TV, great quality and good print. But TV was a little smaller than I expected. Other than that it met all the needs.Satasfied Costumer.

Reviews.Content: i do not know. when i finished assembling, it was not firm enough. and the case does not fit exactly. i would try some other product the next time.

Reviews.Title: SENSATIONAL TELEVISION
Reviews.Author: NESTOR SANCHEZ
Reviews.Content: TELEVISION IS A SENSATIONAL. WHAT REALLY IS WITH SAMSUNG TELEVISIONS AND CELLULAR ARE SOME TEACHERS. SHARPNESS HAVE VERY GOOD AND NOT EVEN IS 720 1080

Reviews.Title: Samsung LED TV

Reviews.Content: The picture on the TV was only showing on the lower half.  I returned the set and ordered a 40 inch . . . I love it.

Reviews.Title: good seller
Reviews.Author: damian
Reviews.Content: decent productthe sound is cheap and choppingi am very disappointed with the sound ualiybut other than that picture ualiy isnt bad

Reviews.Title: Worst packaging ever.
Reviews.Author: Paula Rosenblum "Paula"
Reviews.Content: I haven't taken the TV out of the box yet, and I'm not even sure I will.  Usually Amazon is impeccable with its packaging.  Not this time.  No cushioning, no padding, just a box with a TV in it surrounded by an extra-large, essentially useless box.I am tempted to just return it and request another.

Reviews.Title: To limited
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: There are to few plug-ins and no output plugs. So no surround sound or headphones. Horrible design if you ask me.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy
Reviews.Author: nechela
Reviews.Content: I ordered this tv for my son for Christmas. At first glance, the screen looked ok. When we turned the tv on, there are llines all over the screen. Upon further inspection, it looks as if there are large air bubbles all over the screen??? Needless to say, my son is very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: GRATE PITCURE  BUT BEWARE
Reviews.Author: john dewey moran
Reviews.Content: II BOUGHT ONE AND THE WI FI BLUE RAY PLAYER.......PLAY`S  BLUE RAY AND DVD`S GRATE......BUT I BOUGHT A 3D BLUE RAY OF TITANIC AND WILL NOT PLAY IT....SO BEWARE..........

Reviews.Title: Amazon is great about returning products.
Reviews.Author: GAR
Reviews.Content: I can't really rate this TV as I realized I wanted a bigger screen so I returned it.  I bought a larger one, same brand.

Reviews.Title: It's OK
Reviews.Author: PHT
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV and I expected to be unpleasantly surprised by something so I bought a cheap one so I could find out the nuances.It fails so far to do the most basic thing I expect, which is fit the picture to the screen.  No matter which channel, whether HD or not, or what content, whether broadcast 16:9 or 4:3, I can never get the picture to fit the screen.  Either I have bands all around, or top and bottom, or both sides, or a distorted picture, or a picture that bleeds beyond the available screen so that content on the bottom or top or both edges is missing. I don't lose content on the sides.I have fooled around with the TV menu and the Time Warner cable menu many hours without success.Otherwise, it's a great inexpensive TV, great color and resolution, the usual low fi sound on such a slim set because there's no room for good speakers, but there's a socket for auxiliary speakers.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: Orlando S "horror movie fan"
Reviews.Content: This was my first flat screen TV and it's amazing how thin and light the TV is.  Set up was easy and I'm enjoying it a lot.  I purchased it on sale and it was well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: lemon
Reviews.Author: tired
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these lemons.  after 6 months the picture started to turn black.  The one thing about Samsung is once the sale is made the hell with the customer.

Reviews.Title: Very good product for the money
Reviews.Author: Darrel
Reviews.Content: The quality was what I had expected.  I had read the reviews before I bought this TV.  Good picture quality and good sound.  Easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: No speaker options
Reviews.Author: K. K. Gorman "oregonkim"
Reviews.Content: After I set up this TV, I was unhappy with the audio quality, so I went out and bought a nice soundbar speaker.  When I got home and tried to hook everything up, I couldn't get the soundbar to play the audio.  I chatted with an online Samsung rep, and after about 30 minutes, he finally came up with the solution:  This Samsung TV does not have the capability to attach ANY external speakers!!!  What a disappointment!  Now I have to package up the TV and the soundbar, and return them to the store.  I will be buying another brand OTHER than Samsung!On the positives, the picture is nice, but that's not enough for me to keep it.

Reviews.Title: TV does not turn on
Reviews.Author: Kevin Young
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV about a month and a half ago for tailgating and didn't try to use it the first couple weeks because there were no games yet.  Once we took it out to use it the TV would not power up.  It did not come with batteries for the remote.  I got it back home and tried it out last night at home with batteries in the remote again and it still will not turn on.  I would like to return it for another TV that works but it is past 30 days since I received it.  I'm hoping this company will stand behind their product even though we are past the 30 days and exchange it for a working TV.

Reviews.Title: Not what advertised
Reviews.Author: Lukesdad
Reviews.Content: Highly disappointed in this purchase.  The description says that it is a smart tv.  When you get the unit it is not and Amazon tech support said it is not.  The description LIES

Reviews.Title: Does not match the description in the announcement
Reviews.Author: Luis Eduardo Vargas Torres
Reviews.Content: Hello,According with the description of the box of the TV, this is not a 720 HDTV as is described in the amazon web page, I bought it because I thought it is a 720 HDTV but the tv that I received apparently it is not.I already reviewed in the samsung web page.What can I do?Best RegardsLuis

Reviews.Title: TOP HEAVY
Reviews.Author: Tara McKinney
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these for my kids for Christmas.  Both are trash now.  Within the first 2 days one was knocked over and shattered LED picture.  Within a few more months, TV #2 same thing happened.  I felt so strongly about this that this is my first review on Amazon.  I believe the design was more at fault than the actual accidents.  The stand is not adjustable.  The way it sits is slightly leaned forward which in my opinion makes it very top heavy and more prone to falling forward.  Guess what insurance won't cover on this product?  Yep, accidental damage.  Lots of wasted money on this one.  I recommend finding something that has an adjustable stand or mounting this to the wall where it's "safer".On a positive note, the picture was very crisp.  I didn't get to see them in use long enough to tell you much of anything else.

Reviews.Title: Samsung will not take the time to ship a elderly person a manual
Reviews.Author: Jeanette Beard
Reviews.Content: I shipped this product to me 83 year old Dad out of state and they would not even try meet his needs with a manual. Original printed manuals are not available in the U.S., only electronic files. You can download user manual from the website or else you can purchase owner's manual from Samsung authorized parts dealer and ship it to your Dad's address.Dylan D: We can send replacement for the included part if the unit is closed box and contacts us within 30 days from the date of purchase. But for the owner's manual, we can't send replacement for it.Age Disgrimination  for sure

Reviews.Title: Broken out of the box
Reviews.Author: Craig A. Liess
Reviews.Content: Ordered this as a Christmas present for my mother-in-law on Black Friday.  Went to set it up for her yesterday, and upon powering it on, the set displayed random vertical lines and four large black circles.  Using the remote, you could change the input and see parts of the picture behind all of the noise, so clearly this set was defective.  The packaging all looked fine and showed no signs of damage.Obviously, this is a huge bummer.  Here's to hoping the replacement we ordered is in better working shape....It's worth noting that Amazon support was very good and is sending UPS to our home to pick up the defective set, and getting a refund/replacement was a non-issue.  Thank you, Amazon.

Reviews.Title: help me
Reviews.Author: irwin paz
Reviews.Content: hello friend i need to know the traking number of these tv please because i cant finded in my country

Reviews.Title: base?
Reviews.Author: Lonny Friedman
Reviews.Content: NEVER GOT THE BASE OF TV WHERE IS THE BASE? is there anyway i can get a base to this tv

Reviews.Title: samsung
Reviews.Author: anthony russell
Reviews.Content: I ordered  this particular tv and they sent me the wrong tv they sent me a Seiki tv I never heard of this name brand tv it only turns on and does nothing else the remote does not work I replace the batteries still don't work they said I could return it but I got it shipped to the Bahamas it would cost me than what I paid for it so I had to take the lost very bad experience I wont be purchasing from this company again

Reviews.Title: gilberto sanchez
Reviews.Author: gilberto sanchez
Reviews.Content: I get the TV with original box was not well packaged thus completely damage the screen and the TV angles were shabby not placed in another box for safekeeping as it was a fragile product .. I did not like the way this product gave me seems disrespectful for shoppers to spend their money and then not receive the product as intended

Reviews.Title: Nice functional stand...
Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: Only reason I'm giving this product only 3 stars are because the thing is only functional... It holds the TV up and that's all it does! The glass shelving holds my components but had to remove one side for my receiver to be able to breathe.

Reviews.Title: NOT A SLIM LED!  No picture of it from the side, why????
Reviews.Author: L. Pasternack
Reviews.Content: There is a big difference with this TV from one I bought last year! I went in to my orders, pulled up the order of the TV I bought from Amazon in December 2011, when I clicked on it, it stated that the item was unavailable and that there was a newer version of it, and it directed me right to this TV.  So I thought that I was getting a really great deal. I placed the order for this TV for my Grandfather in Florida.  I just saw a picture of it today and it is NOT A SLIM design like I wanted! It appears to me that there is NO SIDE VIEW PICTURE OF THIS so you think you are getting a great deal for the TV because of the price.  I did not think I was going to have to go all the way down and read the big Samsung model chart with the options since I was directed right to this TV as the newer model, so why would it be so different???  Buyer beware is all I have to say, so, if you think you are getting a SLIM LED, you most certainly are NOT!  Read all the details, I did not, I just assumed it would be slim since it was supposedly the new and improved model of the TV I already own.  I am just so upset about it tonight.  Really, really seemed to be a photo left out on purpose for people like me that did not know that any LED TV had become so much thicker.  Yes, it may be light according to my brother, but it is the principle of the matter to me. Not happy...  and it takes a lot to make me unhappy about anything as you can tell from my many reviews over the years.

Reviews.Title: Poor Picture
Reviews.Author: songbird1939 above name is correct.
Reviews.Content: We bought two 32" Samsung TV"s. So we can't argue with one another about picture quality. My wife and I both  agree That  the picture quality of both stinks!

Reviews.Title: Another great TV!
Reviews.Author: Fred Bonadonna
Reviews.Content: Got this TV today. Hooked it up and have only half a picture. This is a piece of crap. I thought Samsungs were supposed to be good TV's. Don't bother with this one.Update: The screen was broke during shipping. They sent me another set. This one the picture is great. Found out when they checked the set. So I raise the stars to 5. Easy set up just like the other Samsung we have. For a 32" this has a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Great HD tv
Reviews.Author: JohnMcCain
Reviews.Content: This tv is great especially for online gaming. The image is nice and crisp, Im really enjoying it(: I would totally recomend it

Reviews.Title: Not a 32-inch
Reviews.Author: tina007
Reviews.Content: This TV is not 32-inches. I measured it and it falls short, its only 27 inch. If I wanted a smaller TV I would have ordered that, but I'm not happy because its smaller than what I wanted. However, the TV works just fine. I"m not happy with the size.

Reviews.Title: returned credit now
Reviews.Author: pinochlegirl
Reviews.Content: credit was given and review has been changed to a 4 star.  Returned because I got a better deal somewhere else

Reviews.Title: TOO BASIC
Reviews.Author: mgl1982
Reviews.Content: I HAVE AN UN32D4000 AND WHEN I BOUGHT THIS I THOUGHT IT WILL BE BETTER CUASE IT'S A NEWER MODEL, BUT NOT,TO MY SURPRISE IT'S MORE SIMPLE, NO ANYNET FUNTION, NO SOUND OUT JUS BY HDMI, THE ONLY ONE HDMI OUT THAT IT HAS :(  AND IS WAY TO WIDTH  BUT CBOUT THIS I HAS NO WHITE BLEEDING :)

Reviews.Title: Don't buy Samsung
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I will never buy anything Samsung again.  The story is so long and I hate to relive it.  I cut my losses and threw my 3 month tv away and I am a much happier person now

Reviews.Title: very poor quality
Reviews.Author: P. Coker
Reviews.Content: poor quality for a 32 inch.  bad pic poor sound junk this thing. not like most samsung have used before

Reviews.Title: Bought but didn't buy it.
Reviews.Author: Bernardino R. Villorente "Bernie"
Reviews.Content: Picture looks decent when you're watching dead in the middle of it. Turn to your side or up and down about 4 feet, and the picture quality downgrades so much so it's hilarious! This thing goes back to Bestbuy first thing in the morning!

Reviews.Title: did not work upon arrival
Reviews.Author: Nedrah
Reviews.Content: do not buy!  It was a Christmas present for my parents  and this set would not even turn on.  So disappointing.  But, Amazon did issue a return shipping label with no hesitation.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Papa Bear
Reviews.Content: this tv did not work right out of the box. the picture is fuzzy. I have had all the cable connections checked by the cable guy and found no issues. I was able to send it back to amazon with very little trouble at all. I received another unit and it works well. apparently I got a unit that slipped past the QC process.

Reviews.Title: Worked 3 days then died
Reviews.Author: Doting Dad
Reviews.Content: The headline says it all ;-(They want 14 more words.Ok how about do not buy a Samsung tv?

Reviews.Title: Terrible resolution
Reviews.Author: Nick G
Reviews.Content: the resolution is terrible, it only works at 1366 x 768. which makes the icons that used to cover 1/4 of my desktop cover my whole desktop they are gigantic. and every other resolution is out of focus. if you are getting this as a monitor/TV for you computer/ entertainment center go for something else, definitely not worth the money. the change display settings window takes up 80% of the screen at its default size. clearly not meant to be used with a computer, also PS3 connected with hdmi is grainy. altogether not happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Promotion match guarantee - Beware !
Reviews.Author: RealUser
Reviews.Content: Giving a 1 star rating to Amazon.com.On 11/15/13 Amazon website said that it will match a price or promotion with 14 days of TV purchase which is not related to any event. Dell.com had the same TV for a $125 gift card for which I showed all proofs but still they refused since "PROMO" according to them is something which reduces the price instantly.Well Amazon, if you give a promo, you also give out a gift card right ? Does that reduce the price of the item instantly ?I had few gift cards from Amazon which I wanted to use and this "Promotion" matching caught my eyes.Buyers beware, Amazon is wordsmith-ing here. I do not think they will match anything !
